K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:26b-18: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:26b-19: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:26b-20: kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:26b-21: smon lam gyi byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:26b-22: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'geng [?] pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:26b-23: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:26b-24: rnam par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:26b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-1: gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-2: chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-3: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-4: bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa mi zad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-5: 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-6: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-7: sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-8: srog med pa yongs su shes pas rab rib med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-9: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-10: nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-13: chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-17: bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-18: chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten pa nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27a-19: sangs rgyas la the tshom dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-0: nem nur dang yid gnyis yongs su @27b chad pa; sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-1: 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-2: 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-3: gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-4: sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-5: 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-6: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-9: sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:27b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-0: @28a *// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang; de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-6: sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang; dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-7: dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-8: rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang bar rab tu thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-10: bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-11: yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-19: rnam par dbye ba'am; rnam par grol ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-21: sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-22: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-23: sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28a-25: shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang brda sna tshogs su gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-0: dbang @28b bsgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-1: dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-2: bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-3: sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-5: chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-6: sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-7: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-9: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-11: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrubs pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-12: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongs su dag par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:28b-13: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-0: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub @29a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-1: pa dang; rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-3: mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-5: khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-7: rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-12: rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-0: yon ston pa'i cho @29b 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-2: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-5: rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-8: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-9: 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-10: thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i rang bzhin can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-11: thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-12: thugs rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-13: thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par bzhag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:29b-15: pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus med par yangs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-0: rdo rje thub pa med pa'i @30a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-1: rgyan mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-2: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun du bkram pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-3: rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas chal par gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-4: nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-5: bee d'urya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-6: rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-7: rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-8: 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-9: rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-10: rta babs dang; pu shu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-12: khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-13: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-14: 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-15: nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-16: rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang; sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-17: rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-18: phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30a-19: phyogs kun nas them skabs kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-0: shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes @30b par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-1: dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-2: chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-3: sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-4: chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing yangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-5: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-6: sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-7: nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i rva bas kun nas bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-8: rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-10: rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g-yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-12: rin po che'i me tog punda ri ka'i phreng ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-13: rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi padmo rab tu rgyas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-14: shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par bkod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:30b-15: rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-0: nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i @31a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-1: dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-2: nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-3: spos thams cad kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-4: bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-5: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-7: ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-8: rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-9: me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-12: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-13: rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-14: nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-15: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-16: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-17: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-18: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31a-19: rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-0: dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings @31b thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-1: dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin byis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-2: brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-4: dkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sprin las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-6: nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-7: rin po che'i padmo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-8: rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-10: lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-11: mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-12: mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:31b-13: rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-1: gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-4: byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i @32b sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-2: 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-3: ji ltar dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-4: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-5: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-8: dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-9: byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-11: rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-12: rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-13: rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-14: zhing thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:32b-15: lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-0: me tog sna tshogs thams cad @33a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-1: kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-2: gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-5: se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-6: spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-7: na bun gyi char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-8: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-9: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-10: ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings kun du rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-12: rin po che thams cad kyi padmo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can; chu ba mthon po dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-13: kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-14: rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-15: rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33a-16: se mo dos [?] brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-0: de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin @33b gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-1: de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-2: gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-6: nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-7: lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-8: lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-9: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i padmo'i sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-10: lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-11: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-12: lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:33b-13: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-0: kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon @34a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-2: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyi rlabs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-3: rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-4: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-5: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste; 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-6: shar phyogs su brten te khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-7: nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-8: seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-9: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-10: skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-11: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-0: byang chub sems dpa' @34b sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-1: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-4: dra ba chen pos kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-6: phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-9: se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bas byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi phreng ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:34b-14: lda ldi mang po'i dra ba kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-0: zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che @35a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-1: dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba dang lda ldi'i dra bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-4: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-5: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-6: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-8: nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-9: seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu snang ba'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-10: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-11: skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35a-12: nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi @35b zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-1: byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-3: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-4: chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-5: dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-6: chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-8: chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-10: chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-12: chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-13: sa thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:35b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-0: chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor @36a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-1: bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-3: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-4: bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-6: chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-9: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-11: sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-0: chos @36b kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-4: phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-7: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-8: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-9: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-10: khang pa brtsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-11: mu tig gi dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-12: seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-13: rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-14: yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-15: skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-16: byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:36b-17: rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-0: @37a *// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-1: byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-3: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-4: nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-5: nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-6: mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-7: nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-8: spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-9: nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-10: nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyis sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-0: nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab @37b pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-1: nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-2: nor bu rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-3: nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-4: nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-5: nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-6: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-7: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-8: 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-9: rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-10: seng ge'i khri bee d'urya'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-11: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:37b-12: rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas; skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-0: byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol @38a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-1: gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-3: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa @38b dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad padmo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-5: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-6: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-7: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-8: byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-9: nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-10: seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-11: rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-12: rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:38b-13: skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-0: shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i @39a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-1: rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-4: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-5: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyi kha dog kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-6: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-7: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-8: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-9: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad padmo'i snying po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39a-10: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-0: rin po che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od @39b kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-1: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-2: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-3: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-4: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-5: skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-6: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-7: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-8: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-9: shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-10: rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-11: seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-12: nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:39b-13: lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin @40a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-1: tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-3: byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-6: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-7: nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-8: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-9: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-10: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-11: spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdug pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40a-12: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-0: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu @40b rin po che rnam par snang ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-1: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-2: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-3: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-4: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-5: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-6: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-7: lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-8: nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les chos kyis dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:40b-9: seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas; rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-0: rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod @41a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-1: pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-2: nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-6: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-7: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-8: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-9: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-10: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-11: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-12: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-13: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41a-14: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-0: lus thams cad nas dus gsum @41b du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-1: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-2: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-3: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul ba'i tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-4: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-5: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-6: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-7: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-8: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-9: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-10: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-11: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-12: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-13: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-14: byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun du dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-15: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:41b-16: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-0: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu @42a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-2: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-3: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-4: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-5: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-6: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-7: lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas skad cig skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-8: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-9: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-10: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas; nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brtan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-11: rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-12: mu tig 'od thub pa med pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-13: rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42a-14: skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-0: 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha @42b rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-2: byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-4: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-5: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-8: nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-9: dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:42b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-1: sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-2: rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-4: bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-5: byang chub pa'i snying por rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-6: rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-9: ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsgrag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-10: 'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-11: ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-12: smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-16: chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-17: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-18: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-19: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43a-20: 'og gi phyogs su brtan te; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-0: seng ge'i khri rin @43b po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi padmo'i snying po yongs su bzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-1: rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-2: skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-3: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyings kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-5: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-6: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-7: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-8: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-9: ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-11: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-12: tshig gi lam thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:43b-16: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-0: sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs @44a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-2: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-4: ma byon pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-5: da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-7: sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-14: smad g-yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-15: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-16: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-18: nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44a-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-0: rnam par gnon pa dang @44b ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-3: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-4: shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-5: ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par grub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:44b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-0: @45a *// rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-1: chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-3: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-4: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-5: 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-6: steng gi phyogs su brten te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-7: rdo rje dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-8: seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-9: aindra n'i la'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-10: rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-11: mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas; skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-12: ba ma po brgyad cu bdun pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-0: byang chub @45b sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-4: mdo sde'i tshul gyis gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-7: skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus su mngon par 'byung zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-10: rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-11: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-12: gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-14: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-15: sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:45b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-0: @46a *// srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-1: las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-2: ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-5: ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-7: seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-8: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-9: mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-10: 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-11: chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-12: chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-13: chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-15: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-16: dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-17: chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46a-18: gnas med pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-0: thams @46b cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-1: nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-2: srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-3: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:46b-10: dog pa sna tshogs rab tu tshogs pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:48a-1: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:48a-2: de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:48a-13: de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa ma byas so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-10: byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa'ang mthong bar ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-12: dper na; gangg'a'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshu rol du yi dvags bkres pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-13: skom pas rab tu mnar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-17: kha dog tshig cing 'chums pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-18: rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-19: bya rog mang pos gtse ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-21: was mtho btsam pa brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-22: gangg'a'i chu klung chen po mi mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-23: sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-24: la las ni bskams te chu med par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-25: la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-26: de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50a-27: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling rtog gis mig kun nas khebs pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-5: 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po dbus su /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-6: mi la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te log par gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-7: de gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du gnas de nyid na /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-11: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-12: lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-14: yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-15: mu tig gi phreng ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-17: se mo do sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-21: rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la; lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-22: lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-23: bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-24: lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:50b-25: skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du mi mthong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-0: @51a *// de ni skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-1: gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-2: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-3: 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-9: yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-10: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-11: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su non pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med par rnam par spyod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-0: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol @51b pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-1: nyams su myong bar gyur kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-2: nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-3: bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mig med pas mthong bar ma gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-7: ri'i rgyal po kha ba can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-8: sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-13: rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-14: sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-15: sman blang ba'i las byed kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-16: ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-20: de ma yin pa'i mi sman gyi tshul mi shes pa gzhan dag gis sman de dag gi cho ga dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-27: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-28: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul gyis byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-29: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul de dag mthong yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-30: nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-31: bzang po'i zung la sogs pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-32: gzhan gyi dgos pa yal bar gzhog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:51b-33: btang snyoms can de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-0: tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas @52a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-1: bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-2: phar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-5: sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-6: gter brgya stong du mas gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-7: rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-8: gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang ba'i mi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-9: rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gi blo shin tu byang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-12: dan rtags gya nom par lobs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-13: bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis bstan pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-14: de las rin po che ci 'dong bar blangs shing bdag kyang yongs su tshim par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-15: pha dang ma la yang legs par rim gro byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-16: bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-17: de ma yin pa'i sems can rga ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-22: gos kyis mi 'byor pa rnams la btud cing khyad par bgo bsha' byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-23: nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-24: gter gyi rgyus mi shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52a-26: rin po che la shes pa'i mig yongs su ma dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-0: de dag de nyid na 'khod kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag @52b dang; rin po che'i gter de dag khong du mi chud mi shes pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-1: rin po che yang blang du med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-2: rin po che'i don kyang byar med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-3: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ye shes kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de dag dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing; sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-5: chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-6: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrub ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-9: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-10: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-11: nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu yang ma mthong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-16: skyes bu la la zhig mig gnyis gos kyi bkab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-17: rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-18: des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-21: nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mi mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-23: gos kyi rin po che dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-24: spos kyi rin po che dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-25: rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:52b-26: rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-1: su spyad pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-2: de ni rin po che de dag len kyang mi len la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-3: rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong bar mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-4: gang gi mig la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-5: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-6: bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-7: 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa mngon du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-8: dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-9: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pa mthong yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-10: nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul de dag ma mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong par ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-15: cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bkab pa de dag la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-0: de dag gis chos kyi @53b dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-3: mig yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-5: mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-6: de mi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-7: de rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-8: sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-10: spyod lam rnam par sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-11: mun pa'i rab rib kyis mig yongs su 'khrugs par gyur pa'i mi'i khrod na 'dug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-12: rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-14: spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang; mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyod pa de mi mthong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-16: skyes bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-17: spyod lam dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa; phyogs tha dad du mngon par bltas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-18: dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-19: kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-20: dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams cad kyang mi mthong ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-21: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-22: rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:53b-23: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-2: cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-3: nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-4: ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-5: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-8: dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-17: sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-18: sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa'am; dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na /
