K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-19: 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-20: me'i snang ba de yang mi mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-21: sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-22: dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-23: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54a-24: rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su @54b bstan pa mdzad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-1: nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-2: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-7: sku ba grub pa'i mi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-8: skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-11: skye bo mang po thams cad mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yongs su 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-16: nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-19: mi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni des mi de mthong yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-20: mis lha de mi mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-21: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus su; sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa mdzad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:54b-23: nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-0: @55a *// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-4: dge slong sems thams cad la dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-6: tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-7: shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis kyang bya ba gang yang nyams su mi myong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-9: 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad gnas de na yod kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-10: snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthus des mi shes /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-12: de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de na yang rnam par spyod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-13: de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-16: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-17: cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-18: khong du chud par ma gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-25: sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yangs la tshad med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-26: blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55a-27: khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-0: sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis @55b mi khyab pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-2: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'dus pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-3: de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-5: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-7: dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-8: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-9: bkod pa yongs su 'dus pa de yang ma mthong ma shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-10: de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-12: ltos shig sems can dam pa yi; ;sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-13: rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-14: dze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'di bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-15: rang byung rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-16: bgrang du med par 'byung ba la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-17: sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-18: 'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-19: chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-20: tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-21: shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-23: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-24: mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:55b-25: yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-2: rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-3: tshig gi lam gyis brjod dka' ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-4: rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-5: rgyal bas dze ta'i tshal du bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-6: rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-7: zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-8: rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-9: kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-10: smon lam yongs su phun sum tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-11: spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-12: de dag bsam pa shes par ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-13: 'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-14: de dag sems dang spyod yul dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-15: spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-16: rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyis kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-17: rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-18: rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-19: gzhan gyis thub dka' pham bya la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-20: dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-21: ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-22: ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-23: grags chen mnyam par bzhag pa rnams;/
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-24: chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-25: rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-26: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-27: phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56a-28: bsod nams snying po shes rab che //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-0: byang chub @56b spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-1: 'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-2: bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-3: yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-4: shin tu mnyam gzhag sems ldan pa; ;mtha' dang dbus med zab pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-5: ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-6: rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-7: dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-8: byang chub sems dpa' kun rgyas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-9: bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-10: gnas med mi gnas gyur pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-11: phyogs rnams bcu nas kun 'dus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-13: rgya mtsho mang la lta ba gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-14: gnas med len pa med pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-15: spros pa med cing mi rten la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-16: rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-17: chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-18: ye shes rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-19: rdo rje'i sems ni mi g-yo zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-20: grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-21: mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-22: phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-23: grangs kyis mi chod kun nas 'dus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-24: yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lhags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-25: gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-26: rang byung sh'akya seng ge yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-28: de yi byin rlabs dam pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-29: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-30: sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-31: chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-32: spyod pa tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:56b-33: pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-2: mtha' la thug pa de dag gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-3: tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-4: chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-7: ltos shig sems can dam pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-8: ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-9: dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-10: sems can rnams la chos kyang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-11: mu stegs ldan pa tshogs 'dus pa'i; ;rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-12: sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-13: rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-14: phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-15: sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi bzhud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-16: tshad med pa dang tshad yod las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-17: thub pa chen po 'das pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-18: nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-19: nyin bar 'grangs pa smos pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-20: de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-21: dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-22: zla ba nye ba'i mtshan mo la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-24: de bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-25: mgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-26: bar snang nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-27: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-28: gar yang thogs pa med par 'gro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57a-29: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-0: @57b ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-1: zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-2: de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-3: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-4: ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-5: lus can kun gyi gnas yin pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-7: chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-8: ji ltar rlung ni chags med par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-9: mkha' la mgyogs par rab rgyu ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-10: de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-11: 'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-12: ji ltar chu yi phung po la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-13: zhing rnams 'grangs pa kun gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-14: de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-15: ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-17: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-18: ji ltar rdo rje ri rab brag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-19: zang yag shin tu mtho yod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-20: de ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-21: sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-22: ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-23: tshad med rnyog pa med pa ltar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-24: sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-25: 'jig rten kun gyi skom pa gcod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-26: rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-27: ri bo ri rab ci 'dra bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-28: de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-29: chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-30: rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-31: rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:57b-32: rang byung ye shes de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-2: mgon po'i ye shes shin tu zab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-3: tshad med de bzhin bgrang du med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-4: de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-5: bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med ston; ;sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-6: sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ci 'dra ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-7: de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-8: rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-9: yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa; ;bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-10: de bzhin bsam pa dag pa la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-11: rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-12: 'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-13: rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-14: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-15: 'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-16: ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-17: rin chen zur brgyad rab gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-18: de bzhin chags med sgron ma yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-19: chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-20: chu dvangs rin chen 'od gsal ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-21: ji ltar dri med chu dvangs byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-22: de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul ba'i zla ba'i rgyal pos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-25: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-26: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-28: kha dog mdog gcig byas pa ltar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58a-29: sangs rgyas mthong bas skye dgu rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-0: de bzhin @58b byang chub mdog tu 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-1: sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-2: rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-3: tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-5: de ni rmad byung shin tu zab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-6: mtha' yas bsgrub pa dga' ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-7: blo ldan ye shes yul de la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-9: byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-10: bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-11: sangs rgyas tshul gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-12: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-13: sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-14: blo ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-15: kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-16: rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-17: chos kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-18: sh'akya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-19: de yi cho 'phrul tshad med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-20: 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin; ;brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-21: tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-22: rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-23: tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-24: 'jig rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-25: chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-26: chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-27: chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-28: skyes bu dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-29: cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-30: 'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-31: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:58b-32: sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-2: shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-7: drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-8: dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-9: de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-11: dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-12: ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-13: de dag gis kyang mgon po yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-15: ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-16: khyi ltar ltong la brgyus pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-17: sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-18: mgon po mi shes smos mi dgos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-19: rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-20: de ni shes par mi nus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-21: sangs rgyas chags med ye shes can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-22: tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-23: zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-24: brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-25: de ni bskal pa dpag yas par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-26: rnam 'phrul thog med spyod pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-27: tshul sgo re res sangs rgyas la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-28: shin tu mnyam gzhag bsams byas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-29: bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-30: brjod du med pa zad 'gyur gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59a-31: rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-0: phyogs @59b gcig cha yi mthar mi phyin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-1: sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-2: sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-3: gang zhig de la smon byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-4: gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-5: de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-7: bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-8: tshogs chen yangs pas rnam gnon la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-9: dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-11: de dag smon lam rgya che bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-12: sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-13: rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-14: byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-16: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-17: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so; ;chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-18: rang byung rnams ni sku med de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-19: bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-20: de dag bsam par mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-21: 'phrin las dkar po bsam yas pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-22: sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-24: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-25: chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-26: 'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-27: sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-28: ye shes kun gyi gnas chen no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-29: chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:59b-30: rdul med spros pa mi mnga' 'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-3: khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyong bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-4: srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-6: byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-7: kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-8: kha dog kun la gnas pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-9: sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-10: kha dog tshad med yongs su ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-11: skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-12: byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-13: de yi ye shes mthar phyin par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-14: brtag par sus kyang mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-15: ye shes brtan pa zad mi shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-16: rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-17: de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-18: skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-19: rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste; shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-20: sems la sems shes bya bar yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-21: de la sems skye med par bsam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-22: gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-23: sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-24: de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-25: shin tu zab pas tshig lam spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-26: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis; sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-27: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60a-28: dran pa rmongs med dag pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-0: chos 'dzin shin tu @60b nges rtags shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-1: blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-2: byang chub rgya mtsho mi zad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-3: de dag yid ni 'di la nges //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-4: de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-5: de dag shes pa 'dir mi g-yo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-7: de dag skyo bar mi 'gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-8: de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-9: sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-10: de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-11: de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-12: yang dag 'phags pa rab tu skye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-13: dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-14: ye shes 'di la de dag dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-15: bskal pa bye bar bsags pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-16: yongs su rdzogs pa dge ba'i chos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-18: de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-19: 'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-20: 'khor ba dag la gnas pa min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-21: sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-22: sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-23: sems can khams na ji snyed du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-24: 'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-25: de dag thams cad brtan pas spangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-26: sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-27: sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-28: 'jig rten don med rab tu gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-29: chags med spyod pa de dag ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-30: rtag tu sems can don la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-31: de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de; ;lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-32: 'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-33: de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:60b-34: 'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-2: de dag 'jig rten snang bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i rgyal pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-5: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-7: bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-8: sangs rgyas sgra ni rab dkon na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-9: the tshom thams cad gcod pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-10: dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-11: chos kun thugs su chud rtogs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-12: 'jig rten gsum po'i bsod nams stegs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-13: sems can thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-14: 'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-15: sems can gtso bo ma smad pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-16: gzugs kyi sku ni mthong gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-17: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-18: ngoms shing tshim pa skyer mi btub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-19: mi yi dbang po'i sku gzugs la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-20: rgyal ba'i sras rnams blta blta zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-21: rang gi dge ba chags med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-22: gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-23: thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-24: de las tha dad yang dag shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-26: de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sgo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-27: sems can bsam yas tshad med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-28: snang bas mdzad de theg chen la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-29: btsud nas thub pa chen po'i mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-30: byang chub dam par lung yang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61a-31: bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-1: 'jig rten tshad mad [*med?] kun tu snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-2: bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-3: sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gcod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-4: ye shes phung po rnam par sbyong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-5: gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur pa; ;de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-6: rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-7: shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-8: 'od snang gsal ba'i shes rab mthu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-9: grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-10: sangs rgyas skyes bu'i mchog mthong zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-11: byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-12: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-13: de dag kun kyang nges par sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-15: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-16: yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-17: sh'akya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-18: yongs su bsngo ba byed pa'i sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-19: theg pa che la rnam par 'dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-20: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-21: thugs rje mnga' ba brtan pa'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-22: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-24: bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-25: sems can don la brtson mdzad pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-26: sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-27: kun gyis lan glan cis kyang nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-28: ngan song gsum po mi bzad par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-29: bskal pa bye bar btsos bla yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-30: chags pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:61b-31: ston pa mi mthong ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-2: sdug bsngal phung po ci yod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-3: ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-4: sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-6: tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-7: de dag yun ring gnas bla yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-8: sangs rgyas mi thos ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-9: sems can dmyal ba re rer yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-10: bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-11: mtha' yas rgyal bas brnyes pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-12: byang chub mchog las ring gnas min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-13: ci zhig phyir ni ngan song du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-14: yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-15: rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-17: rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-19: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-20: ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-21: sangs rgyas mi yi mchog mthong zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-22: sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-23: byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-25: sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-26: the tshom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-28: bsam pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62a-29: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings @62b pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-4: yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-5: shin tu snang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-6: rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-7: man ngag bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-8: chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-9: sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-10: 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-11: las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-12: sems can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-13: sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-14: chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-15: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-16: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-17: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-19: 'di lta ste; chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-20: sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:62b-22: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-2: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-4: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-6: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-7: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-9: phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-10: lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-12: dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-14: zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-15: dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63a-16: bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-0: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas @63b rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-1: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung ba bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-3: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i snying po'i rgyan tha mi dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-6: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-8: de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-9: sangs rgyas rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-11: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-14: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du blta zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-15: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-16: sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dad dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:63b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par gzhol pa la rnam par bltas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-1: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-2: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-4: chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-5: de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-6: pa spu gcig la rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-7: zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-8: de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-9: kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-10: spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-11: snying po byang chub padmo'i gdan gnas pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-12: chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-13: shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-14: zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang snyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-15: rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-17: kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-18: zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-20: de dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-21: rab 'byams zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-22: zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64a-23: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-0: phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas @64b par kun bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-1: ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-2: zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan rab tu ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-3: chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-4: de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-6: rab 'byams zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-8: chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-9: zhing gcig tu'ang bskal pa bye bar spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-11: chos kyi gangs chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-12: smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-13: de dag sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-14: rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-15: de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-16: sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-17: rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-18: bde gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-19: zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-20: sku yi sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-21: chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la dgod ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-22: bam po brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-24: de bas kyang brnan te dgod par mdzad pa'i don du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:64b-25: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-0: chos kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs @65a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-1: pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-2: 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brngod [*brjod?] du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-5: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-6: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-9: rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam pa dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-11: dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-12: byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-13: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65a-16: la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-0: chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor @65b gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-1: la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-2: la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-3: la la na ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-4: la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-5: la la na ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-6: la la na ni mi'am ci'i gnas na 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-7: la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-8: la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-9: la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-14: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-15: spyod lam sna tshogs dang; lus sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-18: rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-19: kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-21: 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-22: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-23: gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-24: bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-26: nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-27: byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-29: phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:65b-30: phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas pas 'dus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-0: @66a *// phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-1: chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-2: phyogs kyi ming du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-3: phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba; phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-4: phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-5: phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-11: byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-12: shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-13: lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-14: nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-16: steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-17: sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-18: sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-19: sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-20: phyogs bcu da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-21: nam mkha'i khong thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-22: zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-23: las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66a-24: skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ming du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khong du chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-0: kun @66b tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-1: sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par blta pa dmigs par bya bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-2: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-3: bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-4: zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-5: sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-9: sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa bskal pa mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-10: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-13: bsnyen bkur bas yongs su smin par byas pa dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-14: sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:66b-16: dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-0: de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal ba mnyam @67a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-1: pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis yongs su shin tu bzung ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-3: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-4: la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-5: la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-6: la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-7: la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-8: la la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-9: la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-10: la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-11: la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-12: la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-13: la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-14: de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-3: rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-8: khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-10: rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-12: ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-13: ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha mi dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:67b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi klong gi snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-1: ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrogs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan pa'i 'od kyis byang chub sems dpa'i de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'dug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyis rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing @68b thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:68b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad @69a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-1: dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying bo'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byams klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par @69b gzhol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin klong mi g-yo ba'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:69b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gi tshig @70a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-1: tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thug pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun du shugs kyis mngon du 'char ba'i sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang; byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la 'gro ba snyed @70b kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan rab tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:70b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-1: dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi padmo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i klong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-0: smon lam thams cad mngon @71b par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyi rab tu snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-7: chos thams cad tshul gcig par rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-10: spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:71b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin padmo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-1: ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can thams cad la mngon du byin gyis rlob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas sengge rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-8: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72a-9: byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-0: sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug @72b pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-1: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-3: seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi padmo'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-5: ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-6: ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-7: ye shes kyi kun tu rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-8: shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-9: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-10: ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-11: sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-13: rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-14: chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-15: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa; 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-16: 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-17: gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-18: chos kyi gnas thams cad la bstan pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du byin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:72b-19: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-1: can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-2: ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-3: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-4: srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyan [*gyen?] du 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-5: 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-6: chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-7: ting nge 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-8: chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-12: dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-13: chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-14: khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bsags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-15: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-16: sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-17: gzugs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73a-18: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa med pa kun nas rab tu gnon pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-0: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan @73b pa; chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-1: shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-2: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-7: chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-8: nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-10: chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-13: gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-14: chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-15: 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-16: 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-17: shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-18: ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-19: dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-20: chos thams cad la dbang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-21: ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-22: dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:73b-23: bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-0: ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil @74a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-2: 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-3: chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-4: zad pa dang mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-5: yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-6: mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum can byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-7: mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-8: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-10: chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-11: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-12: phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-15: mthong ba dang; smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-16: bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-17: phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74a-20: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-0: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan @74b gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-1: 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-2: zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-3: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-4: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-5: ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-6: 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-7: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-8: chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-9: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-10: phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi sa zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-12: yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-15: don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-16: mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-17: gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-18: bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:74b-19: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-0: @75a *// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-1: 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-2: chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-4: sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-5: gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-6: chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-7: chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-8: dmigs pa thams cad la rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-9: chos kyi dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-10: phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-11: yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-12: phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-13: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-1: yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te 'khod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-4: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i stan de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-7: dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-8: dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-10: dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-11: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-13: sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-14: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-15: phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-16: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-17: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-18: legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:75b-19: dmigs pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-0: sems can thams cad kyi las dang @76a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-2: rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes su sgrog cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-3: phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-8: rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su brjod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-10: phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas /
