K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-12: zhing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas skye ba gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-13: phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-14: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76a-16: phyogs bcu sangs rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-0: dmigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon @76b nas; spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-1: phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-2: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-4: phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-5: zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-7: phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to; ;de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-8: chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sprin; sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-10: phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-11: dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-12: mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la ltos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-13: dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-14: mngon par 'thon cing phyogs rnams kun tu khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:76b-15: bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-1: yas rgya chen rnam dag pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-2: stan dang dmigs pa yongs su bcas pa la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-3: de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan byung ba snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-4: rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-5: bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-6: sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-7: zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-8: tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-9: spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-10: zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-11: bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-12: kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-13: mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-14: grangs med bsam yas bde gshegs pa spu las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-15: sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa med par 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-16: bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-17: yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-18: rgya mtsho che mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-19: dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-20: phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-21: rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-22: dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-23: gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-24: dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-25: zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77a-26: zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-0: so so @77b dmigs kyi dmigs par gyur pa snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-1: sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-2: spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnams phye ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-3: sangs rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-4: de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-5: 'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-6: sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-7: de dag 'od las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-8: me tog phal chen rgya mtsho sprin kyang 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-9: mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-10: ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-11: de dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun khyab byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-12: zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-13: dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-14: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam tshul du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-15: zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-16: rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-17: phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-18: bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-19: de dag kun kyang dze ta'i nags tshal gyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-20: bar snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las; ;byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:77b-22: snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-0: de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams @78a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-2: yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-3: de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-4: 'od zer de dag gi sgo re re nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrul pa'i sprin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-6: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-7: 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par blta ba'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-8: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-9: 'phrod pa'i las dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-11: phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-12: sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-14: lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-17: rmi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongs su bskul ba byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-0: sbyin @78b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-2: yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-7: snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-8: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir chos kyi tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-10: yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-12: dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba'i rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:78b-14: ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang phas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-1: mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-2: 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-3: mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-4: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-5: mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-6: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-7: mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-8: de dag la sogs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-10: bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-11: la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-12: la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-13: la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-14: la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-15: la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-16: la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-17: la la ni mi'am ci'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79a-18: la la ni lto phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-0: @79b la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-1: la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-2: la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-3: la la ni yi dvags kyi gnas thams cad du phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-4: la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-5: la la ni yi dvags kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-6: mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-8: rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-9: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-10: ming gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-12: 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-13: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-14: gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-15: smon lam tha mi dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-16: ye shes tha mi dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-17: sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-18: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan pa sna tshogs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-20: sems can gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa byed par snang yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g-yo ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:79b-22: la la ni rang gi gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-1: bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g-yo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-3: la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-4: la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g-yo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-6: la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-7: la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-8: la la ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-11: la la ni sman pa'i gzugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-12: la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-13: la la ni snyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-14: la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-15: la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-16: la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-21: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-22: dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-25: lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-28: dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-29: skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-30: spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-31: gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80a-32: 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-0: bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod @80b pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-1: 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-2: bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-3: las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-4: phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-6: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-7: gdul ba'i don du grong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-12: rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-14: bskal pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-15: rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-16: 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyams blta ba la brtson zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-18: sngon gyi smon lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i rigs su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-19: chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-20: snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lu ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-25: chu klung gi lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:80b-26: shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-0: rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag @81a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-2: chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-3: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-5: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-6: 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen mtsho'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags pa la brtson zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-9: 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-10: byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-11: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-13: sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81a-14: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-0: yi dvags kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag @81b dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-1: sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-2: 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-3: stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-5: lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-6: 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-7: rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-8: lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-9: de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-10: bcom ldan 'das la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-11: mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-13: lho phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-14: bam po brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-15: de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-16: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:81b-17: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:82a-1: su 'gro ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:82a-2: bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:82a-3: de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:82a-4: rang gi gnas nas byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:82a-5: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:82a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:90b-16: phrag dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:91a-2: chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa mi mnga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:91a-3: chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:91a-4: rgyal por gyur pas bdag la bstan du gsol //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:91a-6: bsod nams ye shes shin tu yangs bsags shing //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:91b-9: sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:91b-10: byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-7: rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur ro; ;tshogs kyis rgya chen po yang khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-9: shugs rgya chen po yang yongs su skyed par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-10: byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-11: rgyu rgya chen po yang yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-12: theg pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-13: snang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po yang skyed par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-14: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po yang rab tu ston par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-15: spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po yang rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-16: smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-17: sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-18: snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya chen po yang yongs su 'phel bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-19: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:100b-20: dge slong sprin gyi dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-1: brgya stong du mar phyir bltas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-2: dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-3: bam po dgu bcu tham pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-4: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-5: ye shes snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de rjes su sbyang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-9: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon par mos par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-10: sangs rgyas kyi blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-11: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-12: sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-13: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-14: sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' de la rjes su blta bar bya ba byed cing mthar gyis phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-15: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-16: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-17: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101a-18: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-0: tham mo sbyar @101b nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-2: bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-3: bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-6: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-8: byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-10: 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-12: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-14: smon lam gyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-15: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-16: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:101b-17: srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems shin snying rje chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-0: log par ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i @102a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-2: khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-4: yo byad thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-5: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-6: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis; tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-8: khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-11: byang chub tu sems kyang mi skye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-13: thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-14: bsod nams rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-15: dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongs su skyo ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-17: lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-18: dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-19: mthon dman med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102a-20: rang bzhin gyis snying rje che zhing byams par sems pa dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-0: srid pa'i @102b lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-2: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-3: 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-4: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-5: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-6: 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-7: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-8: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-9: nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-11: dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:102b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-0: kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i @103a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-1: sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-2: mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-3: dri ma med cing dang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-4: zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-5: bags kyis gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-6: rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-7: chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-8: kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-9: 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-10: srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-11: sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-12: gang zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems pa byed cing gnas gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-14: de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di bas kyang yangs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-16: 'di bas kyang tshad med la 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-17: de de ltar kho bos tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-18: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las padma chen po nor bu rin po che aindra n'i la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103a-19: nor bu rin po che bee d'urya dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-0: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma @103b rgya chen po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-1: dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-2: rin po che aasma gar bha'i ze ba can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-3: rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-4: lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdong po'i lhun nas bzung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-5: rin po che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-6: klu'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos chu'i char mngon par phab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-7: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-8: sen mo do mang po mchus gzung zhing rab tu dbyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-9: mi'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-10: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-11: srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-12: dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-13: lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-22: lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-23: tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:103b-24: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-0: mi'i dbang po 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya @104a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-1: stong phrag bcus rin po che sna bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-2: rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'thon cing phyag bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-3: nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngad brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-4: nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhos su phebs par 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-5: nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-6: nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-7: nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-8: nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-9: nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-10: nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal ba bsgrubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-11: nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104a-12: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das @104b ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brtan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-2: phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-3: sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyis byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-4: rjen pa'i dri ma med pa'i las kyis byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-5: nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-6: rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-7: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-8: chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-9: phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-10: sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang mthun pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-15: rgyan gyi mthar phyin par ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-16: bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par mi nus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-17: padmo chen po de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-18: yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa sku de yang 'di nas bzung ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-20: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi mthas klas par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-22: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-23: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:104b-24: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-1: bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-2: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-3: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-5: spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-6: ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-7: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-8: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-9: stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-10: mi bsnyems pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-11: tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-12: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-13: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-14: chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-15: yongs su bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-16: rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105a-17: g-yas g-yon gyi sku'i rnam par tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-0: dgos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa @105b yongs su grub par gyur pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang phyag g-yas pa brkyang zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-2: kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-3: chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-6: rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-7: chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing snang bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-9: rnam pa thams cad rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-10: phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-11: bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-12: sems can gyi khams thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-13: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-14: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-15: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud dang mthu snang bar byed pa yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-16: kho bos kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de blangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-20: de ltar bzung ba de la yang bri na ni snag tsha rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po tsam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-21: smyu gu'i phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de las le'u re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:105b-23: chos kyi tshul re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-1: rnam par phye ba re re las kyang zad pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-5: mtha' zad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-7: de ltar bdag gis lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig cing yang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-8: zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la zhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-9: glong mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-10: sa la rnam par dpyod cing rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam par bsgom ste rnam par dbye ba byas so; ;gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su blangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-11: padmo'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon par bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-12: dbyangs kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par bshad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-13: nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106a-14: skar ma brtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-0: rgya mtsho'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od @106b snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-1: kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs logs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-4: gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-5: dri za dang dri za'i dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-6: lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-7: nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-8: mi'am ci dang mi'am ci'i dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-9: lto 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-11: tshangs pa'am tshangs pa'i dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-12: sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-13: de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab tu bkod cing btsud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-15: de dag kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-19: yongs su gsal bar byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-20: rnam par phye'o; ;rgyas par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-24: shin tu snang bar byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-25: de ltar shar phyogs la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-28: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-30: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:106b-31: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-1: phyogs nas sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-2: kun la yang snga ma bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-4: de ltar kho bos ni chos kyi rnam grangs gcig cig shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-5: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-7: bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-8: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-9: stobs bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-10: yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-11: zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-13: ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107a-14: nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-0: brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor @107b ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i skad rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-1: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-4: 'di nas dpag tshad drug cu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-5: langka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i dogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-6: de na dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-7: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-8: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-9: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-10: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-11: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-12: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-13: kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de yang rjes su dran par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-15: chos kyi tshig dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-16: chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-17: chos kyi tshul de la'ang rjes su rnam par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:107b-19: glong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-0: chos kyi nam mkha' de la @108a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-1: yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-2: chos kyi dkyil 'khor de yang rjes su sbyar bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-3: chos rin po che'i gling de yang rjes su sems shing mthar gyis langka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-4: dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogs su bltas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-5: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang; nub phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-7: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-9: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-10: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang; bla dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-11: 'og tu yang dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste kun tu bltas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-12: des dge slong shin tu brtan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su bskor cing phan tshun du 'chag pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-13: nam mkha'i dbyings de yang lha'i dbang po rnams kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-14: dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir lha rdzas kyi me tog sil ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-15: lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-16: dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-17: klu'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108a-18: aa ka ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-0: mi'am @108b ci'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha'i de la lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan pa'i rgyud kyis bstod pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-2: glur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad sbyar cing blangs ba thos par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-3: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog bzang pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' bas bkye ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-4: dge slong shin tu brtan pa la dad cing mos pa'i gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-5: lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' de la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-6: nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-7: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ldan par byas pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-8: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po yang mi'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-11: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos kun nas bskor te gsod pa med la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-12: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs su /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-13: dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khor ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:108b-14: srin po'i dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-0: nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa yongs su srung ba byed cing @109a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-1: kun tu rgyu ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-2: tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rgyud kyis bstod pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-3: gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-4: thal mo sbyar cing gzhal med khang na gnas pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-5: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis dge slong shin tu brtan pa de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-6: dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-7: phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-9: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-10: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-12: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-13: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109a-14: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-0: @109b ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-1: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su brtul bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-2: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgom par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-3: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-5: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-8: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du bgyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-12: ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-13: skol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:109b-15: ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:110a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral ba @110a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:110a-1: dang; bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas yongs su mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:110a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:110a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:110a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul pa lta bus srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du skye zhing shi 'pho ba'i skye mched rang gi lus kyis nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:110a-10: de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:124b-10: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:124b-12: spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:124b-13: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:124b-14: chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:124b-15: sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:124b-16: chos kyi mu'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khong du chud cing 'dus par snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:124b-17: de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-0: phan tshun shin tu rnam par @125a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-2: phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-3: tshul sna tshogs su bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-4: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-7: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs su yongs su ston par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-8: theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-9: smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-11: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-12: la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-13: la la na ni yum gyi sku na bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-14: la la na ni skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-15: la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-16: la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-17: la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-18: la la na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-19: la la na ni lha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125a-22: dri zas yongs su bskor cing tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-0: la la na ni @125b chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-1: la la na ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-2: la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel rnam par 'god par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis klubs pa byed par snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-6: sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-7: sems can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-8: sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-9: sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-10: sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-11: sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-12: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-13: sems can gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-14: sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-15: dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-16: sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-17: sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-18: sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:125b-19: sems can gyi tshul lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-1: tha dad pa la rnam par spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-2: sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-3: sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-4: dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-6: bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byams klas pa rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-7: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-8: yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-10: gsung rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-11: mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-12: gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-13: tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-14: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-15: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-16: seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-17: sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-18: dran pa'i sgo sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-19: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126a-21: dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-0: rnam par @126b dag pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-1: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-2: dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-3: dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-4: dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-7: sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas chos ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-11: sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-13: de nas tshong dpon btang brjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-14: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-16: kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-17: thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongs su blangs shing 'dzin pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:126b-19: de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-1: gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-4: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-6: byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-7: nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-9: byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127a-10: byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig rgyal mtshan na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @127b dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-2: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-4: byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-5: shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-7: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:127b-8: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun @128a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-1: nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-2: byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-3: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba dge ba'i snying po na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-5: byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-6: 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge snang zhing 'phar ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128a-8: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'phro zhing rnam par snang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-0: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'od @128b rnam par snang ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-2: byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-4: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-5: kho bo yang der 'gro ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-7: bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha' yas bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-8: tsan dan yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rdo rje bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-10: spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-12: padmo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na; de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen padmo bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:128b-13: gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa yang @129a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-2: mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-4: shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-6: me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-8: rin chen dpal gyi dad pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-11: de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-13: dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-14: rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-15: sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129a-17: bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-0: de ltar @129b kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las kyang byon pa med par shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-1: rang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam lta bur shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-3: rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-5: rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-7: rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sgra brnyan ri'i brag ca lta bur brjod par shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-9: rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-11: rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs las 'byung ngo zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs shing khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:129b-14: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-0: gdul ba yang rang gi sems kyi @130a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-4: rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-5: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-6: chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-7: rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-8: bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-9: zhes bya bar khong du chud cing rjes su rtogs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-11: de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang gi sems nyid nye bar brtan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-13: chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-14: sgrib pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-15: brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems nyid brtan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-16: bzod pas ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130a-17: ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-0: shes rab kyis @130b ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-1: dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-2: sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyas par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-5: kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-6: blangs shing yongs su 'dzin par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-7: kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-8: chags pa med pa rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-9: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-10: mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-11: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-12: gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-14: sangs rgyas kyi yul tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-15: phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:130b-16: phyin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'du bar snang yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-0: de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes @131a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-1: med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-2: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-5: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-6: de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-8: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-9: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-11: tshong dpon btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-13: tshong dpon btang brjod kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par brjod de brtag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-15: mi btang bar bya ba sems shing du ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-17: dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-18: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-19: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131a-20: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus par rjes su lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen @131b la rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-1: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la g-yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pas pha tsam du sems shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-4: tshong dpon btang brjod kyi drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-5: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-6: tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-7: tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-10: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su blta bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-14: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rjes su sbyang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:131b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-0: rnam par thar pa'i rnam par @132a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-2: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la bsgribs pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa shin tu brtan pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i las dang smon lam gyi rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-6: mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-7: dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-8: 'chag pa'i gnas shig gi 'chag sa'i mthar 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-9: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhag nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-10: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing mi g-yo la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-11: byed pa med cing lus drang por bsrang ste /
