K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-12: dran pa mngon du byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-13: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-15: steng logs su lus mtha' yas la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-16: tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-17: spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-18: kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi skad cig re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-19: de de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhi ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132a-20: g-yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-0: dga' bas lus @132b mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed par byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-2: rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-3: sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-6: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-7: ngan song gi lam thams cad yongs su bcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-8: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-9: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-10: sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-11: sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-12: rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-13: de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-14: tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-15: rim gro sna tshogs byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-17: lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-18: rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:132b-20: gtsug gi rin po che dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-3: byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-4: bram ze dang; khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-5: ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sbyar ba thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-12: 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-13: rin po che thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-14: gnas thams cad dang; snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-15: yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongs su sdud cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-16: 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-17: sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-18: sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-19: sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-20: phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-21: pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-22: bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-23: 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-24: bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133a-25: mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-0: 'jig rten @133b las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-1: rgyus la gsal zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-2: 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-3: dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-4: yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas yi mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-5: chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-6: sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-7: log par lhung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-8: theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-9: 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-11: sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-12: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la sems can gzud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-13: don spyad pa la sems can dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-14: dga' ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-15: snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-16: 'jig rten la don mthun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-17: phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:133b-18: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus dbyibs su 'khod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-4: spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-5: steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjod par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-6: chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-7: sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-9: tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-10: dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-11: rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-12: ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-13: 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-15: mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-16: phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-17: rtsib logs gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-18: lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyi mi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-19: klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-20: spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134a-21: me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-0: phreng ba'i sprin @134b bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par klubs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-1: rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-2: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-3: rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-4: rin po che'i phyang phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-5: char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-6: nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-7: rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-8: me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-9: rin po che'i khri la skyil mo krung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-10: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi glu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-11: rin po che'i padmo ze ba mtho ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-12: mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-13: rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-14: rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:134b-15: 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-1: lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-5: lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-6: lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-7: gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'thor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-9: nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-10: spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-11: bdug spos kyi na bun dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-12: sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-14: sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-16: mthongs ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-17: lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135a-18: chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod @135b pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-1: ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-2: lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-3: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-4: bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-7: dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-8: gnod par sems pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-9: mtho 'tsham pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-10: sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-11: nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-12: nyon mongs pa'i 'thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-13: lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-14: rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-15: sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-17: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-18: gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-19: byang chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:135b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi @136a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-1: tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-2: chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-3: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-4: rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-5: rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-7: rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-8: sems can med pa yongs su rjod par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-9: rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-10: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-11: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-12: gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-13: cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-14: yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136a-15: zhi ba la gnas su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-0: phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du @136b rjod par byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-1: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-2: phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-3: srin po'i dbang po'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-5: kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-6: spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-7: bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-8: 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-9: 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-10: dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-12: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-13: dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-14: 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-16: lag na rdo rje'i las kyis yang dag par song ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-17: yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-20: sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:136b-21: 'jig rten thams cad kyi nad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-1: thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-2: sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-3: chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-4: phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-5: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-6: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-7: mdun gyi lto nas mi'am ci'i dbang po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-9: mi'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-10: dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-11: glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rjod pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-12: byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-14: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137a-16: rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-0: @137b yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-1: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-2: sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-4: chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-5: sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su skyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-7: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-8: kha'i sgo nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-9: rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-10: stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-11: sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-12: nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad spyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-13: dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-14: srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-15: byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-16: ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dbral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-17: rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-18: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:137b-19: tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-1: ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-2: bslu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-3: phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-4: gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-5: zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-6: 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-7: gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-8: don zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba las yang dag par dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-9: ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-10: snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-11: 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-13: chog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-14: chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-15: gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-16: lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-17: yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-18: the tshom gyi spo thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-19: nem nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-20: chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138a-21: rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-0: @138b rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-1: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-2: sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-3: sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-4: phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-5: mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-7: 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-8: sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-9: grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-10: sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar bo can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-11: gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od bee d'urya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-12: bee d'urya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od dngul gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-13: dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-14: gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:138b-15: gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-0: aasma gar bha'i rang bzhin gyi @139a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-1: zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-2: gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od aasma gar bha'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-3: aindra n'i la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-4: rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i aindra n'i la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-5: mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-7: rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-9: rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-10: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139a-11: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-0: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing @139b grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-1: lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-2: 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-3: sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-4: sems can tshad med pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-5: dpral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-7: mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-8: kha dog dang dbyings sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i lus yongs su ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-9: dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-10: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:139b-11: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-0: dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i rnam pa'i sprin @140a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-1: mang po rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi spyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-3: sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-4: ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-5: chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-6: 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-7: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-8: mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-9: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-10: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-11: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-12: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-13: sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-15: 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140a-16: 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-0: log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar @140b byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-2: snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su brjod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-4: sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-5: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing; rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-7: nyon mongs pa la dbang bsgyur ba sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-8: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-9: 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mngon par ston cing; khro ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-11: shar gnyer ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-12: zhe sdang ba med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-13: chud gson pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-14: khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-15: byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcad pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-16: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i srid rab tu 'gyed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:140b-17: bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-0: chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed @141a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-2: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal bas mi skyo bar bya bar yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-6: sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-7: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-9: sems can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-10: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-11: las la dbang bsgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141a-12: rgyun ma 'chad par brtson par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-0: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la @141b sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-3: rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-4: rlom pa dang bag med pa thams cad las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-5: bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-7: nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-8: sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-9: 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-10: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-11: sems can la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-12: skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-13: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-14: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-15: dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-16: yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-17: chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:141b-18: sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-1: thams cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-2: the tshom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-3: ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-4: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu rjod par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-6: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-7: 'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-8: theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-11: mya ngan las 'das pa tha mi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-13: 'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142a-14: sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-0: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs @142b med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-1: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-2: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-3: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-5: smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-6: chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-8: mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu rjod pa byed cing smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-9: sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-10: yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu dbyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:142b-13: ba spu bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-0: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs stobs yongs su bstan @143a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-2: khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang mi nyams pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-3: bskal pas 'tshig pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-5: sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'gengs pa rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-6: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-7: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-8: 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143a-10: smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143b-0: sems can @143b thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143b-1: sems can thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143b-2: sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143b-3: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu dbye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143b-4: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143b-5: mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang; sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par dgrol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143b-6: sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su ston pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:143b-7: spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra @144a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-1: ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-2: dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-3: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-4: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spa zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-5: chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-6: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-7: 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-8: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-9: byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144a-10: byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-0: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char @144b mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-1: byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam bdag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-3: byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-5: gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-6: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-7: thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:144b-9: byang chub sems dpa' yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis @145a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-1: dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-2: gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-3: tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-4: dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-5: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-6: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-7: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145a-8: mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145b-0: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de @145b bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145b-1: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145b-2: dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145b-3: lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145b-4: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145b-5: mi'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:145b-6: klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-0: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi @146a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-1: sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-2: mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-3: sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-4: 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-5: byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-7: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-8: sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-9: sems can log par lhung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs dbyung ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146a-10: chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-0: ba spu'i bu @146b ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-2: gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-3: dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la sta gon du gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-5: 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-7: sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-8: ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-10: dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-13: tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo; ;ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkang lag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-16: yan lag gi dam pa gcad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-17: nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-18: khu tshur dang dbyig pas bsnun te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-19: mtshon gyis lus la btab kyang; nyams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:146b-20: lus thams cad gshegs sam snying dang mig phyung yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-0: nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong @147a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-1: ngo; ;byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-2: rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du lus dang sems la gnod pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-4: nying lag gcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams su bzod par byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-5: bag la zha bar byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-6: gtang snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-7: ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-12: da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul ba 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-13: rgya mtsho yongs su skem pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-14: sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-15: mu stegs can thams cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-16: bdud thams cad spa bkong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-17: chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147a-18: pa spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-2: lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-3: rigs su skye ba yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-4: gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-8: gnas dang; gzhal med khang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-10: ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-11: bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-12: rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-13: 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-17: spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-18: ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-21: chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung ba mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:147b-22: lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-1: cad las yongs su btsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-3: bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang; dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-4: sri zhus lus rab tu btud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-6: chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-7: 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyis yongs su btsal ba de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-8: ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-10: ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byams klas pa sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-13: sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-14: thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148a-15: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-0: ba @148b spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-1: sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa thams cad du smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-2: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-3: zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-4: smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las 'khor ba'i skyon so so re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrubs pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-5: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-6: ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-7: ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-8: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-9: ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:148b-10: ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-0: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge slong rgya @149a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-1: mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-4: sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-5: mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-6: chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-7: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-11: dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-17: zla ba drug gi bar dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-18: nyin zhag kyang drug tu dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du lon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149a-19: de ltar zla ba drug dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-0: dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las @149b langs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-1: de nas nor bzang gis smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-3: ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-5: de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-6: de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-7: de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-8: de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-9: de ltar mi 'phrog pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang; de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-10: de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-11: ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-12: de nas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-13: 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-14: sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-15: byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-16: mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-17: mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-18: lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-19: bsam gtan gyi yul gyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:149b-20: 'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-0: khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan @150a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-1: pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-2: byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-3: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-4: snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-5: smon lam chen po'i stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu 'thob par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-8: theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-9: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-13: 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba sta gon du gnas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-16: ting 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-20: ting 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150a-21: sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-2: sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-5: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul der bas sam ma bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-8: ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-14: sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-15: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-16: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-17: sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:150b-18: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-1: rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-3: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-4: phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su bgrang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-6: sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-7: snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang pa la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-8: byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-9: sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-10: sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do; ;sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-11: sems can gyi dbang po thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151a-13: kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-0: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @151b rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-2: chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-3: blo shin tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-4: gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-6: khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-7: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-8: ngag snyan pa sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-9: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-13: smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-14: 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-15: yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon par brjod pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-18: sems kyi yul shes par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-19: ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya bar nus re skan; song /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-21: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:151b-22: phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-0: de na bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan @152a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-2: grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-3: de na shes las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od bzang gi chung ma /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-4: dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-6: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-7: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-8: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-10: tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-11: dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-12: chos kyis nye bar 'tsho bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-13: ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-14: snang ba thob pa ye shes snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-16: mos pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-17: sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-18: rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-19: phyogs su ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu 'dal ba des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-20: dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-21: lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152a-22: dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-1: yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-11: ngo mtshar du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-12: yon tan mngon du bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-14: rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-15: rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-19: rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-20: smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-22: dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-23: gzungs kyi rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-24: ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-25: kha dog dang dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-26: ye shes kyi yul rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-27: ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-28: smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-29: spyod yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-30: ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-31: bam po dgu bcu gnyis pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:152b-32: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-1: gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brlabs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam du lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-7: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rjes su lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-9: rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza' shing gi rab kun nas rnam par brgyan pa gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-11: bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-12: rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba spel legs pas yongs su brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-13: rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi phreng ba'i me tog srad bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'phrul bas gzhi rgyas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153a-14: rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-0: shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su @153b gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-1: spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-2: rin po che'i phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-3: rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang ba rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-4: rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-5: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing spa la rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-6: yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing mdzes par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-7: sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las; lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-8: sa'i gzhi mthon dman med par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-9: rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad par rgyun du 'byung zhing 'phyang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-10: bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-11: nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:153b-12: khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i bde dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-0: gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcug gdung rin po che rnam par snang @154a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-2: rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-3: rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-4: rin po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-5: rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-6: lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-7: gser gyi bye mas kun tu gram pa; gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-8: phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-9: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-15: ku na la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-16: rin po che'i ta la'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-17: gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-18: rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-19: steng nas rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-20: rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ra bas yongs su bskor ba; rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-21: rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-22: lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam gyis mtha' 'khor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154a-23: rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i padmos yongs su khyab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-0: rin po che'i padmo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa @154b ste; bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-1: nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-2: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-3: gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i ra bas bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-4: rin po che'i rgyal po mi pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-5: rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i ngad kun tu ldang ba; rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-6: dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs der stan grangs med cing tshad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-8: nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-9: nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-10: nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-11: nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-12: nor bu rin po che seng ge'i shing thags padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:154b-13: nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-0: nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i padmo'i snying po can @155a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-1: dang; nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-2: nor bu rin po che 'od kyi rgyan gyi padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-3: nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i padmo'i snying po can dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-4: nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i padmo'i snying po can dag bshams shing bting ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-5: gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-6: rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-7: kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yod du 'ong ba dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-8: bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-9: 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-11: me tog gi bla re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-14: nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-17: rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-18: glang po'i shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-19: nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155a-20: de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-0: @155b rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-1: 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-2: rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-3: rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang; mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-4: nor bu rin po che bee d'urya sngon po'i dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-5: seng ge'i 'khri shing gi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-6: nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-7: spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-8: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-9: rin po che'i phreng ba'i dra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-10: de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-11: snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-12: 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-13: nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-14: nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-15: nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-16: nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-17: nor bu rin po che padmo'i snying po'i snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-18: nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-19: nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-20: nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-21: nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po'i snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:155b-22: glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-0: de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang @156a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-1: ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-2: bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-3: dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang lda ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched pas rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-4: lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-5: lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa /
