K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-6: lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-7: 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-8: lha mi'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pos rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcus chos mnyan pas sgom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-10: de na dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156a-11: lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-0: lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin @156b gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-1: rna cha rin po che mthon thing dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-2: mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-3: nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-4: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-5: lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba; srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu btud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-7: dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-9: tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-11: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-15: dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-17: mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-19: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-25: grul bum mam; klu'i dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-27: lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:156b-29: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-9: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-10: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-13: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-15: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-16: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-17: 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang tshangs pa chen po'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-19: tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-21: dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-23: mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag nad sna tshogs shig gis btab pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-24: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-25: lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-26: las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-27: de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur; sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-28: lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157a-29: sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par shigs par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-0: @157b rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa yang khong du chud par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-1: rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-2: dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-4: gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-6: smon lam gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-7: spyod pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-8: yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-9: sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-10: lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-11: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-12: dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der stong ste phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:157b-13: dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-0: dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor @158a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-4: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-5: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-7: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-12: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-15: kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-16: bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-18: kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-20: rim gror byas pa don yod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-21: gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-22: rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-24: kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-25: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158a-26: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-0: kho mo @158b mthong btsam gyis ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-1: sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-3: kho mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-4: gdan rin po che'i khri la bzhugs nas chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-5: shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-7: de lta bas na kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-8: chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-9: byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-11: kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-14: sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-16: kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:158b-18: 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-1: gyi gnas rjes su dran te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-3: kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos mchod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-6: de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med ba zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-7: de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo yang kho mos bzung ngo; ;de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-9: de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-10: de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-11: de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-12: de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-13: de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-14: de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-15: de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159a-16: de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:159b-0: gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa @159b dang; bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab chags su bsams te dran par byas na; gang kho mos rim gror byas te bsnyen bkur ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:160a-5: gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:160a-11: mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang; mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:160a-13: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis tshig gcig brjod kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:160a-14: 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:160a-16: lus rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:168a-5: de lta bas na kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:168b-7: bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:168b-15: yul chu ba gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:168b-17: de'i gan du song la dris shig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:168b-18: des rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-2: dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-3: dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-4: phyag 'tshal nas ngo mchi mas gang bar ngus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-5: byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba dkon par rjes su bsdam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-7: skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-10: skal ba mnyam pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-11: byang chub tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gzhog pa dkon par rjes su bsdam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-12: mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjes su bsdam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169a-13: sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su bsam @169b pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-1: dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-2: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-6: sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag po rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa; chos kyi gter 'thob par bya la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-7: smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-8: chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa; chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-9: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-10: chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par rnam par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-11: rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches mi choms pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-12: bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-13: mthar gyis yul chu ba gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:169b-14: drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-2: dge ba sbyang ba'i gnas shing dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-3: shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-4: lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas 'grigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-5: rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-6: rtag tu shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing tog gi shing dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-7: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-8: nor bu rin po che'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-9: tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-10: aa ga ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-11: phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-12: n+ya gro da'i shing dbyibs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-13: 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog smin pa 'brul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-14: me tog gi tshal padmo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-15: autpa la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-16: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-18: drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing; tsan dan gyi yal gshin tu 'brel ba'i bya skyibs shig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170a-19: thor tshugs kyi cod pan can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-0: shing shun gyi smad g-yogs @170b can; rtsva'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-1: mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der stong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-2: phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-7: stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du skyel bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-9: stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-11: nyam nyes med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-13: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su ston pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:170b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-0: g-yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed @171a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-1: pas; thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-2: byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis sim pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-4: snying rje chen po yongs su bskyed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-6: chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-9: lus thams cad kyis phab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-11: drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-13: yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-15: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-16: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-17: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171a-20: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-2: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-3: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-4: bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-7: rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-8: sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la mgron du gnyer to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-10: 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-11: bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-12: ye shes rgya mtsho mngon du gyur pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-14: chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-15: ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-16: snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-17: chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-18: ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-19: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-20: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-21: de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:171b-22: me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-2: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la gtor to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-6: rab tu btud de phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-7: g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-9: 'di ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-10: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-11: byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-12: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-13: mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-14: sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skem par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-15: sred pa'i 'ching ba gcod par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-16: sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-17: ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-18: bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig rten yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-19: ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs su ston par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-20: ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-21: chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-22: 'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-23: mi mnyam pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172a-24: de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-0: byis pa de dag la 'di skad @172b ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-2: gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-4: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-5: rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-10: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-11: de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-12: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-14: kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-17: de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-18: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mgo la byugs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-19: lag pa g-yas pas bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-20: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g-yas pas bzung ma thag tu de'i mod la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:172b-21: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-0: @173a *// de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-1: bdag nyid 'dug pa shes par gyur to; ;sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-2: rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-3: de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-4: rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-6: de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-7: phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan pa nyan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-9: chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la rab ba pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173a-11: mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs so; ;sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-0: sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba @173b bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-1: sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-2: sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-3: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-4: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-5: ting nge 'dzin ye shes mi zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-7: phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-8: gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-11: gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po yul du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-12: ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-13: ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:173b-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-1: la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-2: la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-3: la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-4: la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-5: la lar ni lo gcig lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-6: la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-7: la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-8: la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-9: la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-10: la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa snyam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174a-11: la lar ni lo byed ba stong lon pa snyam /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174b-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174b-14: rigs kyi bu kho bos ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174b-17: dus thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu 'god pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:174b-21: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-2: ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-3: sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang mthun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-4: 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-6: smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-7: zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-8: ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes 'brang bar bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-10: rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-11: rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-12: rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-13: lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-14: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-15: ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bstan par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-18: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175a-19: de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-0: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa @175b la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-1: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-2: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-3: mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-4: drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-6: lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-8: drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-9: bam po dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-12: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-15: dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:175b-16: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-0: 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes @176a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-1: snang ba thob pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-3: dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-4: mnyam pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-5: rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-8: stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-9: chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mos pas ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa rnam par spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon @176b du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-1: sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-6: yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa rnam par gdags pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-9: sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-10: sems can rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-12: gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-15: dus mtha' yas pa'i ming gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:176b-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya ba byed cing /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-2: bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der phyin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-3: de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-4: de'i phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri rab tsam du che ba bus pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-5: ri shin tu mtho ba'i g-yang sa'i lam gyi rgyud spu gri'i sos gshibs pas 'khod par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-10: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-12: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-15: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177a-21: song la spu gri'i so dang ra ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-0: des khyod @177b kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes nas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-4: khom pa phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-5: sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-6: dbang po nyams su med pa yang shin tu dkon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shin tu dkon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-8: skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang shin tu dkon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-9: yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dkon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-10: yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pas legs par sdud pa yang shin tu dkon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-11: yang dag par 'tsho bar bya ba yang shin tu dkon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-12: mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyen ba'i chos la nan tan byed pa yang shin tu dkon na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-13: de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-14: de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam zhig ma yin nam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-15: bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-16: bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-17: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar brdzus pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-18: byang chub sems dpa' la mi gcags pa byed pa zhig ma yin grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-19: bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:177b-20: bdag lam gol ba ngan par gzhug par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-1: gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la gegs byed pa zhig ma yin grang snyam nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-2: de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa'i tshe /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-6: de lta bu'i sems mi brtan par ma byed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-9: ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-11: brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-12: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-14: dra ba thams cad gtub pa la brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-15: nyon mongs pa'i lcag lcig thams cad zad par bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-16: mi khom mi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-17: sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g-yang sa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-18: 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-19: dus gsum gyi mun pa bsal pa la mngon par brtson pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-20: chos thams cad kyi 'od zer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-22: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178a-23: tshangs pa ji snyed cig mkhan po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-0: 'jig rten thams cad @178b kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-1: sems pa blta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa de dag thams cad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-3: brtul zhugs kyi thugs dam gyi mthus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-4: rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-5: de dag bsam gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong ba med pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-9: drag shul kyi dka' thub dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-10: brtul zhugs kyi sa zil gyis mnan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-11: lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-12: nga rgyal dang; rlom sems thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-13: 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-14: snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-15: byang chub kyi bsam pa brtan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-16: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-18: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-19: thams cad du grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-20: bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-21: bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:178b-22: lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gtor te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-1: dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-2: 'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-3: kho bo cag gi khyim dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-5: rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-6: de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang so so'i gnas gnas na bag dga' ba med pas 'khor dang bcas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-8: kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-9: 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la ci nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-10: rang rang gi sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-12: de lta de ltar chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-13: dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcus kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-14: lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mngon par gtor te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-17: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-18: kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-19: de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-21: bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-22: 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179a-23: nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-0: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba la dbang @179b bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-1: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-2: snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-3: yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-4: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshe la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-5: rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-6: steng gi bar snang la 'khod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-7: lha rdzas kyi glu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs bsgrags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-8: mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-10: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-11: me'i phung po 'di las de dang 'dra ba'i 'od byung zhing kho bo cag gi gzhal med khang 'di dag rnam par dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-16: rnam par dag cing gsal la 'od shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-17: de bas na bdag cag kyang lha'i bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-18: lha mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas par /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-19: 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-20: 'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba med pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-21: lus dang sems sim par gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:179b-22: 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-0: bdag cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la sems rnam par @180a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-1: dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-2: sems kyi 'od dang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-3: sems shin tu dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-4: sems las su rung bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-5: sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-6: stobs bcu'i ye shes 'thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-7: chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-8: sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-11: rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-12: lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-13: steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-14: spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-17: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-18: bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-19: de ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-20: bdag cag phyin pa rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180a-21: 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-0: chog shes @180b pa'i sems su bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-2: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-4: rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-5: lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba'i char mngon par phab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-8: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-9: bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga' ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-10: de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-12: 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-14: lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu so so nas nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang; lha'i bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-15: lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-18: me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-21: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-22: bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:180b-23: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-2: lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-3: gam yo na glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-4: de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-5: bdag cag der phyin nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-6: 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang pa'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-7: 'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-8: mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-10: bag med pa thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-11: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-13: gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang g-yo bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-14: des bdag cag gshigs pas sems skyo bar gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su smon lam mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-16: klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-18: bsnyen dga' bo la sogs pa klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing; dus dang mthun pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181a-19: klu'i bu mos blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-0: lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char @181b mngon par phab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-3: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-4: me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste; des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-6: nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-7: khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-8: lus sim par byas nas yid shin tu mos par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-9: de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-10: 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-11: 'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-12: sgrib pa'i las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-15: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-16: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-17: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la mchod pa byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-20: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:181b-21: kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-0: grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan @182a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-2: de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tsho ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-3: kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gis zil gyis non pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-4: rang rang gi gnas de dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-5: de dag na dga' ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-6: de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-8: bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-9: 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas shing bde bas khyab par mdzad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-10: de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-11: 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-14: lus srul po mang po byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-15: dri za'i dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-18: kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-19: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung bar mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-20: me'i phung po 'di las 'od byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-21: bdag cag gi gnas snang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-22: de ltar bdag cag 'od des phog ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182a-23: bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-0: bdag @182b cag drung du phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-1: bdag cag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-2: lha ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-3: nam mkha' la pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga btsugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-4: thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces 'dzer to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-6: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-7: kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu g-yo bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-8: bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-10: dregs pa thams cad brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi zil gyis non te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-12: der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-13: bdag cag la g-yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-14: chos zab mo'i bzod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-15: mi g-yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-16: stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-17: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:182b-18: bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-1: su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-2: me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-3: bdag cag gis gnas snang bar byas nas yongs su g-yo bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-4: des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-5: skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-6: 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-7: byams pa chen po la yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-8: snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-9: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-10: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la yang yongs su sbyor ba mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-11: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-12: shes rab dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-13: rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su smin par bya ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba la yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-14: mi'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183a-17: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-0: kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bus lda ldir brgyus @183b pa'i sil snyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-3: khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-5: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-6: byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-8: byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-10: byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dka' ba yongs su gtong ba byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-12: byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-15: byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-17: byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:183b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes @184a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-1: bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ni che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-4: phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-5: rigs kyi bu; 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtsva dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-9: 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blags pa'i mur thug par ni rung yang srid kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-14: khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-16: rna lam du grag pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-17: de ltar bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang; spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184a-21: mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde ba skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-0: de ltar bdag cag phyin par @184b gyur nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-1: 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-3: 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-4: kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-5: yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-6: 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-7: me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-8: 'od des mar na mnar med pa yan chad du sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-9: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rtse zil bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-10: 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi mig lam du snang bar bstan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-11: de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar skyes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-12: de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'di'i mdzad pa la drin du gzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-13: 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:184b-15: der bdag cag phyin nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-0: 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang sems can tshad med pa rnams @185a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-1: byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-2: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas dga' rangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-4: tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-5: bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed; bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-8: de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-9: de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-10: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang mthun byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-12: dran pa nye bar bzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-13: de'i phyir de yi don rnams thams cad mthun par 'grub par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-14: mthun pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-15: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-16: ri g-yang sa'i lam spu gri'i so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-17: me'i phung po chen po der mchongs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185a-18: de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin @185b tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-1: me des reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-4: me'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-5: ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-8: kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-12: kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-14: lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-15: ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-16: sems la thub pa med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-17: sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-18: yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-19: brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-20: sbyor ba lhod pa med pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-21: 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-22: brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:185b-23: phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-0: yon tan brjod par nus re skan @186a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-2: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-3: grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-4: de na rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams ma zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-5: bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-7: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-8: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-10: bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-11: bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-13: bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-14: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-16: theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-17: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-19: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar spro ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-20: chos kyi rim gro la rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-21: chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186a-22: yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-0: ye shes kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i yul @186b dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-1: dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-2: nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-3: mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par gdon mi za ba thob pa; chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-4: bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-5: chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-8: sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-9: zhing la mngon par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-10: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-12: sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-13: sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-14: sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-15: gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba de mthar gyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:186b-16: bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongs su rmed rmed pa las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-0: rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams @187a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-1: ma; 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-2: khri tsan dan sprul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-3: gser gyi lcags bod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-4: lha rdzas kyi stan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to zhes thos nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-5: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-6: rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-7: rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo khang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-8: bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-9: des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-10: srog chags stong phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-11: srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-13: da gang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-15: ded ni bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-17: 'dir ni su 'gro yang dag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-18: de yang nang du phyin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-19: de ltar phyin te bltas na; khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-20: gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-21: bee d'urya'i ka ba bkye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-22: rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187a-23: 'dzam bu chu klung gi lhun dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bris pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-0: rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu spa bar @187b byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-1: nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-2: rin po che'i shing rta grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-3: gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan par 'dug par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-4: bu mo byams ma de yang mig dkar nag 'byes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-6: mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-7: des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-8: lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-9: mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-13: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-16: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-17: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-19: rigs kyi bu; kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig ces nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-20: des kun tu yul te bltas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:187b-23: me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-3: nor bu rin po che re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-4: gser gyi dril bu re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-5: rin po che'i shing re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-6: ba sbu'i bu ga re re dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-7: rin po che'i sen mo do re re dag las kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-8: chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-9: thog ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-10: spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-12: mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-13: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-14: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-15: dmigs pa de dag re re las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-16: ji lta ba de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-19: chus yongs su gang ba'i mtsho dang zhing rnyog pa med pa la rnam par gsal ba la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-21: skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang ngo; ;de bzhin du khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po 'di dmigs pa re re las kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-22: chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-23: de ni bu mo byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188a-24: des de ltar rnam par bltas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188b-0: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma @188b de yongs su bzung ste thal mo sbyar nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:188b-1: bu mo byams ma'i gdong du bltas pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-9: thal gong shin tu rgyas pa /
