K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-11: lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-13: rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-15: rkang pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-18: pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-19: byin pa ri dvags ae na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-21: rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-23: mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-24: ba spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su gyen du 'khyil ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-25: shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-27: dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-28: mig mi 'gebs shing mi rgod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-29: dran pa nye bar gnas pa; ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar rtsva dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-32: shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:192b-34: ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-1: pa; dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sprin gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-5: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-6: ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-7: sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-8: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-9: gdul ba'i bsam pa rgyun mi 'chad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-10: snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-12: sems can thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-14: 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'chag pa la zhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-15: drag dal med cing pad ral med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-17: gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-30: mi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-31: dge slong blta na mdzes pa de 'chag pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193a-32: phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-0: rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha rnams rin po che'i pad mos gom pa @193b 'dor ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-1: yongs su blang ba byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-2: me'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad mi shes pa rnams kyang mun pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-3: rab rib rnam par sel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-4: 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lha rnams kyang me tog mang po char mngon par 'bebs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-5: sa'i lha mi g-yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang po ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-6: nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su brgyan pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-7: rgya mtsho'i lha dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-8: ri rab gyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-9: rlung gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang spos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-11: me tog 'thor ba'i rlung rab tu 'gyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-12: mtshan mo'i lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa rnams kyang lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-13: nyin mo'i lha rtag tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can rnams kyang nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-14: snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-15: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-16: dge slong blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-17: dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:193b-18: spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-0: dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la @194a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-2: legs par phyis nas mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-3: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-5: bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-7: 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-8: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-12: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-15: kho bo ni tshes btab na dar la bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-16: rab tu byung bas btab na gsar du zhugs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-18: kho bos ni tshe de 'dra ba gcig gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gangg'a sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi drung du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-20: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du nyin zhag gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-21: la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-22: la lar ni zla ba phyed du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-23: la lar ni zla ba gcig tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-24: la lar ni lo gcig tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-26: la lar ni lo stong du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-27: la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-28: la lar ni lo bye bar /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194a-29: la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-0: la lar ni lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod @194b du med par /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-1: la lar ni bskal pa bar mar /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-2: la lar ni bskal pa phyed du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-3: la lar ni bskal par bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-4: bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-5: bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las chos bstan pa thos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-7: rjes su bstan pa yang dag par blangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-8: smon lam gyi rgyan yongs su sbyangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-9: yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-10: spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-11: pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-12: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-13: de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su gzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-14: de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-15: de dag gi bstan pa yang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-16: kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-17: smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-18: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:194b-19: kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-0: @195a *// spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-1: kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-2: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-4: kho bo 'chag sa 'di na 'chags pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-5: phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mngon du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-7: smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'da' zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-8: yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-9: sems kyi skad cig gcig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195a-10: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-0: smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur ro; ;sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa dag kyang snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon @195b lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-1: bsnyen bkur ba dang; rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-2: sems bskyed pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rnams kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-3: chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-4: smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis chos kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa la mngon par 'bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-5: sems bskyed pa gcig la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro; ;sems bskyed pa gcig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-7: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gcig tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:195b-8: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-1: dbang po rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-2: dran pa'i mthar phyin pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-3: dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-4: sems bskyed pa gcig la dus kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-5: sems can zad mi shes pa zad par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-6: sems bskyed pa gcig la dus rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-7: dus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa'i ye shes snang ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-12: kho bos byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196a-14: srog gi dbang po la rgyun chad pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-0: ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi @196b bar 'gyur ba med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-1: mi shigs mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-2: sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa rgyu'i chos mnyam pa'i yan lag dang nying lag tu ldan pa'i lus can; 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-3: rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-4: 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-7: chu zheng yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-11: mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-12: rdo rje ltar sra zhing khor yug ltar thub pa med pa'i lus can; bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-13: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-14: 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par dmigs pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-15: sgo thams cad du rnam par dmigs shing thos par 'gyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-16: 'gro ba thams cad kyis ngor blta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-17: chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-18: phyogs kun du rnam par snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-19: sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor bas blta na mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-20: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu 'joms pas shin tu dpa' bar snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:196b-21: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i rgyu mthun pa las byung bas blta na dga' ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-0: 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog au dum @197a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-1: w'a ra lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-2: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-5: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-6: yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-7: grong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-8: de na khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-10: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-11: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-12: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-14: nan tan rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang bas sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-18: brgal thag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa brtan pas kun tu gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-21: yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su mi ngoms pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197a-24: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam mngon du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-0: 'gro ba thams @197b cad kyi kha lo sgyur bas yongs su sdud par bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-1: 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha'i dgon pa pa chen po las bzla bar 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-2: dge ba'i gshes gnyen blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-4: bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi ngoms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-5: chos kyi rim gro tshad med pa bskyed pa dang ldan pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-6: dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-7: dge slong blta na sdug pa la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-9: dge slong blta na sdug pa'i drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-10: bam po dgu bcu rtsa bzhi pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-11: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge slong blta na sdug pa de'i gdams ngag rjes su zlos shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-16: so sor rnam par sgom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-18: yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-20: mngon par 'jug pa bya ba dang; bkur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-21: khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-22: yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-23: yang dang yang bzlas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-24: shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:197b-27: rjes su rnam par lta bar byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-0: dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong @198a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-1: khyer sgo bzang po gang na ba der phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-2: khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug yongs su tshol tshol ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-3: de'i steng gi bar snang las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-7: dri za rnams kyis bos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-9: khye'u'i dbang po'i dbang phyug ni chu klung gi chu 'dus dang nye ba zhig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-10: byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-11: bye ma la rtse bas rtse zhing 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-12: zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang grong khyer sgo bzang po dang nye ba'i chu klung gi chu 'dus gang na ba der song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-14: des khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-15: bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-16: mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ga na ba der song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-17: khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-18: khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-19: khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-22: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-23: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-24: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198a-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-0: rjes su bstan @198b pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-2: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-3: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-6: kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-11: bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-13: kho bos ni 'jig rten na yi ge dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-18: shol thabs shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-19: bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-24: 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-28: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-29: dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-30: gnas rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-34: khang pa brtsegs pa'i tshad shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-36: shing rta sbyar ba'i tshul sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-39: mtshan ma shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-42: rnam par spyad par sbyar ba'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:198b-43: sems can gyi yan lag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-3: rnam par spyad pa shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-5: ngan song gi las kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i tshul shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-6: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-7: tshogs mchod pa shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-9: ngan song gi tshogs shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-15: sbyor ba'i rgyud shes par bya ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-16: de dag la sems can yongs su gzung bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-17: rab tu dgod par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-18: yongs su gzhog par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-24: yongs su sgrub par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-25: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-26: gsal bar bstan par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-30: rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-31: dri ma med par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-32: shin tu dag par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-33: 'od gsal zhing dang bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-34: shin tu yangs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-36: kho bos byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi tshul shes pa de gang zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-37: brgya stong phrag brgya na bye ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199a-38: bye ba bye ba na khod khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-0: khod @199b khod khod khod na tha da dgu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-1: thad dgu thad dgu na khrig khrig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-2: khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-3: thams thams thams thams na myad myid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-4: myad myid myad myid na gang ya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-5: gang ya gang ya na ban bun no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-6: ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-7: phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-8: lcag lcig lcag lcig na byang bying ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-9: byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-10: chem chem chem chem na phyal phyol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-11: phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-12: khyud khyud khyud khyud na zar zer ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-13: zar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-14: khrib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-15: ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-16: cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-17: khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-18: nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-19: sang sang sang sang na brgyud yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-20: brgyud yas brgyud yas na btang yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-21: btang yas btang yas na bkra yar ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-22: bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-23: gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-24: mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-25: lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-26: yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-27: khral khrul khral khrul na thud thud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-28: thud thud thud thud na bsam phyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-29: bsam phyod bsam phyod na brang breng ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-30: brang breng brang breng na bgrod yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-31: bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsngo yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:199b-32: bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-0: @200a *// zang yag zang yag na 'phro bkye'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-2: rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyo na yong tan no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-3: yong tan yong tan na brug g-yos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-4: brug g-yos brug g-yos na sang yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-5: sang yal sang yal na 'thing yug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-7: yid 'phyo yid 'phyo na nab neb bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-8: nab neb nab neb na khrig thams so; ;khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-9: yal yal yal yal na bgrad yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-10: bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-11: thug yal thug yal na shang shang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-12: shang shang shang shang na yag yag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-13: yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-14: tham thim tham thim na rlom bsnyal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-15: rlom bsnyal rlom bsnyal na gzhal 'phyos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-16: gzhal 'phyos gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-17: gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-18: gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-19: gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-20: gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-21: gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-22: gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-23: gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal phul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-24: gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal zhi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-25: gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200a-27: nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-0: phyag @200b phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-1: zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-2: sal sal sal sal na g-yo ldeg go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-3: g-yo ldeg g-yo ldeg na phan phun no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-4: phan phun phan phun na brnang ya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-5: brnang ya brnang ya na rem 'drol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-6: rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-7: rdzi ngad rdzi ngad na rdzi rdul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-8: rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-9: phun yol phun yol na ngad ngad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-10: ngad ngad ngad ngad na bgrang brtsi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-11: bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsi na zab bgrang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-12: zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-13: dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-14: gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug phyad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-15: khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'ol phyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-16: 'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-17: gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-18: gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yas so; ;bgrang yas bgrang yas na byim 'phyo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-20: ya me ya me na bsnyal yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-21: bsnyal yas bsnyal yas na ldab ldeb bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-22: ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na 'ban chad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-23: 'ban chad 'ban chad na phang phung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-24: phang phung phang phung na khye'u tsang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-25: khye'u tsang khye'u tsang na zhung zung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-26: zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-27: mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rdul lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-28: mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-29: yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:200b-30: bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-2: bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-3: lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-4: ljab ljib ljab ljib na mi brtsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-5: mi brtsal mi brtsal na 'byams yas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-7: nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-8: smos yal smos yal na bkra chal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-9: bkra chal bkra chal na lo rgyas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-10: lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-11: 'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gam gum mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-12: gam gum gam gum na la lo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-13: la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-14: bgrang 'phyos bgrang 'phyos na bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-15: 'grang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-17: dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-18: dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-20: yal phyod yal phyod na yal phyod la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-21: yal phyod la bsgres pa yal phyod la bsgres pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-22: mu yal lo; ;mu yal mu yal na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-24: mu yal la bsgres pa mu yal la bsgres pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-28: bgrang yol la 'gres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201a-32: mi 'jal la bsgres pa mi 'jal la bsgres na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-2: bsam phyod la bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-5: dpag thag go; dpag thag dpag thag na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-7: dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-9: brjod du med pa brjod du med pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-10: brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-11: brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du med pa la bsgres na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-12: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-13: de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-15: bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa 'di snyed cig yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-16: zhes rab tu phye nas bgrang brtsis te grangs su bcad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-17: des bye ma'i phung po de rtsis kyi brdar bstan pas shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa kun na'ang yod do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:201b-23: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-4: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-6: steng gi phyogs su'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-11: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing brtsi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-13: ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-14: phyogs bcu'i bskal pa'i ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-15: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-16: chos kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-17: sems can gyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang; las kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-0: phyogs bcu na ming @202b du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-2: phyogs bcu na ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-6: kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-7: chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-8: dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-9: sems can thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-10: chos kyi phung po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-13: chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-20: smon lam bshad par bya ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-21: spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-22: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-23: yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:202b-25: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-1: shes snang ba khod du chud par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-4: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-5: grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-6: de na dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-7: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-8: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g-yos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-10: dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-11: rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-12: ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-13: 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-15: sangs rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-16: chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-17: thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rigs rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-18: dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas gyi yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-19: bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-20: ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la dbang bsgyur ba khams gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcod pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203a-21: khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-0: khye'u @203b dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-2: khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-3: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-5: gangs chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms mi shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-7: dge ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang po'i myu gu 'thon cing skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gi 'od zer kyi dra bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-9: lus dang sems shin tu tshim par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-10: dpyid kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i ri dvags kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-11: bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang ldan pa'i pad mo'i mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-12: sems kyi me tog punda ri ka kha bye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:203b-13: rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-0: 'dzam bu'i shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar @204a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-1: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-2: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-3: klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i rnang shin tu che ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-4: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyis brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma med pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-5: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-6: lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis mi non la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-7: gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-8: mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa gang na ba der phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-9: dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba yongs su tshol tshol ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-10: de la skye bo mang pos bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-12: dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-13: grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-14: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i gnas gang ba der song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204a-15: thal mo sbyar nas sgo khang na sdod sdod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-0: @204b des dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-1: phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-2: rin po che tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-3: bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-4: de khyim der song ste kun tu bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-5: dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-6: na chung shin tu gzhon la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-7: thog ma dar la bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-8: gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-9: kha dog dam pa pri ya pa shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-13: smad g-yogs dkar po bgos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-14: rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-16: byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par de'i lus sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-19: kha dog gis zil gyis mngon pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-21: sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-22: dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-23: rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-26: mi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:204b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-0: @205a *// mdun du phru ba gcig cig bzhag pa las kha zas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-3: rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci'ang mi snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-4: bud med stong phrag bcu tsam zhig mdun na 'dug par mthong na'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-5: de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-6: lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-7: lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-8: lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-9: lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-10: lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shis pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-11: lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-12: lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyis shin tu klubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-13: lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-14: lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-16: nges ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing mdun na 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-20: ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-26: de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang pas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-27: grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-28: sems can gang gis dri de tshor bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205a-29: shar gnyer med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-0: phrag dog @205b dang; 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-1: sgyu dang g-yo med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-3: khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-5: gzengs mtho ba med pa'i sems dang; byams pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-7: sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-8: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba med pa'i sems su gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-9: gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-11: dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-12: gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-14: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-15: dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te; dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-16: mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-18: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-19: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-20: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:205b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-2: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-8: kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-9: kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du tshod ma sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-12: dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-13: rigs kyi bu; de ltar kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya'ang yongs su tshim par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-15: sems can brgya phrag stong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-17: sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-18: sems can bye ba phrag stong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-19: sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-20: sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-21: sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-22: mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-23: ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-24: yongs su stob par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-25: yongs su dga' bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-26: yongs su mgu bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-27: yongs su spro bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206a-28: shin tu tshim par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206b-0: 'on kyang phru ba @206b 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206b-5: sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:206b-9: gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216a-14: grong rdal tha dad pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216a-20: sems can gyi rigs tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216a-21: sems can rnam pa mi mthun pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216a-22: lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216a-24: ming du bya ba tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216a-25: sems can skye mched rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216a-27: bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba gtsang ba 'dod pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-2: lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-9: kham gyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-10: mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad rnam par spyod pa dag las kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-11: kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-14: 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slong mo 'debs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-18: de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-19: slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-20: nam mkha' la bltas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-21: nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-22: btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-23: ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-24: kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-25: dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:216b-26: lag mthil du 'ongs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-0: des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slong mo pa mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod @217a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-3: yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-4: ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-5: rab tu dga' bar byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-6: shin tu tshim par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-7: dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-8: nyams shin tu bde bar byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-9: yid rab tu dga' bar byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-10: de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-12: de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-13: ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-15: phongs pa thams cad 'byung mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-16: skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-17: chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-18: bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-19: dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-21: dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-22: thub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217a-23: bla na med pa'i kha zas yongs su shis pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-0: bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs @217b mi zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'ang yongs su brjod pa byas te chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-1: de kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-6: spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-7: des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-8: btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-9: yid shin tu dga' ba byed pa de dag gis tshim par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-10: de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-12: des ro'i mchog don du gnyer zhing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs mngar ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-17: bska ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-18: de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-19: des bzhon pa don du gnyer zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-20: phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bstud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:217b-21: de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-0: des gos don du gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas @218a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-1: 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-2: nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-3: nam mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-9: shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-11: kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-13: des de dag gi slong mo pa de dag la yongs su bstud nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-15: khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-16: mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-17: de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-18: ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slong mo pa rnams la bstud byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-19: ci rigs su chos bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-20: de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-21: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-23: kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-24: kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yo byad la dbang thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218a-25: rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par byas @218b shing; sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-2: de bzhin du rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-3: cod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-4: khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-5: na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-6: lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-8: glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-9: ma tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-10: spos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-18: ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-19: rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sprin gyi char dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-21: sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-22: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-23: gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-25: rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:218b-28: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-0: @219a *// grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-1: de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-2: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-3: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-4: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-5: mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-6: khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-7: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rag lus par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems rgyun mi 'chad par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang tshig mnyan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dang pa'i dbang po la bsam pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-14: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis btams te btang bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219a-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten cing bkur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-0: rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i sems @219b kyis khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-1: khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-3: khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-4: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-5: bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-6: bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang dag par blta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-7: bsod nams kyi ri bo de ni yongs su sbyong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-8: bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-9: bsod nams kyi mdzod de ni rnam par 'byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-10: bsod nams kyi gter de la ni shin tu blta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-11: bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su spyod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-12: bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-13: bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongs su bskyed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-14: bsod nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-15: mthar gyis grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-16: chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud yongs su tshol tshol ba las; tshong 'dus kyi srang zhing na 'dug pa mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-17: des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-18: g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-19: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:219b-21: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-0: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod @220a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-1: pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-2: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-4: lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man ngag legs par mi stsal tam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-5: de nas chos kyi tshong don rin chen gtsug phud kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-6: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi lag nas bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-7: rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-8: khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-10: kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-11: des bltas na khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-12: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-13: yangs shing mtho la dngul gyis ra bas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-14: shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs par brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-15: bee d'urya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-16: mu sa ra gal pa'i ka ba bkye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-17: mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shin tu bshams pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-18: nor bu rin po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-19: nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-20: gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pas kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220a-21: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-0: aasma gar bha las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil pas gang ba dang @220b ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-1: rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-5: sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-6: des khyim de'i nang du phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-8: rim khang tha ma'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-10: btung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-11: rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-12: gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-13: rim khang gsum pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-14: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-15: rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-16: btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-17: bud med rin po che sa chen po'i steng na bzang du bya ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-18: rim khang lnga pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-19: sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i dga' ba la mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-21: bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-22: gtsug lag thams cad mngon par sgrub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-24: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-25: ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-26: ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-27: ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:220b-28: rim khang drug pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-0: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rab tu @221a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-2: shes rab shin tu zab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-3: rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-6: snying po mang pos sgo kun nas 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-7: bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul can mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-8: chos yang dag par 'gro ba la rnam par 'phrul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-10: rab tu gsal bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par 'gro ba byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-12: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi g-yo ba'i gling zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-18: rjes su 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i @221b snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms thob pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la dmigs pas rim pas mi dmigs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-7: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par bgro ba byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-9: rgyan brjod du med pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-10: rim khang bdun pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-12: thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-14: rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:221b-15: byang chub sems dpa' ma nyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-1: khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-2: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-3: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku la yang dag par gzhol ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-7: rim khang dgu pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-8: byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-9: rim khang bcu pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-14: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-16: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-17: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-18: sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang bcas par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-19: mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222a-21: khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mnga' na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-0: @222b phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-1: ji lta bu zhig tu sbyang ba mdzad mdzad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskrun bskrun /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-6: 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol gcig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs zhes bya bar /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od zer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-11: bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-12: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la sogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-15: nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-16: ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la sogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-17: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos spyan drangs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-18: bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-20: tshong 'dus kyi srang nas bzhud pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:222b-21: kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-0: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sil @223a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-2: rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-3: spos kyi ri lu gcig gcig kyang bsregs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-5: spos kyi ri lu gcig po de de ltar bsregs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-6: zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-7: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su khebs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-8: spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-10: dus gsum du dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-12: sgrib pa thams cad mi mnga' ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-13: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su byang ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad med pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-17: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223a-18: spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de las; sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-0: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba @223b de yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-1: kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-3: 'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-4: dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-7: kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-8: smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-9: kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po che tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-10: sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang tha mi dad pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-11: tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par 'dzin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-12: tha mi dad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-13: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-14: ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad tha mi dad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun gcig tu gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad cing rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-17: dus gsum tha mi dad pas mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-18: bskal pa thams cad tha mi dad par yongs su gnas pas mi skyo ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:223b-19: kun tu lta ba tha mi dad pa'i yul gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-4: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul sba'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-5: de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-6: tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-7: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang; ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-8: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-9: chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-10: chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-11: bam po dgu bcu lnga pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-12: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-13: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-15: chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brlan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyi rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po @224b mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-4: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis thub pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyal mtshan can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-7: mthar gyis yul sba'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-8: grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-10: yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-13: mi mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-15: ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-16: thub pa med pa'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag ma brjed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-17: rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu bsgos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-18: sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-19: bag med pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:224b-20: mig dang rna ba g-yeng ba med par kun tu tshol tshol nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-2: grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong 'dus kyi rdul stong phrag bcu'i gnas su gyur pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-3: shin tu bzang po grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-4: ra ba brtan pas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-6: bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-7: de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-8: spos 'tshong gi khyams shig na 'dug pa mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-9: spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-10: spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-11: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-13: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-14: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-15: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-18: de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-21: kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-23: mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-24: bad kan las gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-26: gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225a-27: mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-3: ro langs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-5: chus bskyod pa las gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-7: 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-8: nad de dag thams cad zhi bar bya ba'ang shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-9: 'di ltar snum par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-20: 'byung po'i gdon med par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-26: nyam bstod pa'ang rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-28: phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:225b-29: nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:226b-0: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags @226b shing mtshan dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:226b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:227b-7: sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:227b-13: kho bo ni nam de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:228a-1: thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlob pa byed do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:228b-16: de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gi /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:229b-7: de mthar gyis ljongs nas ljongs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:229b-9: yul nas yul du tshol zhing /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:229b-28: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par zhi bar mdzad do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:229b-31: zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do //
