K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230a-2: chags sems dang ni mi 'dre bar mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230a-3: gnod sems dang ni rgyang sring ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230a-4: log par lta ba ni 'dre ba med par mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230a-5: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin na /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230a-14: gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyis shin tu bdug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230a-15: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230a-16: rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag rnam par bres pas brgyan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230a-19: de ni gzhon zhing dar la bab pa gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-4: mig dkar nag 'byes shing ring la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-5: rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-6: sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-7: ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-8: mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-9: so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-10: 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-12: smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-13: mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-14: rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-15: zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing bzang pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-16: mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa; snying ga dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-17: ro stod seng ge'i stod ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-18: thal gong shin tu rgyas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-19: dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-21: dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-23: rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-25: rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-28: pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-29: byin pa ri dvags ae na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-31: rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:230b-33: mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-0: @231a *// ba spu re re nas g-yas phyogs gyen du 'khyil ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-1: shing n+ya gro ha'i [*ta'i?] rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-2: lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-3: mgo la nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-4: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa'i dpral ba'i rgyan zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-5: rna ba las rin po che aindra n'i la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-6: nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa'i se mo do'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-7: dri ma med pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-8: lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i dpung rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-9: gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-10: rin po che'i gdugs chen po rin po che'i bee d'urya dri ma med pa'i yu ba can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-11: rin po che shar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-12: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-13: nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-14: rin po che'i dril bu'i phreng ba las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-15: nor bu rin po che'i 'od phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-16: rgyal po'i gzi brjid dang dbang chen po la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-17: srid la gzhan gyi 'khor gyis gco ba med pa; dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231a-18: de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa la brtson /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-1: de'i mdun na chad pas gcod pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma lta bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-4: gtum zhing mi bzad la 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-7: gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-13: mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-15: lus dang bzhin gyi dbyibs mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-17: mi snyan cing brlang la sdang ba'i sgra drag po 'byin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-18: gzi blta bar dka' ba 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-19: srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gems par byed pa de lta bu dag chad pas gcad par 'os pa'i sems can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-20: de na srog chags rku ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-22: sems can gyi longs spyod chud gson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:231b-28: grong du chom po byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-0: sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las mi bzad pa byed pa @232a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-1: brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-2: rgyal po me'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-3: de dag la'ang rgyal po mes ci rigs par chad pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-4: des de na rgyal po mes bsgo zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-5: la la ni rkang lag bcad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-6: la la ni rna ba dang sna bcad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-8: la la ni yan lag dang nying lag dang mgo bcad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-9: la la ni lus thams cad mes btang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-10: la la ni ba tsha'i chu khol mas lus la gtor cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-11: pags pa brnyil ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i chad pa sna tshogs du ma mi bzad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-15: srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-16: gsad pa'i sa de na yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-22: nying lag gi phung po ri tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-23: khrag gi mtsho dpag tshad gsum tsam du zabs su zab la chu zheng du dpag tshad du ma yod pa yang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-24: de na shi ba'i keng rus yan lag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-26: mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-33: bya ku ra ra mang pos gang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-35: de la'ang la la ni kha dog gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232a-37: la la ni rangs pa tsam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-0: la @232b la ni bam pa tsam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-1: la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du gyur to /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-2: shin tu skyi g-ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-3: gsad pa de dag gsod pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-4: mi sdug pa cho dgur byas pas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-6: snying rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-7: cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos nas kyi g-ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po bskyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-8: sems can dmyal ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu yang thos so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-9: des de ltar kha btags te brdungs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-10: shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-11: bdag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing 'bad de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-14: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-15: mi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri 'dri na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-16: rgyal po me 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-17: kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-18: yid kyi yongs su rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-19: sems can pha rol gyi srog gcad pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-20: sems can pha rol shin tu mnar ba la brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-21: tshe phyi ma la lta ba med pa; ngan song gi g-yang sa'i gad kha na 'dug pa zhig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-22: 'di las ci byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thob par 'gyur ram snyam ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:232b-23: de de ltar sems shing yid la byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-1: can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-2: snying rje rgya chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa de la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-3: steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las lha mang pos bos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-5: drang srong rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag tu bya ba mi dran nam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-6: des gyen du nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas nas dran no zhes brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-8: rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la de ltar the tshom ma skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas spyod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-14: sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-15: sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-16: sems can tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-17: sems can gzengs bstod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-18: sems can yongs su spyod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-19: sems can yongs su skyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233a-20: sems can 'dzud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-0: sems can yongs su smin @233b par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-1: sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-4: de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dris shig ces nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-5: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis lha'i ngag mnyan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-6: rgyal po me gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-7: rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-8: rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-9: mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-11: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-12: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-13: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-16: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-18: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-19: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-20: de nas rgyal po mes rgyal po'i bya ba byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-21: seng ge'i khri las langs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-22: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi lag pa g-yas pa nas bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-23: rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khrid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:233b-24: de mthar gyis rang gi gnas su phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-1: dpon gyi bu nor bzang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrid de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-2: khri la bzhag nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-4: nga'i khyim dang longs spyod la ltos zhes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-6: khyim de rgya che zhing yangs la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-7: rin po che bdun gyi ra bas yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-8: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pas shin tu mdzes par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-9: rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-10: nor bu rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od shin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-11: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa tha dad par rnam par phye zhing bris pas rnam par mdzes par byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-12: mu tig dmar po'i ka ba bkye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-13: nang du seng ge'i khri mu sa ra ga ba las byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-14: rin po che brgya stong du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa shin tu bshams pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-15: nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-16: steng nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-17: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-18: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa'i ba gam gyi rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-19: aasma garbha las byas pa'i rdzing chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234a-20: rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gis 'khor bar 'dug par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-0: @234b de'i 'khor bud med bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-1: kha dog rgyas pa bzang ba'i phul du bya ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-2: sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-5: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-6: ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing ngag nyan pa bye ba phrag bcu yang 'khod par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-8: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-11: cig sdig pa byed pa rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-12: lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-13: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-14: skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-15: dbang phyug dang dbang chen po thob pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-18: de lta bu ni ma mchis so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-21: nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-23: nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:234b-24: phal cher srog gcod pa byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-3: bab rgyal can mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-4: de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod pa las bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-5: dgag pa dang bstan par mi nus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-8: nga ni sems can 'di dag gdul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-9: yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-10: shin tu dul bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-11: phan pa la dgod par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po mdun du byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-12: gsod pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams bsad pa'i mir sprul pa rnams la gsod du gzud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-13: chad pas gcod pa'i mi sprul pa rnams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-14: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod par sprul pa'i mi rnams la chad pa sna tshogs kyis gcod du gzud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-20: mgo bcad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyams su tshor bar gyur pa lta bu dag kyang yongs su ston pa byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-21: de mthong nas nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa gtong zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-22: 'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ro; ;de dag sdig pa'i las byed pa rnams gtong zhing bag byed par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235a-24: de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-0: 'jigs @235b pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-1: skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par shes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-2: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-3: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-4: dga' zhing bde ba'i mthar phyin pa sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la dgod pa byed kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-6: nga ni lus dang ngag gam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-7: yid kyis kyang sems can su la'ang co mi 'dri /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-10: nga ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bgrings shes pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-11: byol song gi skye gnas glen pa'i khams su gtogs pa las kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-12: chung ngu na rtsva'i rtse mos blta ba'i srog chags phra'u 'ga' la yang sems bskyed pa gcig tsam du yang sdug bsngal bar bya bar mi dga' na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-13: zhing du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed par nus pa'i mi lta zhig la ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-15: nga ni rmi lam na yang mi dge ba'i chos yongs su rgyu ba mi skyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-16: ched du bsams te lta smos re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-18: de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-19: ngas byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:235b-20: srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-0: sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas byung ba gzugs brnyan lta bu'i @236a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-1: 'jig rten thams cad rnam par rig pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-2: rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-3: thogs pa med pa'i sgo'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rjes su zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-4: mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa'i dra ba rtogs par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-5: ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-6: kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyis byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-7: glong kun tu 'khyil pa'i rgyud kyi gzugs la dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-8: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-9: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-12: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-13: grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-14: de na rgyal po 'od chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-15: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-16: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-17: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-18: rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-19: rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-21: rgyal po me'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236a-22: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ye shes sgyu ma de rjes su dran par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par @236b thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-1: chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la rab tu brtag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-2: las kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-3: chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-4: chos kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i sprul pa mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-5: ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-7: spyod pa sprul pa'i chos nyid chags pa med pa de rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-8: dus gsum sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid de yang rnam par dbye bar byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-9: mthar gyis yul nas yul du dri ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-11: rjes su rnam par blta ba byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-25: rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-26: lus la dub pa med par tshol tshol te; grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nyen kor zhig tu phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-27: rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bzhugs zhes dris na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:236b-28: de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-1: ni grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-2: 'di na rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs so zhes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-3: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-4: grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-5: grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-6: mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-7: mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-9: 'di na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-10: de ring ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237a-11: de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thos par 'gyur ro //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-10: rin po che'i 'obs zabs su zab pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-13: lha rdzas kyi autpa la dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-16: pun da ri kas kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-17: dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-18: lu mas 'khor ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-19: rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i phreng ba'i rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-20: rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba 'di lta ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-25: rdo rje brtan pa chags pa med pa'i ra ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:237b-27: rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog gi rgyan gyi rdo rje'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-7: mu tig rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-9: sgo de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las sna tshogs mdzes par byas pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-11: grong khyer chen po de ni de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-12: yan lag rnam pa brgyad du rnam par phye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-13: bee d'urya sngon po'i sa la gnas pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-14: grong khyer chen po de'i nang na yang srang chen po bye ba phrag bcu yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-15: srang re re'i glo gnyis nas kyang khyim chen po brgya phrag stong stong mkhos legs par 'grigs pa ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-17: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-20: ba dan che phra dang ldan pa dag go /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:238a-22: sems can khrag khrig du ma gnas pa dag go /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-5: rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-6: rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-7: rdzing rin po che sna tshogs du ma las byas pa gser gyi gram pa kun du bkram pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-8: lha rdzas kyi autpa la dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-11: me tog pun da ri kas chu'i steng kun du yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-12: rin po che'i me tog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-13: 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-14: phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pa'i them skas rnam par bkye ba can gyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-15: lha rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya bran sna tshogs kyi sgra shin tu 'byung ba yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240a-16: lha'i dbang po'i pho brang dang 'gran pa ste; de'i dbus na rin po che 'gro ba la snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bzang la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-0: rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas gya nom par @240b brgyan pa yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-1: de'i nang na rgyal po 'od chen po'i dam pa'i chos gces pa'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-2: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang rin po che'i 'obs de dag la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-4: rin po che'i ra ba de dag la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-5: ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i yid med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-6: rin po che ta la phreng ba de dag la ni 'dod cing chags pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-7: rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba'i sgra la ni ro myong bar byed pa med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-8: lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-9: glu bro snyan pa'i dbyangs la ni chags pa'i sems med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-10: rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-12: bud med kyi tshogs kyi chos kyi dga' ba'i mos pas shin tu dga' zhing /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-18: chos nges par brtag pa la shin tu mos pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:240b-20: grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus kyi mchod rten gyi khang pa nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-0: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lcag pod kyis dra ba legs par @241a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-2: lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i stan sna tshogs bting ba /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-4: nor bu rin po che'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dra ba kun nas khebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-5: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi snam bu la lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gur shin tu spa bar dgye ba'i gnam yol bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-6: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i padmo'i snying po dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-7: de lta bu'i chos kyi khri chen po la rgyal po 'od chen po mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-8: dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs brgyad cu tham pas lus shin tu mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-9: gser gyi ri bo ltar rin po che sna tshogs rnam par bkod pas rnam par mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-10: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-11: zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar blta na bzang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-12: tshangs pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-13: rgya mtsho ltar zab pa'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-14: sprin chen po ltar chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-15: nam mkha' ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241a-16: ri rab ltar kha dog bzhi po'i sems can rgya mtsho'i sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241b-15: dngar ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyi yul du bkod pa mthong ngo //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:241b-23: bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bzhin bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:242b-3: rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:243a-0: @243a *// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yongs su dris so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:243a-2: rnam par sbyangs so; ;yongs su sbyangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:243a-9: rgya cher byas so; ;rigs kyi bu /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:243b-6: bag yangs kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed nas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:244a-0: mi 'phrogs pa'i dad pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi sems @244a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po bsgom pa'i sgo dbye ba'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-3: snying rje chen po'i sprin yongs su smos par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-6: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na rgyal po'i gnas brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-7: de na dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-8: de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-9: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-11: rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-12: rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-14: rgyal po 'od chen po'i drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-15: bam po dgu bcu drug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-16: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-17: grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po nas byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-18: yud tsam du lam gyi mgo btsal nas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de shin tu bstan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba thun mong du gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-10: sems dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-11: sems kyi nyams bde ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-12: sems shin tu tshim pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-13: sems khong nas dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:250b-14: sems rnyog pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-2: de de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes su dran zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas gdong mchi mas gang nas rjes su sems pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-6: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-10: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bsgrub pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul thams cad brjod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-14: ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251a-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g-yang sa thams cad nas skyob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba @251b la gzhog pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-1: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams ngag gis 'doms pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par skyel ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-7: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o; ;dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-10: zhes de de ltar ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-11: nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-12: rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:251b-13: sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad 'dzer to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams @252a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-1: ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-5: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tshom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-8: rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba gang na ba der song zhig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-9: de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-11: mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba gang na ba der song nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-12: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-13: de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-15: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de ni; rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'phrogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-16: rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252a-17: skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-0: de nas @252b tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' ba chen po dang mos shing spro bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-1: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-2: des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-3: gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-4: 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la phog par gyur ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-5: zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-6: 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-7: kun du lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te yongs su skyes so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-12: ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-13: des dri zhim po zhig tshor na yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-14: de ni lha la yang med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:252b-15: lha'i bu mo la yang med /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-3: lha ma yin gyi bu mo la yang med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-4: nam mkha' lding la yang med /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-7: lto 'phye chen po la yang med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-8: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-10: mi'i bu mo la yang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-11: bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-12: kha dog dang mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-17: dbyibs de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zheng dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-19: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-20: dbyibs ma gtogs par de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-21: dbyibs su mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253a-22: 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-0: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba @253b thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-1: de'i kha'i drod kyi dri zhim po dang mnyam pa'i dri de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-10: mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-11: khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-12: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i longs spyod ma gtogs par /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-13: de'i khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-14: g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par de'i g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:253b-16: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems can de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-0: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de mthong ma thag tu nyon mongs pa zhi @254a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-1: bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med de /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-5: 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi rgyu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-6: de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba yang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mi rgyu'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-7: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-8: shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-10: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-13: chu zheng bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-16: rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-17: sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-18: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-19: 'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254a-21: gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-0: yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa @254b khong du chud de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-1: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-2: khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongs bsrungs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-3: bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongs su bsgoms mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-4: brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-5: ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags shing 'bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-7: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba la tshigs su gcad pa des mngon par bstod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-10: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-12: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-15: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-17: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-18: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-19: de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'jam zhing yid du 'ong la nyams su bde bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:254b-21: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-0: de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par @255a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-4: kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam brtan pa la slob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-6: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-7: kho mo ni spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-8: kho mo ni chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyi sgo thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-12: yi dam la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-13: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-14: chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa'i spobs pa snang ba'i sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-15: chos yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-18: gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka'o /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255a-23: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na yid ches par mchi grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-7: rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-8: sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-9: mnyam par bgyid par yang mchi grang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-10: de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-11: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-13: sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-14: kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po glog gis byin pa'i bu gcig ma zhig tu gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-15: de'i tshe nub mo mi nyal tsam zhig na rgyal po'i sgo yang bcad /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-17: skyes pa dang bud med dag kyang gnyid kyis log /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-18: rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra yang zhi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-19: lhan cig spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-20: kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-21: nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rnam par 'khod pa la lta lta ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:255b-23: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang pa ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar lha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-1: lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-3: phyogs thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-5: des kho mo'i lus dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-6: yid shin tu dga' bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-7: mal gyi steng nas langs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-8: sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la babs nas; bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa de la phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-9: de'i spyi gtsug la bltas na yang mtha' thug par ma rung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-10: g-yas g-yon gyi tshad kyang zin par ma rung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-11: mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa la bsams na yang ngoms par ma rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-12: de'i tshe kho mo 'di snyam du bsams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-13: las ji lta bu zhig byas na; lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-14: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-15: 'od kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-16: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256a-17: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-0: bsod nams phun sum @256b tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-1: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-3: gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-4: spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-7: kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-8: bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-9: mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir pham pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-10: chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-11: sems can bsam pa mi bzad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong du ltung bas mi sgul ba'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-12: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:256b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-0: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir @257a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-1: nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ci smos kyi chung ngu na brdar byas pa tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-4: bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-6: kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang pa las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-7: chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-9: stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-10: sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-11: sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar dga'/
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-12: sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dga'/
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-13: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257a-14: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam @257b par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-1: sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-2: sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-3: rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-5: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-7: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-8: bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi dran na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-9: gnyis kyis gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-11: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang khong khro bo'i sems gcig ma bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-12: de ma yin pa'i sems can ma nyes pa gzhan lta la ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-13: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bdag tu lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-14: de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te mngon par chags pa lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-16: mngal na gnas pa'i tshe 'ang sems rmongs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-18: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:257b-19: legs par bsam shing gnas pa lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-0: bskal pa de snyed cig tu @258a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-1: sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rjes su mi dran na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-3: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang chung ngu na ming du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-4: yi ge gcig kyang brjod par mi dran na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-6: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du chos kyi rgya mtsho de snyed cig 'thung 'thung yang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la tshig 'ga' yang ma bsam ma brtags par mi dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-7: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cig gis chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-8: chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-9: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-10: ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-11: sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par chung ngu na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258a-12: yi ge 'ga' yang por bar mi dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-0: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho @258b de snyed cig mthong yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-1: chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-2: smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-3: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-4: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-5: kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-6: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-7: sems can gang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bskul pa de lta bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-8: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-10: rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su mi dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-12: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-13: bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig lon yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-14: tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la yang the tshom bskyed pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-16: rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-17: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam; rab kyi 'du shes sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:258b-19: sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-0: kho mo ni de phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral @259a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-1: lo; ;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-3: yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-4: sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-9: ting nge 'dzin mi bzad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-10: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-11: khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-12: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-14: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259a-15: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-0: sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa @259b dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-2: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-3: chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la snyoms par zhugs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-5: gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-6: slobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-7: cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-8: rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-12: de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:259b-20: nges par rtogs par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-1: bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-2: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-3: phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-4: bee d'urya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-7: la la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-8: la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-9: de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bee d'urya'i rang bzhin de dag yongs su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od zer dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-11: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab par mda' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-14: sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grag pa'ang thos par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-15: de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260a-16: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-0: @260b rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-9: kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-10: chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-12: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-13: spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-14: sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-15: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-16: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gdon pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-17: sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-18: tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:260b-19: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-0: mthu dang ldan pa'i nya pa ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon @261a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-1: pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-2: lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g-yul chen po gdul ba bzlog pa'i phyir khams gsum gyi gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bskam pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-4: zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mu da rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar ba; sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-6: mthon dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-7: rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-9: shing phran gyi nags tshal dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-10: kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-11: 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-12: 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-13: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261a-16: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-0: grong @261b khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-1: de na kun du rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-3: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-4: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-5: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-6: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-7: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-8: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-10: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba mngon du byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-11: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-12: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo bas bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-13: yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-17: yang dag par brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-21: rgya cher bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-22: rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-24: khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:261b-30: mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-2: rgyu zhing song song nas yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-3: grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-4: nyi ma nub tu cha ba zhig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-5: grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-6: grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-7: grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shig tu phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-8: srang gi sgo nas srang gi sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-12: grong phrag tu kun du rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-13: mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-14: grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs logs na ri shin tu mod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i rtse mo rtsva dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-16: sman sna tshogs dga' dga' ltar skyes pas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-17: 'od chen po dang ldan pa nyi ma shar ba lta bur gnas pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-18: des snang ba de mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-19: dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-21: bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-22: grong khyer de nas byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-23: ri shin tu mod pa gang na ba der phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-24: ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-25: ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262a-26: rgyang yang ring po zhig nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-0: kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs pa chen @262b po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa dpal gyis shin tu 'bar ba zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-1: tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-2: 'chags na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas de'i dung du phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-3: rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-4: de la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-5: mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-7: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-8: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-9: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-12: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-15: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-16: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-19: de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-22: kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-23: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:262b-24: sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-2: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-3: chos kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-5: de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-6: sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-7: sems can gyi shi 'pho'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-8: sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-9: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-10: skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi sems can kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-12: chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-13: skye ba kun du 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-14: sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-17: lha'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-18: klu'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-19: gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-20: dri za'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-21: lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-22: nam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-23: mi'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-24: lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-25: sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-26: byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263a-27: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-0: @263b mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-1: mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-2: lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-3: nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-5: theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-7: sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-8: 'di ltar sems can la la la ni bzo'i rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs snang bas 'jig rten gyi bzo sna tshogs bslabs shing don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-9: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-11: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyi don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-12: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi sgo snang ba yongs su bskyed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-14: pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-15: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-16: byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brtan zhing yongs su bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-17: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-19: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:263b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-2: ngan du spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa dang mthun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-3: skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-4: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas dga' ba chen po bskyed cing don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-6: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-7: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-8: sku la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-10: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-11: mi zlog cing lhun gyis grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-12: rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-13: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-14: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264a-16: phar zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-0: @264b gzhan yang kho mo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di yi bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-2: lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-3: grong mtshams thams cad dang khyim thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-4: mthun par 'dus pa'i rdal thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-6: grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-9: bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-10: sbyor ba ji lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-12: rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:264b-13: sems can de dag gis de sum bstan pa dang /
