K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:269b-8: dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pa sin du ba ra zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:269b-9: de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:269b-10: spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu bab bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:269b-11: rigs kyi bu; lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:269b-12: spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:269b-13: des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-1: du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-3: kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-4: kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-5: nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-6: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-7: ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-8: gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-9: 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-10: chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-11: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-12: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-14: kun gyi gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par srid pa'i kun gzhi dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-15: gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-17: tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa'am kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-18: gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-20: yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-23: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na; grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270a-24: de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-0: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems @270b dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-1: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-2: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-3: spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod autpa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-4: spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod autpa la la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-6: spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod autpa la'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-7: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-16: lam gegs med pa dang; lam 'khyug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-17: lam 'khyug pa med pa la rnam par spyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-18: bltas nas 'dri snyam du bsams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-19: 'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-22: sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-23: sems can thams cad byams sdang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:270b-24: mthon dman du gyur pa'i g-yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-0: sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan @271a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-2: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-3: sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdong dum dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-7: chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa la gzhol bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-11: dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-14: de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-15: mnyan pa dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-16: grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-17: srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs nyan par 'dong pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-18: rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-19: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-20: mthong nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271a-21: mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-0: @271b mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-1: mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-2: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-3: 'phags pa; bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-5: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-8: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-10: 'phags pa; ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-11: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-13: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-14: ye shes chen po 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu 'dri ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-15: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-17: dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:271b-19: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-0: zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi @272a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyis shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-3: rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-6: rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-8: sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-9: rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-11: rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'di 'dri ba legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-13: rigs kyi bu; kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-15: rigs kyi bu; kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-16: de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-17: de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-18: 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-19: chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272a-20: de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-0: @272b ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-2: byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-3: byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-4: snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-5: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-6: 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu brtan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-7: sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-8: yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-9: 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-10: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la yang 'di dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-12: yid la byed pa la brtson par kho bos rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-14: kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-15: bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-16: rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-17: rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-18: rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-21: gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:272b-22: gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-2: srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-4: 'byung po'i bar chad rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-5: klong yod pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-6: klong thams cad bkol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-7: dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spangs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-8: chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-10: gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-14: thang cig kyang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-15: phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-17: gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-22: gru bsgyur zhing bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-24: gru gtang ba'ang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-26: de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-27: rtag tu sems can gyi don dang; dgos pa byed do /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-28: tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nye zhor mi 'gyur la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-29: mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-30: spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273a-31: de dag rin po che thams cad kyis chog ste phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-0: phyir yang 'dzam @273b bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-2: kho bo'i gru ni nam yang bub pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-3: nye zhor gyur ma myong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-4: sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-5: sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-7: srid pa rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-8: dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-9: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-10: sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-11: zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-12: phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-14: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:273b-15: 'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du'ang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-0: kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam @274a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-1: par thar pa mthong ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-4: rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs zhes bya ba thob par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-5: kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-6: nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-7: lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-8: chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-9: 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-11: sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsrub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-12: dus rgya mtsho thams cad dang tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-13: 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-14: 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbres las mi 'da' ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-15: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-18: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-19: de na tshong dpon rgyal pa dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274a-21: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274b-0: ji @274b ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274b-1: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:274b-2: mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279a-9: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' na grong khyer ka lingka'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279a-10: de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279a-12: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279a-13: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279a-14: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279a-15: tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279a-16: tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-0: tshong dpon rgyal ba dam @279b pa'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-1: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang mthar gyis yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka lingka'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-2: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-3: gang nas gang du song ba de dang der /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-4: rogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-5: bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-6: lam gyi bzhi mdo dang; lam gyi sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-7: skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-8: bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-11: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-12: grong khyer ka lingka'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-13: sems can tshad med pa'i don du chos ston cing 'dug go zhes bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-14: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-15: bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te bltas na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-16: bza' shing gi ra ba de na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-17: shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-18: khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-19: 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-21: 'khor kun du dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-22: lo ma'i shing yongs su 'gebs pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:279b-24: dbyibs su 'dug pa'i 'dab mas kun nas khebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-0: bee d'urya sngon po'i kha dog ltar @280a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-1: 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-2: me tog gi shing me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-3: ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-4: kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-5: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-6: sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-7: shing tog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-8: gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-9: rtag tu shing tog phun sum tshogs par gnas pa mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-10: rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-11: rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-12: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-14: rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-15: rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-16: gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-17: lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phyang bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-18: rol mo'i shing dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280a-19: lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-0: spos kyi shing @280b kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-1: phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod par mthong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-5: rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-6: phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-7: rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-8: gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bee d'urya sngon po las legs par blangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-9: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-10: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyis yongs su gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-14: me tog pun da ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas chu kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-15: bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-16: sgra snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-17: lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongs su bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-18: shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-19: rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:280b-20: rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa du mas brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-0: lha rdzas kyi stan rin po @281a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-1: che sna tshogs 'brel bar bting ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-3: bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-4: lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par dpyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-5: rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-6: rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-7: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-8: rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pos brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-9: 'khor du lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag du ma bting zhing bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-10: rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i padmo snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-11: la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i padmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-12: la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi padmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-13: la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i padmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-14: la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i padmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-15: la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i padmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281a-16: la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje'i padmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-0: la lar ni seng ge'i khri @281b rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i padmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-1: rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i padmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-2: bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-3: rgya mtsho chen po ltar rin po che'i gling gis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo; ;bee d'urya sngon po'i dam pas spras te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-4: rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i phyogs ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-5: gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-6: mtho dman med pa rdo rje rin po che'i mchog gi padmo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-13: dzi ban dzi ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-14: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas mdzes par brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-15: rin po che sna tshogs kyi padmo'i sprin gyi char dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-16: rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun du 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-17: 'bres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-18: rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs ma rgyan par bkod pa'i nang nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:281b-19: spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-0: lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang @282a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-2: lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-3: mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-4: lda ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-5: rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas kun nas dkrigs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-7: rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-8: dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-9: glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-10: lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-11: rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-12: mdog sna tshogs su ldan pas blta na gtang mi bra ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-13: khang pa brtsegs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-14: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar blta na bzang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-15: rin po che sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs pa rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-16: dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten ltar shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282a-17: yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-0: tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po @282b 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-1: bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-2: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-3: byin gyi rlabs che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing tshad med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-5: rgya chen po dang ldan par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-7: de ltar yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-8: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-10: rim gror byas pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-12: chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-13: dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen pos grub cing byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-14: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-15: rgyu mthun pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-17: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-18: mu stegs can dang; phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:282b-19: bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-0: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med par mthong ste @283a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-1: shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-2: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa lus shin tu mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-4: dbang po zhi ba; yid zhi ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-7: glang po ltar shin tu dul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-8: mtsho ltar dvangs shing gsal la rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-9: rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-10: padmo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-13: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas ri'i dbang po chen po ltar mi sgul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-14: tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-15: kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-16: sman gyi rgyal po blta na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-17: chu'i lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na don yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-19: tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-21: gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283a-22: rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dvangs par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-0: zhing gshin pa ltar dge @283b ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-1: 'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-2: 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la sogs pa gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-3: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-4: chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-5: 'khor gyi stan la la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-6: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-7: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gzhi kun nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:283b-8: 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:284b-0: 'khor gyi stan la la la ni @284b rgyal po chen po ngal bso po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-2: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-4: 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-5: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-7: de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-8: sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-9: snod du gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-10: 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-13: bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-14: dad pa'i ro rdam [*rngam?] chen po dang ldan pa rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-15: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-16: ci nas kyang thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-18: de ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:286b-19: kun du lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-2: chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-3: sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-4: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-5: khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-7: chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-8: sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-9: kun du mos pa mngon par sgrub pa'i snying po la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa non pa'i phyir te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-10: bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-12: sems can gzhan ji snyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-13: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-14: chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-15: sngon dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-16: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la shin tu bkod pa nas; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-17: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-18: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings ba'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-19: nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-20: gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287a-21: 'chag sa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-0: longs @287b spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-1: mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-2: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-3: dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-5: rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-6: dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-7: chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-8: chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos sems mngon par brlan pa de'i yid la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-9: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-10: bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-11: da ni g-yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig tu bya'o snyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-12: de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-13: bza' shing gi ra ba dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so; ;de ltar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-15: 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-16: mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-18: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-19: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-20: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:287b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-0: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na @288a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-2: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-3: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-6: kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-12: de ni ye shes snang ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-13: dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-16: ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-19: kho mo ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang yongs su sgrub pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-20: chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-21: ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-23: dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288a-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-5: mi ma yin pa'i dbang po lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-6: sbos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-7: bdug spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-8: phreng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-9: byug pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-10: phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-11: na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-12: gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-13: rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-14: ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-15: rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-16: rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-17: rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-18: rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-19: rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-20: rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-21: dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-22: mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-24: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-26: snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-27: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:288b-28: snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-1: kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-2: de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-11: mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-12: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-13: bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-14: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-15: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-17: sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-18: rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-20: sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-23: rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-25: kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la blta'ang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed la; rlom sems kyang mi byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-26: 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang nyan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289a-27: tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-0: de bzhin gshegs @289b pa thams cad kyang mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-1: chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-3: chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-4: sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-6: kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-7: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-8: chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-10: skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-11: lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rgyu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ba spu'i nyag ma gcig gis spams shing mngon par 'phen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-13: rang gi ba spu'i bu gar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'du ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-14: 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-15: skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa mnyan pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:289b-16: skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-0: @290a *// yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-3: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-4: grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-5: de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-7: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-8: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-10: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-11: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-12: yang dang yang du bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-13: dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-14: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-15: shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-17: chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su lta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-18: sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam par dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290a-20: snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar ston /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-0: chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni @290b rab tu rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-1: chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-2: chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu gsal bar byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-3: chos thams cad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-5: mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-6: bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-7: de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-8: ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-9: mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-10: de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-12: de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-13: de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-14: de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-15: de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g-yeng ba med ba'i mig dang ldan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-16: yid la brel ba med cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-17: bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-18: rgya mtsho ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyams mi 'khrug pa de la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-19: bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:290b-20: 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-1: log dang ldan yang mi srid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-2: 'di lta bu dag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-3: 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi srid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-4: 'di lta bu dag ni bud med kyi dpang du 'gyur ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-5: 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-6: 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-7: 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying yang mi srid do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-8: 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-9: mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-10: gang yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-11: ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-13: de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-14: khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-17: khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-18: khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-19: khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-20: khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-23: bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291a-24: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis tshig 'di thos nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-0: dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la @291b tshim zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-1: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-2: de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i rab rim pa bcus bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-3: rin po che'i ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-5: lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i padmo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-8: me tog pun da ri kas chu yongs su khebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-9: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-10: gzhi gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-11: spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dres pa'i chu dri zhim pos gang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-12: rin po che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-13: rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-14: rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-16: khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dkrigs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-19: skar khung gi shar bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-22: snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-23: rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-24: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-25: rin po che'i dgar bee d'urya sa spras pa'i g-yi dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-26: lha rdzas kyi spos zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-27: aa ga ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdugs pa; spos kyi byugs pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:291b-28: rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis rtsig ngos kun du bres pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-0: steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pas @292a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-2: gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-3: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma kun tu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-4: rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-5: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba mu med par brjod du yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-6: rin po che byu ru'i sdong po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-8: man shel la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-9: bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-10: de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-11: gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-12: gya nom pa'i kha dog dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-13: gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-16: nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-18: mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-20: dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-21: tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-22: sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-23: rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292a-24: rnam par thar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-0: @292b bzo dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-1: chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-3: rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-4: rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-5: lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-6: lhab lhub grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pas lus shin tu 'bar ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-7: nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-8: rin bo che bee d'urya'i phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-9: nor bu rin po che seng ge mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la bskal pa mthun pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-11: smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-13: ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-14: des khyim de dag thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-16: gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-17: lus bde ba dang sim pa skyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-18: sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:292b-19: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:293a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:293a-16: de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:301a-0: ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob @301a *//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:301b-10: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dri ma med pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:301b-12: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bo la bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:301b-19: nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g-yo la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-7: sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la'ang sta gon du gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-8: sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-11: don mthun pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-12: gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-15: gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-16: rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-17: 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye bas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-18: sems can rab tu sim par byed cing yongs su smin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-19: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-20: ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-21: mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul mthun par chos bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302a-23: rnam 'phrul ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-0: dge ba'i chos bsags par bag mi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul @302b ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-1: bsam pa dang mthun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-2: rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnam dang skal pa mthun pa'i gzugs yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-4: sems can yongs su bsdus shing yongs su smin par byed do //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-9: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-11: sems can thams cad kyis bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-13: sems can thams cad kyi yo byad kyis phongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-14: sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-15: sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bzla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:302b-16: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-0: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med pa @303a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-2: sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-3: sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-4: sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-5: sems can thams cad kyi skal ba mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-6: sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-7: sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-8: sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-9: sems can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-10: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-12: 'khrug pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-13: 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-14: sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin gyis brlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-15: sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303a-16: rang gi ming gi 'khor lo'ang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-0: dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro @303b bas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-1: 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-3: de ltar nga ni thabs 'dis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su bkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi ldog par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-6: ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-7: ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-8: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-9: dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi klong yongs su 'khyil ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:303b-14: sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-0: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems @304a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-1: yongs su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-2: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-3: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-5: g-yas phyogs bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-6: nor bzang shin tu dul ba lho phyogs rgyud du song //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-7: spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-8: rin chen ri yi sul na gnas par des kyang mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-9: rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri yi sman ljongs na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-10: padmo'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la brtan pa 'dug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-11: lha dang lha min klu dang srin po mi'am ci //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-12: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor cing de la chos kyang ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-13: mthong nas nor bzang dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-14: bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang la phyag 'tshal nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-15: ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis thob 'gyur bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-16: 'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-17: bsod nams brgya bas brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-18: 'od sprin dra ba rgya chen bzang po rab bton nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-19: nor bzang spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-20: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-21: sangs rgyas sras po da ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304a-22: ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes sdug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-0: 'gro ba thams cad @304b bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-1: kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-2: 'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-3: gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-4: lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-5: nga yi ming thos bcings shing bzung ba thar bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-6: rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g-yon byas gsad spangs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-7: de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran 'gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-8: mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-9: mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'dzug rgal bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-10: dbang po'i 'khor du phyin dang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-11: dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-12: grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-13: nga yi ming dran de dag thub pa med par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-14: gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran byas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-15: de dag rkun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'jigs nags phyin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-16: seng ge dom gzig gcan zan g-yag rgod sbrul gang yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-17: dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-18: gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig dran byas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-19: sdang ba'i sems kyis rin chen ltongs su bor gyur tam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-20: sol ma dag lce med rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-21: me rnams padmos gang ba'i chu yi gter du 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:304b-22: nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-1: chur bor de yi nang du 'chir mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-2: chu bos mi khyer me yi dbus su 'tshig mi 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-3: don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-4: shing sgrog dbyig chings lcags sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-5: brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin bring cing bslus pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-6: spyos shing bsdigs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-7: nga yi ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-8: gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-9: gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa'i rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-10: nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par brjod par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-11: mthong ba tsam gyis mod la byams pa'i sems kyang skye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-12: nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-13: gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang byad byed pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-14: dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-15: ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-16: la la gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-17: klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-18: grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-19: mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-20: nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-21: pha dang ma dang gnyen gshes mdza' ba kun dang yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305a-22: 'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-0: nor @305b zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-1: nga yi ming gi rjes su la la dran byed na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-2: 'di nas shi 'phos mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-3: byol song skye gnas yi dvags mi khom gnas su min //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-4: sems can dag pa lha dang mi yi gnas su skye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-5: nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-6: dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-7: theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-8: bskal ba bye ba mang por dbang po kun ldan 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-9: la la gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes dran na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-10: sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-11: 'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-12: sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-13: 'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-14: 'gro ba sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-15: sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgom ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-16: yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-17: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-18: shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-19: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:305b-20: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis por ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-0: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam @306a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-2: rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-5: zla ba'i 'od thams cad zil gyis non pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-20: skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus bkye ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-21: sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-22: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-23: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-24: ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu zhi'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-25: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'ang nyams su mi gnod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-26: mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-27: sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-28: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa thams cad du'ang rin po che'i sprin gyi char phab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-38: ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306a-39: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-0: de'i lus @306b de'i gzugs brnyan ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-1: sems can thams cad kyi gnas su snang ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-2: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-3: ri gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du'ang phyin par snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-5: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-6: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-7: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-14: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:306b-15: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
