K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-0: lha @307b dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-1: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-2: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrog pa'i yul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-7: sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-9: bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-11: shes rab kyi mig dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis thos pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-14: khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-16: sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis dad pa dang mos par bgyi na 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi stsal tam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-19: nga ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-22: ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar bsgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:307b-24: 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-0: @308a *// bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'das te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-1: sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig por ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-2: gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-6: yid kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongs su bskyed pas mthong ba byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-10: sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-11: de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'ang khong du chud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-12: de dag thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yang yongs su shes shing bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-13: chos kyi dbyings rab tu bsgrags so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308a-15: yo byad sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar sdud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-0: rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs @308b te; de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-1: gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-2: shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-5: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-7: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-8: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-10: steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-12: ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-13: ngas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-14: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-15: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-16: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthun par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-17: zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-18: chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-19: dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-20: chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-21: 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-23: chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-24: gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:308b-25: yon tan brjod par yang nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-0: @309a *// lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-1: de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-3: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-4: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-5: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-6: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-8: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-10: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-11: mngon par shes pa chen po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-12: mngon par bsgrubs pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-13: brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-14: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi sa la ni nan tan du byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi sa la ni rnam par dpyod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309a-17: gzungs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-0: smon lam gyi sa la ni @309b 'jug par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-1: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i sa la rjes su slob /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-2: stobs kyis ni yongs su sgrub cing mthar gyis grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-3: lha lha chen po kun tu dris pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-4: de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-7: lha lha chen po grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-8: bdag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go; de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang lha lha chen po gang na ba der song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-9: lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-10: mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-12: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-13: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-14: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-17: rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-18: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-19: ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-20: de nas lha lha chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:309b-21: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-0: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la gser @310a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-1: gyi me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar shin tu dka' ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-4: thos par yang rab tu dka'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-5: skyes bu mchog gi me tog pun da ri ka ni 'jig rten gyi phul du bya ba yin par ngos tshar rmad du byung ba yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-6: 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-8: sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-9: lam rmongs pa rnams la lam bde ba ston pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-10: chos kyi tshul du gzud pa la mgon du gyur pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen po gyur pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-12: de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-14: lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-15: ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gdon par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-16: bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par gnas pas lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa yin par bsams so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-18: kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-0: de nas lha lha chen @310b pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-4: mus ra gal pa'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-5: aasmra gar bha'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-6: nor bu rin po che ngang gis snang ba'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-7: nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa snying po'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-8: nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-9: nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-10: gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-11: cod pan gyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-12: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-13: dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-14: rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-16: ska rags kyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-17: rkang gdub kyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-18: mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-19: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-20: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-21: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-31: lha'i ba dan thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-32: rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-33: rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:310b-35: bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-1: gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-3: 'di dag las khyer la sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-4: bsod nams mang po ni gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni mchod cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-6: sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-7: gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-8: 'jig rten na sbyin pa la slobs shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-9: gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtang ba ni ston cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-10: rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bstud pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bsam pa dang ma bral ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag gis bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bsgo ba byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-18: gzhan yang kho bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-19: yul gyi longs spyod la yongs su chags pa rnams la yul de dag ni mi sdug par byin gyis rlob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311a-23: rlom pa tshar gcod pas 'dul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po ltar mi sdug la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-0: 'jigs pa'i lus sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan @311b bar bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-1: rlom pa dang snyems pas 'khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-2: le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams la ni me dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-6: gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su bstan cing skyo bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-7: brtson 'grus rtsom pa la 'god par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-8: de ltar thabs de dang de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang mi mthun pa rab tu gzhom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-9: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-10: sgrib pa'i ri'i g-yang sa'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-11: sgrib pa med pa'i chos la gzud pa'i phyir mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-12: dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par 'god pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-16: kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin rab tu 'joms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-17: chu ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-18: me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad gyi srid pa'i chu skems pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-19: rlung ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-20: rdo rje ltar bdag gis 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:311b-21: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-1: bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga dha'i snying po byang chub na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-2: sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-5: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-7: lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-8: lha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-9: lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-11: mthar gyis yul ma ga dha'i snying po byang chub tu sa'i lha mo brtan ma gang na ba der song ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-12: de 'gro ba'i tshe sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcu gcig la gcig 'di skad ces 'dzer to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-13: sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-15: sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'dral bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-16: chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312a-17: chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-0: ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig 'di nas @312b tshur 'ong ngo zhes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-1: de'i mod la lha mo brtan ma la sogs pa sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-2: 'brug sgra zab mo lta bu'i sgra chen po grag par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-3: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-4: lus rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-5: glog gi phreng ba'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhing snang ba lta bu sha stag tu byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-6: shing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-7: me tog gi shing thams cad ni kha 'bu bar byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-8: chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni 'bab par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-11: lu ma thams cad ni rgyas par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-12: spos chu'i char pa ni rab tu 'bab par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-13: me tog gi sprin rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-14: sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu sgra sgrog par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-15: lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-16: rgyan gyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khrol bar bed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-21: ri dvags kyi dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-25: 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug sgra 'byin par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-26: ri'i dbang po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-27: gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong ni mngon du 'byung bar byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:312b-29: de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-1: gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-2: rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-3: sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyod kyi gnas su gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-4: kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-5: de'i rnam par smin pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam blta bar 'dod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-7: sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-8: sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-9: sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-10: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-13: de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa chen po la brdabs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-14: rin po che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-16: rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-19: khyod kyis ci dgar spyad pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-20: khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-21: khyod kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-23: khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313a-25: gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-0: de ltar kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par @313b thar pa 'di dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-2: rtag tu srung ba la zhugs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-5: kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-6: ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-7: smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-9: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-11: sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'gengs so; ;byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang bsgyur ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-12: zhing gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mnod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-14: dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-16: mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-17: chos snang ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-18: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:313b-19: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su rtogs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub @314a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-1: par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha rol gcig tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskal pa snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po las thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-5: de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su dpyod dpyod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-8: yang dag par 'phel bar byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-9: shin tu rgyas par byed byed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-10: bskal pa bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-11: de srid kyi bar gyis kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-14: kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-16: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314a-17: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham ring du 'brang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-0: @314b sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-2: sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-5: sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-6: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-7: de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-8: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-11: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga dha zhes bya ba na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-12: grong khyer ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-13: de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-15: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-16: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-17: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-18: sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-19: sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-21: sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i drung nas song ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-22: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:314b-23: sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' @315a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-1: ba'i snying po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul de'i rjes su bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba de la rnam par dpyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la yid ches par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyangs pa de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-10: grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-11: grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g-yas phyogs su bskor nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-12: shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-13: nyi ma nub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus shig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag mthun par len pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315a-15: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo @315b gros dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-1: ye shes kyi mig kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-2: phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-4: ye shes chen po'i snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-5: dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-6: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byams klas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mig gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-7: phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par blta ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-8: ye shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam pa rtse gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-9: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-10: grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-11: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-12: rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po spos zhim po thams cad kyi padmo'i snying po can zhig la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-13: lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-14: skra 'jam zhing mang la mthon mthing du 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-16: gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-18: lus rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:315b-19: kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-0: tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @316a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-5: skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa 'dug par mthong ngo; ;des sems can gyi khams yangs par mi khom pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-9: sems can ji snyed cig yongs su dgrol ba de dag thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-10: de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-11: ji snyed cig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-16: gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-18: nga ro mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-19: dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-22: dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316a-23: bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-9: des sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang /
