K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-12: tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-13: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-14: langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-15: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-16: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-18: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:316b-19: de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-0: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yang dag par mthong bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi @317a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-1: phyag tu bdag nyid por ba lags na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-2: lha mo shul gang la brten na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsol /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-4: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-5: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-6: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-8: da ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis non te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-12: khyod ni de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-13: gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-15: kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste; bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-16: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317a-17: dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-0: sems mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis @317b pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-1: kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-2: nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-3: dma' ba la mos pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-4: dbang po zhum pa rnams la brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-5: 'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-10: de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems dang yid la bya bar ldan la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-12: sems can gang ji snyed cig mun nag smag tu gyur pa'i nam la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-14: 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-15: rkun chom mang pos ni rgyas par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-16: sems can mi srun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs su rgyu bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-17: sprin stug po nag pos kun nas khebs par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:317b-19: rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas 'grigs par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-0: rdzi char mi bzad pas ni @318a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-2: zla skar gyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-3: mig gis bya ba'i mthu ni med par gyur pa'i mun pa la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-4: sems can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la spyod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-7: nags tshal gzhan na spyod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-11: phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod dam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-12: lam gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-13: rgya mtsho la spyod spyod pa las gru bub par gyur pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-14: thang la spyod spyod pa las nyam nyes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-15: ri la spyod spyod pa las g-yang sa chen por lhung bar gyur pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-16: 'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa las kha zas kyis phongs par gyur pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-17: nags tshal thibs por sba'i zang zing la thogs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-18: tshul ma yin pa'i nyam nyes shig tu gyur tam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-19: yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-20: grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mi srung pa'i tshul can gyis gtses pa'am; phyogs gzhan na spyod spyod pa las 'brog rmis pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-21: phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-22: lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nye zhor gyur kyang rung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-24: kho mo ni sems can de dag la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318a-25: thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-0: 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod pa rnams kyi rlung @318b sprin nag po gtor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-1: chu'i rnyog pa dang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-2: rlung mi bzad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-3: rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-4: klong gi 'jigs pa las thar par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-6: chu'i lam legs par dmigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-8: rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongs su ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-9: yongs su sbud pa'i gzugs dang; ded dpon gyi gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-10: rta'i rgyal po rngog chen gyi gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-11: glang po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-12: rus sbal gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-13: lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang; nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-14: mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-15: lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-17: mnyan pa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-19: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongs su bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur par shog cig ces yongs su bsngo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-20: thang la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa chen po shin tu gnag pa'i nam la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-25: sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-26: thag thug dang mi bde ba'i lam can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-27: rdul dang phyag dar shin tu 'thul ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:318b-28: rdzi char drag pos gtags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-2: sbrul dang gcan zan gyis bag tsha ba yod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-3: thong [*thod?] mi dang chom po rgyu bar gyur pa zhig la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-4: mgo 'khor bar gyur ba'i sems can rnams la nyi ma'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-7: skar mda' chen po'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-8: glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-9: rin po che'i 'od kyi gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-12: skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-16: nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-17: sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su shog cig par bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-18: ri'i g-yang sa la spyod cing 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi srog dbyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-19: grags pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-23: 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-24: yo byad yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-25: 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod cing brtson pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-26: bu dang chung ma gtong mi phod pas thogs par gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319a-27: lta ba'i thibs por 'khyams pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-0: 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis @319b gtses pa rnams la yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-1: thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-3: bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-5: rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-7: chu mig mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-9: grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-10: yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-11: ka la pingka'i sgra skad bsgrag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-12: rma bya'i rgyal po skad 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-13: sman 'bar bas snang ba'i gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-17: ltongs su rlag ste sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-18: sa'i gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgrub pas skyabs su gyur par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-19: sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can ri la spyod pa 'di dag yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-20: 'khor ba'i ri'i lam rgyud g-yang sa la gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-21: rga shi'i gdon gyis zin pa de dag gi skyabs su yang bdag 'gyur bar shog cig par bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-22: nags tshal thibs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i sems can mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag gis chod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-23: shing dang shing phran 'dzings pa'i gseb shin tu nyam nga ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:319b-27: 'khri shing gis lam chod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-0: shing phran sna tshogs kyi nags tshal @320a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-1: thibs po'i nang du phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-2: stag gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-3: don ma grub pas sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-6: mi dga' ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi bde ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-7: nags tshal stug po nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-8: kho mo ni bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su ston par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-9: sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-10: sems can lta ba thibs po sna tshogs la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-11: sred pa'i dra bas 'khris par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-12: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grel par shog cig par bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-13: 'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na 'thoms pa rnams kyang thabs kyi sgo sna tshogs kyis bde ba yongs su bskyed cing lam bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-14: de dag 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-15: bde ba la rab tu bkod nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-16: sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-17: sems can 'khor ba'i 'phrog dgon pa na 'thoms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-18: ngan song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-19: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bkrol te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320a-20: shin tu phun sum tshogs pas bde ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya bar shog cig par bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-0: yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug @320b bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la yang kho mo ni skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la mngon par chags pa de las gyen du bskyod pa byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-1: sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa pa 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-2: gnas med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya bar shog cig par bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-4: kho mo ni grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyim dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-5: gnas kyi 'ching pas glags pa rnams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-6: mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pas chod pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-7: khyim gyi don sna tshogs nyams su gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-8: chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su bskyed nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-9: chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-10: tshim par byas nas rten pa med pa'i chos la bkod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-11: sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-12: sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi spyod yul las gyen du bskyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog cig par bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-15: gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-16: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:320b-17: phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs bslad par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-0: sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mi mnyam @321a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-1: pa'i g-yang sar 'du shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-2: sgang bu la gshong du 'du shes par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-4: sa tshod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-5: kho mo ni thabs sna tshogs kyis snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-6: phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-7: rgal bar 'dod pa rnams la ni mu stegs yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-8: brkyal bar 'dod pa rnams la ni gru yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-9: khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-10: rnam par blta bar 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-12: dma' ba yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-13: sa'i gzhi phyogs mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-15: gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-16: lam gyis dub pa rnams la grong dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-20: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-22: skom pas mnar ba rnams la yang mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-29: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-30: kun dga' yid du 'ong ba yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-31: sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad par 'dod pa rnams la; pha dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321a-38: yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su ston te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-0: sems @321b kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun gnag gis chod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-1: mig rab rib kyis nyams pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-4: gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-6: bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i mun ba na gnas pa'i sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la bslad pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-7: ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-8: ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-11: lta bas phyin ci log tu gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-12: mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-13: sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-14: bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-15: mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-20: gang zag tu 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-24: rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-25: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi phyogs su zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-34: gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:321b-38: dge sbyong dang bram zer mi shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-2: skyes bu dam pa mi shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-3: chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-4: mi tshul pa'i 'dod pas zil gyis non pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-5: log pa'i chos kyis yongs su 'khris pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-7: chos kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-9: byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-10: theg pa chen po la zhe sdang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-11: byang chub kyi sems la mos pa spong bar byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-12: byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du brjod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-13: snod ma bskams par snying ring ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-14: gnod pa ma byas par dgrar len pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-16: skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-17: mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi dngos po la 'khu ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-18: pha ma la log par sems pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-19: mtshams med pa'i las byed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-20: g-yang sa chen po la mngon par bltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-21: shes rab kyi snang ba chen pos bsal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-22: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-23: theg pa chen po kun tu bzang pos stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sa'i lam yongs su ston par gyur cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322a-26: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-0: sangs rgyas @322b gyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-2: stobs bcu yongs su grub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-3: sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mchog tu gyur pa yongs su ston par shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog cig par bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-8: kho mo ni sems can yun ring po nas na zhing nad kyis yongs su skyo ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-11: rga ba'i zil gyis non pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-15: yul gzhan du phyin pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-16: phyogs log par zhugs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-19: nyes pa byung ste rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams kyang srog dang bral gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-21: de ltar kho mo ni sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams cad kyis gso bar nan tan du byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-23: rga ba'i zil gyis non pa rnams la ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-26: yo byad kyis mi phongs par yongs su sdud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-27: mgon med ba'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:322b-28: phongs shing dbul ba rnams ni nor dang gser gyi phung pos yongs su sdud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-0: log par ltung ba rnams ni don mthun pas yongs su sdud @323a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-1: do; ;yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni rang gi yul du phyin par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-2: phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs ma nor bar 'dzud do; ;btson ra na 'dug pa rnams ni btson ra nas thar bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-3: chad pas bcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-4: nyes pa byung ste rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-5: sems kyang bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-6: gnod pa sna tshogs las yongs su skyob cing mgon byed pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-7: bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-17: 'khrugs pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-19: log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-20: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzugs la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-21: chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-22: kha na mtho ba med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-0: @323b rga shi yongs su med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa las rab tu dgod bar bya bar bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-2: kho mo ni sems can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-3: lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-4: log par lta ba'i spyod yul can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-5: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las nya ma nga bar 'gyur ba la yongs su spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-6: brtul zhugs dang dka' thub sna tshogs la gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-10: yongs su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-18: phyogs mtshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba la mos pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-19: sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-20: thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-21: da dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-22: ngan song thams cad kyi g-yang sar ltung ba'i lam las rnam par bzlog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-23: 'jig rten pa'i yang dag par lta ba la rab tu bkod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-24: lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la yang yongs su 'god do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:323b-25: sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-0: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol @324a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-1: tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-3: kun tu bzang po'i smom [*smon?] lam chen pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-5: sems can gyi khams thams cad ma dul gyi bar du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g-yo bar bya bar bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-7: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-8: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di brnan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-10: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-11: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-12: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-13: gti mug ma rig mun nag bsal don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-14: sems can phan phyir kho mo chos ston te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-15: dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-16: 'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba yin; ;kho mos byams yangs shin tu sbyang ba byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-17: bskal ba mtha' yas sngon chad shin tu bsgoms //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-18: des ni 'jig rten rgyas bkang snang bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-19: nor bzang brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-20: kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-21: 'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324a-22: de ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-0: nor bzang brtan @324b pas tshul 'di shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-1: 'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-2: ma byas 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon bsgrub cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-3: des ni kho mo dga' mgur rangs par byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-4: rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-5: sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su sbyong byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-6: nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-7: 'dus byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-8: rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-9: kho mo'i mig ni rgya che yongs su dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-10: des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-11: zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-12: byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs pa mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-13: sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-14: 'od bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-15: ba sbu kun nas 'od zer mang 'gyed pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-16: sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-17: zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi sems can rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-18: shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-19: byis pa de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtsho na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-20: 'khor zhing rang rang las kyang myong bar byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-21: kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-22: der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongs su 'du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-23: 'gro ba kun gyi sgra skrad [*skad?] rgya mtsho dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-24: kun kyang thos nas dran pas yongs su 'dzin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-25: dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-26: dpe zla med pa'i gsung ni rab brgyan te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:324b-27: des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-0: de dag kho mos thos shing dran @325a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-2: kho mo'i sna'i mthu yongs su rnam dag ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-3: chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-4: rnam thar gnas rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-5: tshul ni rgyal sras khyod kyis shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-6: kho mo'i lce ni rgya che rab tu yangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-7: srab cing mdog dmar rin chen 'od du dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-8: sems can bsam pa ji bzhin des shes byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-9: rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-10: kho mo'i chos lus shin tu rnam dag ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-11: dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-12: gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-13: de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang du mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-14: kho mo'i sems ni chags med zag pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-15: sgra dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-16: de yi khongs su mi mchog kun chud kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-17: de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-18: zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-19: de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-20: de dag dbang po bsam pa rab shes kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-21: de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-22: kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu grub //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-23: des ni bsam yas zhing yang rab tu bskyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-24: lus kyi 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-25: des ni sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-26: kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongs su dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-27: kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i mdzod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325a-28: des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-0: @325b 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'ang yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-1: kho mo'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-2: des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-3: 'gro ba kun gyi the tshom yongs su gcod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-4: rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-5: dus gsum kun la kho bo zhugs gyur pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-6: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-7: de dag smon lam la yang rab tu zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-8: tshul 'di dpag yas rab tu rdzogs pa yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-9: rdul mang kun la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-10: de dag dus gsum 'jug pa'ang de bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-11: de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-12: 'di ni kun tu gnas ba'i chu la byis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-13: rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-14: phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-15: rdul sbubs kun gyi byang chub shing drung na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-16: zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung du sgrog pa ltos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-17: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-18: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-19: lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-20: de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-21: sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes nas ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-22: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-23: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:325b-24: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-0: sngon 'das pa'i dus ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra @326a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-1: ba snyed kyi bskal pa'i yang pha rol gcig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-2: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-3: de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin chen dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi pa 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-5: rgyal po'i gnas padmo'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-7: rgyal po chos rab mu stegs zhes bya ba chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-9: rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-10: des sa chen po de yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos kyis rgyas par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-11: bde bar gnas par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-12: rgyal po chos rab mu stegs de'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-13: de srod la 'dod pas myos shing dga' bar rtse rtse bas dub nas nam gyi gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin te nyal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-14: de nas rgyal po'i gnas padmo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i lhun can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-0: bla na med pa @326b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-1: de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dpal 'byung ba thams cad ni 'od chen po kha dog du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-2: rgyal po'i gnas padmo'i 'od ces bya ba de na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-3: mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-4: de rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song nas; rgyan dkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-8: nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa; chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-10: de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-11: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-12: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-13: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-14: smon lam rgya cher bshad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-16: rgyal po'i btsun mo de yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-18: bsam pa thag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-19: des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-21: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:326b-24: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-1: rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-2: gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-3: kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-4: rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-6: kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-8: bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tshun chad du nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-9: sems can dmyal bar ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-10: byol song gi skye gnas su ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-11: yi dvags su ma yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-12: nam yang rigs dma' bar ma skyes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-13: nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-14: nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-15: de ltar kho mos rtag par lha'i nang du lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob; mi'i nang du ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-16: mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-19: dus ngan par yang ma skyes so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-20: de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-21: bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu lam bde zhing mnyam pa nas nye zho med par phyin kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-22: de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su grub par ma gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327a-23: ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag ni 'das /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-0: bskal pa bzang po 'di'i @327b snga rol gyi ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-2: bskal pa mya ngan med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-5: kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-6: der sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-7: sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-10: bla na med par skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba; lha dang mi'i ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-12: de'i tshe kho mo yang tshong dpon snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing bzang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-14: kha dog shin tu mdzes shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-15: mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-16: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan sna tshogs su; mtshan mo'i lha mo mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-17: des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-18: pha ma nyal bar gyur pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:327b-19: khyim de'ang yongs su bskyod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-1: snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-2: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-4: snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de bstan to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-5: de nas kho mo pha ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-6: gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-7: mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar phyin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-9: de nas kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-11: ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-12: ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings ye shes kyi snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'ang thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-13: de thob pas kyang kho mos bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-14: kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-15: de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-0: de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra @328b ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-2: bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-3: 'jig rten kyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-4: kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-5: de dag gi sgra skrad [*skad?] rnam pa tha dad pa'i brda yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-9: mos pa yang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-10: sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongs su smin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-11: de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur ba'i lus kyang yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-12: kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de yang sems kyi skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-13: rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-15: de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-16: de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:328b-17: de bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod @329a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-1: du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag kyang lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-4: bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len to; ;'dzin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-9: smon lam rgya mtsho la yang 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-11: sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag tu skyes par gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-12: sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-14: mos pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bre brag tu de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-15: gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis rlob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-16: de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329a-17: chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-0: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi @329b snang bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-1: 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-2: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-4: chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'byams klas pa 'dal ba la 'jug par dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-5: byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis yongs su dag par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-8: sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-9: gdul ba'i ye shes dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-11: sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-12: 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tshom dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:329b-14: yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi zla ba dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-0: srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par @330a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-1: dag pa; chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rdul gyi cha shas la rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa la dbang bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-2: dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes dbyer med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-5: rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba yongs su bstan par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-8: yul ma ga dha 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bskyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-9: yang dang yang bskul bskul ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang; ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-12: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-13: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-14: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-15: khyod sku shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-16: mtshan gyis rnam brgyan ri bo ji bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-17: 'jig rten kun las mngon 'phags 'jig rten du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-18: phun sum tshogs sku 'jam dpal bzhin du mdzes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-19: khyod kyi chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-20: dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnam mi rtog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330a-21: der ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'dus te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-0: 'byung zhing rnam par 'jig kyang chags mi @330b mnga'; ;lam rgyud 'byams klas thams cad kun tu yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-1: khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-2: skar chen zla skar rgyu skar tshogs bzhin du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-3: spu rtse kun la'ang khyod ni bdag gis mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-4: khyod kyi thugs yangs shin tu rnam dag ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-5: phyogs rnams kun gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-6: der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongs su 'du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-7: khyod la ye shes mi rtog dam pa mnga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-8: zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-9: khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-10: rgyal mang sna tshogs char pa mngon 'bebs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-12: 'gro ba kun snyed lus rnams mtha' yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-13: khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-14: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-15: sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can rnam par spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-16: spu rtse kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-17: sna tshogs rgyan ldan rnam pa tha dad mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-18: lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-19: ji snyed de dag bsam bzhin kun kyang byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-20: gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan thos dga' gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-21: de dag thob bya legs thob legs par 'tsho //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-22: sems can gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-23: byang chub lam la mngon du bltas par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-24: de ltar thos nas rab tu sems dga' la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-25: mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:330b-26: bskal pa bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang rung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-0: khyod kyi zhal blta'i don du mos @331a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-2: zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed lus byas te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-3: de snyed bskal pa brgyud de khyod 'dra ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-4: spu gcig khyod kyi yon tan legs brjod kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-5: legs pa'i mthar phyin nam du'ang mi 'gyur ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-7: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-8: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-9: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-10: lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya bas ma ngoms bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-12: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-13: bam po dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-14: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-15: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-16: thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa ni khong du chud par byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i snying po yang dag par byung ba la ni rjes su dpyod /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ni yongs su 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni yongs su sbyong /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ni yongs su gnon /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgya cher byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rgya mtsho ni rjes su @331b 'brang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtsho la ni rnam par blta /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-2: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la gzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin ni rgya cher byed /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-3: mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-5: zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas mngon par bsgrub cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-6: mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-7: mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-8: mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-9: lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-10: mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-11: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-13: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-14: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-16: ji ltar nan tan du bgyid pa ma 'tshal to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-19: de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:331b-22: yongs su 'grub pa 'dri ba legs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-1: dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnam par blta ba'i mig rnam par dag pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med pa la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad kyis 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rgya mtsho sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-10: sems can sna tshogs kyi don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-11: ba spu'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-12: sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtshos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-13: sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pas dus gsum du byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra sgrogs pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-0: mdo sde thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'brug @332b sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-1: sangs rgyas gyi mtshan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-2: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-4: chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-7: kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-9: kho mo ni de'i mthus dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la'ang 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-12: ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-13: sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe tshad sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-17: dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:332b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sku la'ang 'jug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par @333a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa 'gags pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bzhud pa med pa'o; ;rang bzhin gyis byung ba med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byon pa med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-5: mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma skyes pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-7: mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma 'gags pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-9: sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bden pa ma yin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-11: 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du byung ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni brdzun pa ma yin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-13: shi 'pho dang skye ba las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-15: chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'jig pa med pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-17: ngag gi lam thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-19: chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid mi mnga' ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-0: kho mo ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong @333b du chud par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bas shin tu rgya che bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-3: shin tu yangs par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-4: khong du chud par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-22: yongs su rtog pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa'i snying rje chen po de la gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-23: sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la yang dag par spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang po bsgom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-24: yid kyi las thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-25: ye shes kyi stobs dang mthus sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bde ba la sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-26: bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-27: 'khor bar log par zhugs pa la btang snyoms su byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-28: sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-29: bsam gtan gsum pa bsgom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:333b-30: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-0: sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i @334a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-1: phyir; bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-3: ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes thams cad mngon par shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-7: sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su spyod zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di bsgom mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-10: de ltar kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing thabs sna tshogs kyi sems can yongs su smin par byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-11: 'di ltar nub mo zhi bar gyur pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-12: dga' ba la mos par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-14: yongs su skyo ba'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334a-22: gzhan la rag las pa'i 'du shes dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-2: longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-3: sems can de dag kyang sems de la yongs su bsgoms pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-4: 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-5: de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe 'di chos dang mthun pa'i dad pa yongs su bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-6: sgra chen po 'jigs pa mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-7: mtshan mo zhi bar gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yang yang dag par ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-8: spang ba dang mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-9: khyim gyi sgo'ang rnam par 'byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-10: lam yang yongs su ston to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-11: snang bas kyang mngon par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-12: mun pas chod pa'ang rnam par sel to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-14: rab tu byung ba la yang yang dag par bsngags par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-15: sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'ang brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-18: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi legs pa'ang brjod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-19: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la'ang bsngags pa byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-21: kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-22: sems can rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi yongs su rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:334b-23: tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pas non pa rnams dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-1: rtog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yongs su rtog pa de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-2: yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-3: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-4: sdig to'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-5: dge ba'i yongs su rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-6: spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'byung ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-8: byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-9: sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-10: lha dang mi'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su rtogs pa bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-11: skyes nas kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyen nye bar sgrub pa byed pa nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar sgrub pa byed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-14: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-15: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-16: smon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @335b kyi ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-2: gnas thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa; thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-3: zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-4: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-6: sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-7: 'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing sred pa zad cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du snang ba skyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-8: yon tan brjod par nus de skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-11: 'di nyid nang dang yang rgyang mi ring ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-12: rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g-yas rol gcig nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:335b-14: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i lam la brtson par bya ba dris shig; de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-0: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam @336a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-1: par gnon pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-4: de dag mig yangs rnam par dag par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-5: des ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'ong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-6: rgyal ba'i sku gsal dri ma med la ltos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-7: mtshan gyis yongs su brgyan pas shin tu mdzes //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-9: skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la'ang ltos //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-12: chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas pa khyab mdzad cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-13: 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin 'khor lo bskor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-14: rgyal bas chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-15: gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chud nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-16: gzugs sku bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-17: 'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-18: sangs rgyas sku ni rgya che bsam mi khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-19: chos kyi dbyings kun yongs su rgyas bkang zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-20: de ni kun tu mnyam par snang ba ste //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336a-24: kha dog bzang po gzhan dang gzhan snang bas //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-1: rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-2: rgya che bsam yas mi zad mngon 'byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-3: de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-4: srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-5: sangs rgyas sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-9: sangs rgyas gsung snyan rab tu sgrog mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-10: dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho sgra 'od can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-11: chos char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-12: srog chags byang chub bsam pa yongs su skyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-13: bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-14: 'dis ni sngon chad yongs su gzung mdzad pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-15: de dag kun gyis rgyal ba rnam snang mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-16: zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-18: sems can re re kun la'ang mngon par bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-19: mos pa'i tshul bzhin spyod yul gzhan dang gzhan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-20: de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-21: rgyal sras dam pa thams cad ma lus par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-22: bde bar gshegs pa'i spu gcig rtse las 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-23: rnam par de la gang rnams bsam yas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-24: de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi nus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-25: kho mo'i 'dab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:336b-26: 'jig rten mgon la mngon 'gyur rab tu dga'//

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:337a-3: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:337a-6: lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:337b-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i ye shes @337b snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa de /
