K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-3: rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-4: 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing rtsod pa med par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-5: dngos po thams cad la phangs par rtsi ba med par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-6: sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mtshungs pas yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-7: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-8: sems can thams cad la brnyas pa med par yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-9: nang dang phyi'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-10: dka' ba chen po yongs su gtang bar bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-11: 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi bsam pa ji bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-12: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang mthun pa'i sgras /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-13: sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-14: dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin 'thon nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-15: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par gyur pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-0: rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob @339b pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-1: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs su sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin mngon par 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyab par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-3: mngon sum du brtul zhugs thams cad kyi yi dam las mi g-yo bar yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-4: sems can gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-5: brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rab tu ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-6: 'jig rten thams cad du gnas pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-7: yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-8: 'khor ba thams cad du gnas pa las phyir phyogs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-9: lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rgud pa'i sgor gzhol ba yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-10: mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-11: 'jig rten gyi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rnam par bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-12: mi rtag pa dang g-yo ba dang 'jig pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-13: 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-14: 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal zhing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-15: bdag med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa dang mi 'bral bar mos par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu dag par bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-18: sems can thams cad la yang dag par bskul ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:339b-19: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-0: tshul khrims kyi spyod pa yongs @340a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-2: sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongs su ston par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-3: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-4: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-5: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyang nyams su bzod pa sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-6: sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par mtho ba tsams [?] kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-7: sems can thams cad kyis tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshig gis spyo ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-12: bsdigs pa nyams su bzod par byed pa yongs su ston pa dang; sems can thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-14: rim gror ma byas pa thams cad kyis mtho ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-15: dma' bar mi 'gyur ba yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-16: sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-17: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-18: ye shes mi zad pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-19: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340a-20: bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-0: sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi @340b mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-1: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-2: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-3: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kya [*kyi?] lus kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-5: chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te; sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-7: brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba yang dag par ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-8: bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-9: byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-10: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-14: log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam pa bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-15: mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:340b-18: yongs su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-0: sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor @341a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-2: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-3: gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-5: thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-7: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-8: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-9: lus sna tshogs kha dog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-10: dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-11: thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-12: yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-13: 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-14: ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-15: dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-16: tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-17: 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-18: 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-19: chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341a-22: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-0: sems can thams @341b cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su sten [*ston?] pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-4: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston par byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-5: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-6: spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-7: nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-8: yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-9: sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-10: sems las su rung bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-11: bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-12: dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-13: lus kyi bde ba yongs su skyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-14: chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-15: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-16: zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-17: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-20: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:341b-21: bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su bzung @342a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-1: bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-2: sangs rgyas mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-3: chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-4: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-6: tshul mngon par brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-7: chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-8: sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-9: the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-10: sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'joms pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-11: sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-12: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-13: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-14: bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342a-16: bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-0: @342b 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-1: khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-2: khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-3: lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-8: rim gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-10: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgol [?] mi gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-11: dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-12: snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin pa byed pa mthong ngo; ;ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:342b-15: sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-0: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i @343a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-1: smon lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-2: sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-4: sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-6: zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya bar yongs su brjod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-8: sems kyi skad cig re re la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par brjod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-10: dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-11: zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-0: @343b ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-1: sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing; thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs mi zad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-4: chud mi za ba'i chos can yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i stobs phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi ldog la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-8: bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:343b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba yongs su ston pa dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-0: mi'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can @348b yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-1: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-3: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-4: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs drag stobs chen dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-5: nam mkha' lding gi bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-6: nam mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-7: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-8: lha ma yin gyi bu dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-9: lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-10: chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-12: gshin rje'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-17: bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-18: de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:348b-21: drang srong thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-0: me'i phung po'i lha lta bu'i @349a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-1: lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-9: sa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-10: bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-18: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ba nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-19: de bzhin du lag na rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'byams klas pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-21: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i sems thog ma bskyed pa'i tshogs la sogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-22: sngon gyi tshe rabs la yongs su bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349a-23: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-0: skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab @349b chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-1: lus yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-2: ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-4: sangs rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-5: chos kyi tshig dang; yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang; ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-7: ting 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-8: zhing mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par bkang ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-9: bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-10: chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-11: sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:349b-12: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can pha rol gyi shi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-1: yongs su dag pa rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-2: sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta zhing dbyings la 'jugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-3: thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-4: thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam par dmigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-5: thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-6: thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-7: thog ma dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-8: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-9: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par gnon pas phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin @350b gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-5: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-6: sems can rnams la chos 'chad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-7: yang dag par ston pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-12: shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-15: rnam par rig par byed pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-16: nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-17: la la la ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-18: la la la ni chu'i phung po rab tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:350b-19: la la la ni me'i me lce shin tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-2: la la la ni sa yongs su g-yos pa'i sgra skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-3: la la la ni ri chen po phan tshun thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-4: la la la ni lha'i grong khyer g-yos pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-5: la la la ni lha'i gzhal med khang thug cing 'khrol ba'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-6: la la la ni lha'i dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-7: la la la ni klu'i dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-8: la la la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-9: la la la ni dri za'i dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-10: la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-11: la la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-12: la la la ni mi'am ci'i dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-13: la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-14: la la la ni mi'i dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-15: la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-16: la la la ni lha mo'i glu dbyangs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-17: la la la ni lha rdzas kyi rol mo legs par blangs pa'i dbyangs kyis; la la la ni nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyangs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-18: la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skad sna tshogs kyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-19: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351a-20: sems can rnams la rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad @351b sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-2: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-3: thog ma sems bskyed pa dang bcas pa yongs su byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-4: grub cing yang dag par 'dus pa dang bcas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-5: rnam par thar ba'i rnam par rtse ba dang bcas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-6: sems can thams cad la rnam par dmigs par byed pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-7: de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-8: sems kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par sbyong ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-9: sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dag kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel ba mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-10: sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-11: sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang 'khor ba rgya mtsho las gyen du bskyod pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-12: sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang nyan thos dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:351b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-0: sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud pa tshong dpon gyi bu @352a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-1: nor bu bzang gis mthong ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-8: rjes su 'brangs so; ;rjes su zhugs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-9: mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-10: de ni mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-11: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i byin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-12: sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-16: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs drag po gangs chen mtsho snang ba chen po rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-17: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352a-18: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-0: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod @352b do; ;rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-1: de la khyod kyis bskal pa tshad med bslabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-2: bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs rnams kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-3: 'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten rim pas bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-4: bdag med mgon med log pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-5: 'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-6: rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-7: lus dang dbang phyug ston mdzad 'gro ba 'dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-8: shin tu rims bral rab tu zhi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-9: chos sku gnyis med rnam par dag pa mnga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-10: 'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-11: sprul pa'i sprin sgra 'brug gis rnam par 'dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-12: phung po khams dang skye mched la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-13: khyod ni nam yang mi gnas mi rten te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-14: yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-15: dbang phyug yongs su bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-16: phyi dang nang las rnam par grol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-17: gnyis las byung ba'i mtsho las 'phags gyur kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-18: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-19: gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud du rab tu ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-20: khyod la g-yo ba mi mnga' ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-21: nam yang rlom sems g-yo ba'i spros mi mnga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-22: 'jig rten spros mos byis pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-23: chos kyi rang bzhin bstan cing 'dul ba mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-24: ting 'dzin rgya mtsho kun spyod pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-25: bskal pa mang por rtse gcig thub bzhugs kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-26: phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs mchod don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-27: spu rnams rtse las sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-28: sangs rgyas stobs la 'jug pa'i tshul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:352b-29: skad cig re rer mtha' yas thugs su chud //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-1: can bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-2: so so'i rkyen bzhin go bar bgyi bas bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-3: khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-4: las kyi rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-5: chos kyi sgrib pa med pa'i lam bstan te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-6: sems can kun kyang rnam par sbyong ba mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-7: khyod sku mtshan bris rnam dag kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-8: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa yis; ;sems can bsam pa'i dbang tshul du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-9: khyod ni lha mo'i sku gzugs ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-11: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-12: lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-13: lha mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas ni; ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-14: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-15: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-16: dran pa bskal pa mang 'das pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-17: zhing gi rdul snyed de yi snga rol na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-18: zhing ni rin chen mdog bde byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-19: de yi bskal pa zhi ba'i dbyangs zhes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353a-20: gling bzhi bye ba khrag khrig ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-0: brgya stong phrag @353b bcu rnams kyis yongs su gang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-1: tshad med rin chen ri bo 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-2: gling bzhi'i bar ma bzang po rnam par bkram //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-3: rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-4: stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su tshang ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-5: rgyal po'i pho brang mdangs dga' ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-6: dbus na gnas pa spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-7: der ni phyogs kyi dbang po sa yi bdag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba mngon par gzugs bzang byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-9: mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-10: de yi lus kyang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-11: padmo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-12: gser gyi mdog bzang 'od 'byung lus dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-13: 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan thams cad du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-14: mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de 'gengs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-15: de yi bu ni stong tshang ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-16: kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-17: blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-18: mdzangs shing yid gzhungs bye ba shin tu mang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-19: btsun mo bye ba phrag bcu tshang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-20: lha mo ji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul la mkhas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-21: de dag phan sems bde sems kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-22: rgyal po de la nye ba'i yid du gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-23: rgyal po de ni sa chen de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-24: ri dang khor yug kun gyi mthas klas pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-25: gling bzhi phun sum tshogs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-26: kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyis gnas par byed; ;kho mo 'khor los bsgyur ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-27: btsun mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lus //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:353b-29: dpag tshad stong du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-1: ma nub par gyur nas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-2: rgyal po sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-3: rol mo'i dbyangs kyang zhir gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-4: kho mo mal na bde bar nyal nyal na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-5: nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-6: sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-7: de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-8: phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste bstan pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-9: rgyal ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho des //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-10: zhing gi rdul snyed 'jig rten khyab par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-11: rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-12: phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-13: sa rnams ri dang bcas par g-yos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-14: rgyal ba byung zhes sgra yang yongs su brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-15: lha dang lha min mi dang klu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-16: kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-17: sangs rgyas ba spu'i sgo kun nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-18: sprul pa'i rgya mtsho mang po mngon par byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-19: des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-20: 'jig rten bsam pa bzhin du chos kyang bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-21: rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-22: rgyal bas thams cad bdag gi rmi lam bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-23: zab mo'i 'brug sgra thos gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-24: khong du chud pas kho mo dga' yid gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-25: mtshan mo'i lha mo stong snyed kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-26: kho mo'i steng gi bar snang mkhar gnas shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-27: rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-28: kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-29: lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354a-30: khyod kyi rgyal po'i khams su rgyal ba skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-0: @354b bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya dag tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-1: de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag dkon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-2: kho mo dgar gyur sad par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-3: 'od gsal dri med rnam dag mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-4: 'od bzang de ni ga las blta blta na; ;byang chub shing rgyal drung gi rgyal ba mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-5: mtshan nyid sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-6: ba spu kun nas 'od zer rgya mtsho bkye //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-7: ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-8: rgyal ba g-yas g-yos kun tu'ang de bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-9: mthong nas kho mo rab dga' ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-10: de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongs su bskyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-11: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yang mthong nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-12: kho mos smon lam shin tu rgya chen btab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-13: kho mos rgyal po bzhes su gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-14: de yi 'khor dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-15: sangs rgyas 'od yangs mthong gyur nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-16: kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-17: rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-18: bzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-19: yongs su bskor te dpung bcas pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-20: rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-21: lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-22: kho mos rgyal ba de la mchod bkur byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-23: rin chen bdun yang yon du phul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-24: rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang gsol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-25: mdo sde rgya mtsho yon tan sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-26: smon lam mtsho las yongs su byung ba'i rgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-27: kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-28: bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-29: mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:354b-30: de tshe snying brtser kho mo phan bstan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-2: kho mo mos pa yongs su skyes par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-3: kho mo'i smon lam de 'dra'i sems //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-4: thog ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-5: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-6: srid pa'i rgya mtshos de ni zhig ma gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-7: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-8: kho mos dad pa bskyed de mchod pa byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-9: 'khor ba'i lha dang mi dbus su //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-10: yul gyi dga' dang bde la mngon par smon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-11: rgyal ba'i dang po dpal gyi mtsho //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-12: de yi 'og ma yon tan sgron ma ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-13: rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-14: sangs rgyas bzhi pa nam mkha'i shes rab bo; ;rgyal ba lnga pa me tog mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-15: rgyal ba drug pa chags med zla ba'i blo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-16: rgyal ba bdun pa 'od rgyal chos kyi zla //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-17: brgyad pa ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-19: rgyal ba dgu pa de tshe byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-20: bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-21: de dag kho mos dad pas mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-22: bcu po de la sogs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-23: mi yi dbang po dam pa kun mchod de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-24: tshul gyi rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-25: mig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-26: de 'og zhing gi mtshams sbyor ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-27: rin chen thams cad 'od ces bya ba byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-28: bskal pa lha yi dpal zhes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-29: sangs rgyas lnga brgya de la byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-30: thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355a-31: gnyis pa nyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-0: snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas @355b gsum; ;de yi 'og tu rin chen ri bo'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-2: me yi dpal dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-3: snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-4: bcu pa ye shes kun snang rgyal po'o; ;bcu po de la sogs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-5: mi yi dbang po de dag kho mo yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-6: phung po'i gnas la dad dga' zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-7: gnas med chos la gnas kyi blos mchod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-8: de 'og de yi mtshams sbyor ba; ;'jig rten khams bzang byung bar gyur pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-9: padmo'i sgron ma sprin gyi dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-10: de tshe bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-11: de la rgyal ba tshad med de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-12: de dag 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mchod; ;rgyal ba de dag thams cad las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-13: rim gro chen pos kho mos chos kyang thos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-14: rgyal ba'i dang po rin chen ri //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-15: de yi 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-16: rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal; ;chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-17: chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-18: chos stobs 'od dang nam mkha'i blo gros te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-19: chos 'od ri bo spo mthon dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-20: de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sprin dpal lo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-21: bcu po de la sogs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-22: mi yi dam pa de dag kun mchod de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-23: rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-24: chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-25: de yi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-26: nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-27: zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-28: de la bskal pa zla ba'i dpal byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:355b-29: de la stobs bcu byung ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-0: bye ba brgyad cu yongs su @356a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-2: de dag kun la'ang mchod pa'i sgo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-3: rgya che mtha' yas yid 'ong du ma byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-4: thog mar byung ba dri za'i rgyal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-5: de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas shing rgyal te; ;rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ri //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-6: de yi 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-7: rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-8: chos kyi rgya mtsho sangs rgyas gzi brjid dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-10: kun gyi tha ma chos 'od rgyal po'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-11: bcu po de la sogs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-12: bde gshegs de dag thams cad mchod byas kyang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-13: chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yi; ;ye shes kho mos thob par ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-14: de yi 'og tu zhing dag pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-15: rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi phyed gzi brjid brtan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-16: kun tu 'od sprin ming ldan byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-17: rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-18: de la sems can dag pa mang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-19: nyon mongs dri mas nyon mongs shin tu nyung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-20: bskal pa rab zhi blo gros 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-21: sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-22: rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-23: gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga'i mtshan ldan pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-24: rgyal ba chos dbyings gzugs brnyan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-25: phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma gsal ba'i bdag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-26: rgyal ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-27: rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-28: bde gshegs bzod 'khor sgron ma dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356a-29: brgyad pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-0: snang ba rgya mtshos @356b brgyan pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-1: de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-2: bcu po de la sogs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-3: mi yi dam pa de kun kho mos mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-4: chos nyid nam mkha' mnyam pa 'di //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-5: rang bzhin yongs su kun nas dag pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-6: de la gnas shing zhing gi rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-7: 'byams klas kun tu spyod spyad ma dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-8: de yi 'og tu mdangs dga' ba'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-9: zhing gi spos sgron sprin gyi dpal zhes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-10: kun nas nyon mongs yongs su dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-11: de yi bskal pa legs par byung zhes bya //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-12: rgyal ba bye ba de tshe byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-13: de dag kun gyis de tshe bskal pa brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-14: mgon po de dag chos gsung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-15: kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongs su bzung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-16: rgyal ba'i dang po grags yangs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-17: chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dpal gyi rgyal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-18: chos dbang rgyal po yon tan sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-19: chos kyi dpal dang lha yi cod pan no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-21: rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-22: rgyal ba brgyad pa nam mkha'i dbyings //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-23: dgu pa kun tu 'byung ba'i sgron ma ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-24: de dag tha ma'i sangs rgyas ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-25: mdzod spu'i dpal gyi 'od kyi blo gros te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-26: rgyal ba mi mchog de dag la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-27: mchod pa byas kyang chags med de ma sbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-28: de yi 'og ma rgyan rab can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-29: rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-30: 'jig rten rnam par phye ba'i mtha'//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-31: rin chen rgyal mtshan blo gros mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-32: de tshe'i bskal pa snying po tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:356b-33: de la sangs rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-1: de dag thams cad kho mos mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-2: thog ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-3: zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-4: nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi bdag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-5: mtshan gyi sprin sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-6: chos dbang rgyal po yon tan bdag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-7: bsod nams ri rab zhi ba 'od kyi rgyal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-8: bcu po de la sogs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-9: rgyal ba de dag kun kyang kho mos mchod; ;rgyal ba'i lam ni der sbyangs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-10: de la rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag gzhol //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-11: 'on kyang da dung rgyal ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-12: tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa ma thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-13: de 'og yid 'ong 'od ldan pa; ;yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten khams byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-14: zhing dbyangs phreng ba'i blo gros can //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-15: sems can nyon mongs nyung ba'i gnas yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-16: bskal pa bde zhing mngon dga' ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-17: de la sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-18: mi mchog de kun kho mos mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-19: rgyal ba mchog gi lam yang rnam par sbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-20: rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-21: rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-22: lha dbang gtsug phud rin chen gtso //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-23: gser gyi ri bo rin chen brtsegs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-24: chos kyi rgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-25: de dag kun gyi tha ma ye shes blo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-26: bcu po de la sogs pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-27: lha dang mi gtso de dag kho mos mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357a-29: sprul pa bzang po'i rgyal mtshan sgron ma ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-0: bskal pa stong gi dpal @357b zhes bya; ;de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-1: zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan zhi gnas dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-2: zhi ba'i sgron ma sprin gyi rgyal po'i dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-3: snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-4: rnam par sprin mched nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-5: chos kyi sgron ma dpal gyi ri //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-6: 'od 'phro'i dpal dang lha yi snying po'i dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-7: de dag tha mar byung ba ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-8: sengge'i sgra sgrog mkhas pa sgron ma'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-9: bcu po de la sogs pa dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-10: bde gshegs zla ba de dag kho mos mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-12: bzod pa kho mos thob par ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-13: de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-14: kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba ste; ;bskal pa gnas med rnam par brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-15: de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum cu drug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-16: dang po yon tan kun tu sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-17: de yi 'og ma sangs rgyas nam mkha'i thugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-18: sangs rgyas legs byung rnam brgyan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-19: rgya mtsho'i chos kyi sprin sgra sgrog pa'i dbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-20: rgyal ba chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-21: sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mnga' dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-22: sangs rgyas phyogs kun gzi brjid dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-23: chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs byung sgra dbyangs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-24: yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi sgron //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-25: rgyal ba'i nyi ma dgu pa byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-26: de dag kun gyi tha ma ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-27: rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal mchod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-28: rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-29: rkang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-30: kho mo lha mo zla bzhin te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:357b-31: mi yi dam pa byung tshe mchod pa byas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-2: mdo sde smon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i rgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-3: gnas med rgyan kyang rab tu bshad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-4: thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis bzung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-5: kho mos mig yangs der thob ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-6: ting 'dzin zhi dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang thob //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-7: skad cig re rer zhing brgyud pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-8: rgyal ba rgya mtsho mang po'ang kho mos mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-9: byams tshul kun tu snang ba'i sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-10: byang chub sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-11: snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-12: sangs rgyas stobs kyi tshad du yangs par skyes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-13: 'gro ba phyin ci log gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-14: rtag dang bde dang gtsang dang bdag zhen pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-15: gti mug ldongs gyur ma rig bsgribs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-16: nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log par 'du shes pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-17: lta ba'i rnam par stug la spyod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-18: lam gyi 'gro rgyud nyam ngar sred dbang gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-19: rnam pa sna tshogs bye brag tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-20: las kyis rnam par bris pas kun byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-22: skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu skyer gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-23: skye dang rga shi gnod pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-24: lus dang sems kyi nyams su myong gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-25: mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-26: zhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-27: stobs bcu gang las byung ba yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-28: bla na med pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-29: de las smon lam sprin byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-30: 'gro ba kun la bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358a-31: tshogs rnams dbyung ba mtha' yas dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-0: lam tshul @358b rgya mtsho rtogs pa'ang de nas byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-1: 'jug pa'i sprin yangs thob gyur pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-2: lam rgyud kun tu sgo gsal shugs ldan te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-3: pha rol phyin gyi sprin yangs pa'ang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-4: chos dbyings 'byams klas kun tu rnam par 'byed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-5: sa gnon shugs drag yangs ldan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-6: dus gsum rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi sa rnams la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-7: chags pa med par spyod par gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-8: skad cig gcig gis rgyal ba kun drung 'gro /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-9: gzhan yang rgyal sras kho mos ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-10: spyod pa kun tu bzang po yongs su gnon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-11: chos dbyings bye brag bcu rnams kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-12: rgya mtsho'i tshul yang kho mos rtogs par 'jug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-13: rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-15: rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ba de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-16: gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-19: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-21: rgyal po mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-22: sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-23: kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan mo'i lha mo de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-24: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sprul pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-26: de la ji snyam du sems /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-28: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba byung ba de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:358b-29: gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-1: ni de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-2: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-3: kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mo des sad par byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-4: sangs rgyas blta ba la yang dag par bskul to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems de srid cig nas bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-8: de ltar kho mo sems bskyed pa de'i mthus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-9: bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-10: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la rten cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-11: thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-12: tha mar kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi sgron ma yon tan rgyal mtshan mthong ba tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di thob ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-13: de thob pas kho mo sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-14: gdul ba'i don du rnam pa 'di lta bus sta gon du gnas pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359a-16: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba rgya chen po'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-0: kho mos byang @359b chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-1: sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-2: 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam chen po rgya mtshos 'jug pa rab tu thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-3: sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-4: spyod pa re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-5: lus re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-6: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rnam par dmigs pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-7: zhing thams cad du'ang zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:359b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sngon gyi mtha'i bskal pa la byang chub @360a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-1: sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa la 'jug par mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu yangs pa yang dag par blang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-3: yongs su gzung ba la mkhas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-4: dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par mkhas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-5: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-9: kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-11: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-12: ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-13: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-14: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-15: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-16: lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360a-17: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i drung nas song ngo ////
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-0: bam po brgya tham @360b pa; de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-1: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-2: dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-3: khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-6: yid ches par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-7: rab tu gzhol bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-8: rgyas par dgang bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-9: rjes su shes par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-10: rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-11: rjes su gzhol bar bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:360b-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i rjes su sems pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor dang /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:361a-0: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs @361a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:361a-1: mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa mi phyed pas zhugs pa /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:361a-7: 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir; mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su grub pa'i lus bstan te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:361a-9: des 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bor 'dus te /

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:361b-0: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'od zer des reg par gyur ma thag tu de nyid kyi mod la ting nge 'dzin shin tu rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil @361b 'khor thob par gyur to //
