K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-2: mtshan rnam par dag pa de mi snang bar byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-3: mtshan mo'i lha mo'i gzugs su byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-4: rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad 'byin cing 'dug par gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-5: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-6: mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-7: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-8: khyod kyi sku yangs mtshan rab rgyan gyis brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-9: shin tu bzang zhing mdzes pa bdag gis mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-10: nam mkha' skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-11: dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-12: 'od kyi 'khor can sku bzang dam pa'i mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-13: mtha' yas zhing gi rdul khams mang po snyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-14: kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa'i dpe tshul du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-15: phyogs rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par gang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-16: 'od zer dra ba mang po 'gro sems mnyam //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-17: khyod ni ba spu'i sgo nas 'gyed pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-18: 'od zer sgo la padmo yid 'ong gnas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-19: khyod kyi sprul pa 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-20: spos kyi na bun sprin du chags pa'i 'gyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-21: 'gro ba'i gzugs su gnas te kun nas mdzes //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-22: me tog sgo rnams kun nas dgye mdzad pas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:365b-23: chos dbyings bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba kun tu khyab //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-1: kyi phrag pa'i lhun yangs 'phags pa ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-2: rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo ri rab 'dra //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-3: dri med de ni 'gro ba kun tu gsal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-4: gti mug mun nag rnam par bzlog pa mdzad; ;khyod kyi dri med zhal mdog bzang po las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-5: na bun sprin dang nyi ma yangs pa 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-6: khyod kyi nyi ma'i 'khor 'dra 'od bzang ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-7: rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa 'byin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-8: khyod kyi spyan nas zla skar 'od 'byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-9: rtag tu dri med sprin ltar mang ba ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-10: de dag phyogs bcur bkang zhing 'gro ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-11: rab tu snang byed 'jig rten rab rib sel //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-12: khyod kyi mtshan las 'gro ba'i lus mnyam pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-13: sprul pa rgya mtsho phyogs su khyab par 'phro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-14: de dag chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas 'gengs shing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-15: sems can tshad med tshogs rnams yongs su 'dul //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-16: khyod kyi sku ni 'byams klas phyogs su snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-17: 'gro ba kun la mngon gyur dga' ba bskyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-18: rgyal po me dang rkun po chus bskyed pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-19: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam sel zhi bar mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-20: gang tshe khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag btang nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-21: yon tan rnam par sems shing nyer phyin pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-22: de tshe 'od zer dri med 'khor bzang po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-23: khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams gseb nas 'thon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-24: phyogs rnams rgya mtsho brgya mang snang mdzad nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366a-25: 'jig rten snang ba rgya che yongs bskyed de //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-0: rnam 'phrul rnam pa mang po rnams bstan @366b nas; ;de tshe bdag gi lus kyi gseb tu zhi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-1: gang tshe 'od kyi 'khor gyis bdag reg pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-2: de tshe bde ba rmad byung yangs pa myong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-3: gzungs dang ting 'dzin brgya mang yongs su non //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-4: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag yas mthong bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-5: gom pa rnam por gyen du bteg pa la'ang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-6: rdul phran grangs snyed tshul ni bdag gis rig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-7: rdul phran shin tu phra ba gcig la yang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-8: zhing gi rdul snyed zhing rnams mthong bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-9: rdul la gnas kyang rnam pa tha dgu ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-10: zhing mang brgya ni shin tu nyon yang mongs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-11: de yi 'gro ba sdug bsngal nyams su myong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-12: cho nger ngu zhing smre sngags yongs su 'don //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-13: zhing mang la la kun nas nyon mongs dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-14: de na sdug bsngal mang zhing bde ba chung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-15: rgyal ba thugs rje can yang der skye ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-16: rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-17: zhing tshul la la yongs dag nyon mongs te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang mang pos brgyan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-19: skyes pa bud med yongs brgyan blta na sdug /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-20: skyon med rgyal ba'i gdung yang rgyun mi 'chad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-21: zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs shing dri med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-22: rdul la gnas shing mnyam pa'i gzhi dang ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-23: de dag bskal pa brgya mang sngon gyi tshe //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-24: rnam par snang mdzad spyod mdzad yongs su sbyangs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-25: zhing rnams 'byams klas kun na rgyal ba dag /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:366b-26: shing dbang dam pa'i drung du gshegs pa ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-2: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing 'dul ba ston //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-3: rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-4: khyod kyang kun tu rjes su bzhud par mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-5: mchod pa stong phrag tshad med khrag khrig gis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-6: rgyal ba kun la mngon par mchod mdzad mthong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-7: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-8: mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-11: de lta bur zab pa ni ngo mtshar chen /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-12: rnam par thar pa de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-13: de khyod kyis brnyes nas yun ni ji srid cig lags /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-14: byang chub sems dpas ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na rnam par thar pa de yongs su dag par 'gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-17: gnas 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jigs rten dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-19: rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas yid ches par dka' ba ste; de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-20: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-21: smon lam khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-22: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po lhur len pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-23: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367a-26: ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-0: @367b sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bla na med par bya ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su bzung ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-3: bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-4: chos rgya mtsho thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba rnam par sbyang ba la zhugs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-5: skad cig re re zhing dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad du ye shes snang bas rnam par gnas pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi yul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-6: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-8: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig gi pha rol tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya bar /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-10: bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-11: bskal pa de la sangs rgyas ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-13: rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:367b-14: rdo rje las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-1: kyis yongs su mdzes par byas pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i gzhi ni rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgya mtsho las blangs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-3: lhun dang lus ni nor bu rin po che spos thams cad kyi rgyal po las gyur pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-4: de ni dbyibs kun tu zlum pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-5: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-6: lhab lhub thams cad kyi sprin gyi bla res kun nas khyab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-7: rin po che'i khor yug rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa rim pa stong gis yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-8: gling bzhi pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis shin tu rgyas par brgyan pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-9: de la gling bzhi pa la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-10: sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-11: la la ni kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-12: sems can las 'dren ma dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-13: la la ni rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-14: sems can yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-16: kha na ma tho ba nyung ba rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-17: la la ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-18: byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyi gnas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs logs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-0: gling bzhi pa @368b rin po che me tog sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-2: ma skyes pa'i 'bras la yongs su spyod pa sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-3: gzhal med khang la yongs su spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-4: 'khor kun nas yid bzhin gyi shing gis 'khor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-5: spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las spos kyi sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-6: phreng ba sna tshogs kyi shing las phreng ba'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-7: me tog sna tshogs kyi shing las me tog kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-8: phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi shing gi lhun las spos rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi phye ma'i char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-9: rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las rin po che'i 'bru mang po 'brul ba'i kha dog snang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-10: lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing las sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rlung gis bskyod cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-11: nam mkha'i dbyings las sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-12: nyin mtshan gyi bde ba nyi ma dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:368b-14: nor bu rin po che kun tu snang bas gzhi byas pa'i sa rab tu mnyam par gyur pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-0: gling bzhi pa der rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung bar @369a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-1: gyur te; rgyal po'i pho brang de dag re re zhing yang chu klung stong gis yongs su bskor ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-2: chu klung de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog sil mas gang ba'o; ;lha rdzas kyi rol mo dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-3: glu'i sgra skad snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-4: chu 'gram rin po che'i shing yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-5: rin po che sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa'i gru phan tshun du rgyu ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-6: bde ba sna tshogs ci dga' bar yongs su spyad du yod pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-7: chu klung gi mtshams kyi gzhi re re dag na yang grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas gnas pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-8: grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-9: grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi bza' shing gi ra ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-11: khang pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'o; ;gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-12: rgyal po'i pho brang dbu ma rin po che'i me tog sgron ma zhes bya ba yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-13: de ni skyid cing longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-14: rtag tu lo legs shing bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369a-15: lha dang mi mang pos yongs su gang ba'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-0: sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang @369b ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-1: rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma zhes bya ba de na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-2: rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen padmo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-3: padmo'i snying po la rdzus te byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-4: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-6: chos kyi rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan pa gnas par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-7: de'i bu dpa' zhing rtul phod la yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-9: rnam pa thams cad yongs su tshang ba'i yan lag dam pa dang ldan pa stong tshang bar byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-10: de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-11: de dag kun kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i skal ba dang mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba mthun par spyod pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-12: rin po che'i rgyan rang 'khrungs su byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-13: dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-14: lha'i bu mo dang khyad par med par 'dra ba'i gzugs can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-15: dzambu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa'i lus can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-16: lus kyi ba spu las lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs 'byung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-17: lus las lha rdzas kyi 'od dri zhim po dri ma med pa rab tu 'gyed pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-18: de'i blon po bye ba phrag bcu byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:369b-19: blon po rin po che la sogs pa dag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-0: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam @370a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-1: par snang ba rin chen padmo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po de'i btsun mo dam pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-2: bud med rin po che dpal gyi bzhin yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-5: kha dog bzang po shin tu rgyas pa'i dam pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-8: mdog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-9: tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-11: 'khor kun tu dpag tshad stong gi tshad du 'od kha dog du ma dang ldan pa; lha rdzas kyi dri zhim po can 'gyed pa byung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-12: rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal gyi bzhin yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba de las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-13: bu mo padmo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-14: yan lag thams cad tshang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-17: 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na mi ngoms pa byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-21: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la blta na su yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-22: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bu mo padmo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal de la blta bas kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-23: su yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370a-24: shes rab kyis yongs su ngoms par 'gyur ba ni ma gtogs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-0: de'i tshe de'i dus na @370b sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-1: tshe la gcig tu nges pa med pas bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-2: de'i dus na sems can rnams kyi dbyibs sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-8: chu zheng rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-12: mthu rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-14: yid du mi 'ong ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-16: dma' ba la mos pa sna tshogs kyang yod par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-17: de la sems can ji snyed cig kha dog bzang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-18: yangs pa la mos pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-20: blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-23: nga ni khyed pas kha dog ches bzang ngo zhes zer ro //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-24: de bzhin du sems can ji snyed cig lus kyi dbyibs legs pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-25: sems can lus kyi dbyibs mi sdug par gyur pa rnams la rlom zhing khyad du gsod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-26: de dag de ltar gcig la gcig khyad du gsod pa las byung ba'i mi dge ba'i rtsa bas tshe'i tshad las kyang yongs su bri bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:370b-27: kha dog dang stobs dang bde ba las kyang yongs su bri bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-0: rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma de'i @371a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-2: snying po byang chub kyi shing kun du grag pa'i chos kyi sprin sgra'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-4: rtsa ba rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi 'jig pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-5: nor bu rin po che thams cad las grub pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-6: lhun shin tu yangs shing rgyas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-12: 'bras bu rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-13: kun tu cha mnyam par rnam par bkod cing kun tu khyab pa'i yal ga dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-14: rgyan kun tu rgyas par 'gengs shing mi zad pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-15: rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-16: 'od zer kun tu snang bar 'gyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i dbyangs rjes su sgrog pa yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-18: snying po byang chub de'i mdun rol na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-19: spos chu'i mtsho rin po che'i me tog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-21: chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-22: de ni rin po che'i shing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-23: rin po che'i shing de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi shing gi dbyibs su 'khod pa sha stag go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371a-24: spos chu'i mtsho chen po rin po che'i me tog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-0: @371b chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba de'i 'gram thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-1: nor bu rin po che thams cad bkram zhing rnam par bkod pa ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-2: rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba sna tshogs su dkrigs pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-3: rin po che rnam par dag pa las byas pa'i khang pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-4: rgyan rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-5: snying po byang chub de'i 'khor thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-6: padmo'i snying po can sha stag gis yongs su 'khor ba ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-7: spos chu'i mtsho chen po rin po che'i me tog dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-9: chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba de'i dbus nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-10: padmo'i rgyal po chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin gyi rgyan ces bya ba byung bar 'gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-11: padmo chen po de la de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag gi nang nas bskal pa'i thog ma pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:371b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-0: de ni bskal pa de la thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par @372a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-2: des lo stong phrag du ma zhig tu chos bstan pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-3: lo stong phrag bcur 'od zer snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas yongs su smin par mdzad do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de lo stong phrag bcu na 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-5: padmo'i rgyal po chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin gyi rgyan ces bya ba de las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-6: sems can thams cad rdul dang 'byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-7: 'od des phog pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang lo stong phrag bcu na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-8: lo stong phrag dgu na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-9: byang chub kyi shing de las rdul dang bral ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-10: 'od zer des phog pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang gzugs thams cad shin tu phra ba mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372a-11: lo stong phrag brgyad na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-0: byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba @372b byung ste; des phog pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi las rgya mtsho khong du chud par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-1: las dran pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-2: lo stong phrag bdun na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-3: byang chub kyi shing de nyid las 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste; 'od zer des sems can de dag la phog nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-4: dbang po nyams pa med cing yongs su tshang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-5: lo stong phrag drug na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-6: byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-7: des sems can de dag la phog nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rnam par 'phrul par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-8: lo stong phrag lnga na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-9: byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par sgra 'byin pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-10: des sems can de dag la phog nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag par mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:372b-12: lo stong phrag bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-1: po de nyid las 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul tha mi dad pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-2: des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad du song ba la zhugs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-3: lo stong phrag gsum na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe; byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-4: des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa de yang mngon du mos pas mthong bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-5: lo stong phrag gnyis na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-6: byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od zer dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi tshul rab tu sgrog pa byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-7: des sems can de dag la reg nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho la rtog cing 'jug par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-8: lo stong na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-9: byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od zer ye shes rab ri ba med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373a-10: des sems can de dag la phog nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams @373b cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-2: sems can thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba'i mig kun tu lta ba thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de lo brgya na 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-4: byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par smin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-5: des sems can de dag la phog nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i 'du shes thob par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de zhag bdun na skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-8: byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sems can thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-10: mos pa yongs su 'byung ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-11: des sems can de dag la phog nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-12: sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-14: de ltar 'od zer gyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul tshad med pa rnam pa de lta bus /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-15: lo stong du sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad nas zhag bdun pa la thug pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:373b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su bskyod pa'i tshul tshad med pas yongs su bskyod nas shin tu dag par byin gyis brlabs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-0: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ji snyed pa @374a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-1: rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su bstan par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-3: de nas zhag bdun pa tha ma la bab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur bar yongs su smin pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-5: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de'i khor yug thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-15: gzhal med khang thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-19: rol mo'i shing thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-20: rol mo brdung ba'i dbyangs thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-21: sprul pa'i rgyan thams cad kyi dmigs pa re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-22: mthu'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa'i spros dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-23: bdug spos thams cad kyi sprin mngon par 'thon te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-24: rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-26: bdug spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro dam pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374a-27: spos rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-0: rgyan rin po che thams cad @374b kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-1: rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-2: phye ma sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin rnam par ston pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-4: rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba thams cad kyi sprin yongs su 'khrol zhing brdung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra skad kyi sprin rab tu 'byin pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-7: gsung rgya mtsho'i sprin rab tu sgrog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-9: dpe byad bzang po'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu ston pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i ltas sngon du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-11: rin po che'i rgyal po'i padmo chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-12: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyan de'i padmo'i 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po las byas pa chen po sha stag tu byas te 'khod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-13: rin po che'i rgyal po'i padmo chen po'i 'khor gyi rin po che'i padmo chen po de dag gi ze ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-14: snying po la sengge'i khri rin po che'i padmo chen po'i snying po can /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:374b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag byung bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-1: snying po can gyi khri de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-2: bcom ldan 'das ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa mang po dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-4: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-5: des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can tshad med pa rnams ngan song dang log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-6: sems can tshad med pa ni mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-7: sems can tshad med pa ni nyan thos kyi sa la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-8: sems can tshad med pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375a-9: sems can tshad med pa ni shugs drag po 'od kyis 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-0: sems can tshad med pa ni brtson 'grus dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par @375b byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-1: sems can tshad med pa ni chos rab tu bsgom pa'i gnas su 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-2: sems can tshad med pa ni dbang po yongs su dag pa rab tu bsgom pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-3: sems can tshad med pa ni stobs mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par spyod pa khong du chud pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-4: sems can tshad med pa ni chos grong khyer mngon du 'gyur ba'i yul gyi theg pa skye bas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-5: sems can tshad med pa ni thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyi theg pas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-6: sems can tshad med pa ni spyod pa'i sbyor ba la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-7: sems can tshad med pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do; ;sems can tshad med pa ni dmigs pa'i yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyi 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-8: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:375b-9: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-0: sems can tshad med pa ni pha rol tu @376a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-1: phyin pa'i lam rnam par dag pa la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-2: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-3: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-10: dgu pa la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-11: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-12: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smon lam gyi khyad par can la btsud do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-13: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-14: smon lam rnam par dag pa la rab tu bkod do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-15: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-16: rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-17: sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dul bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku sna tshogs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-19: thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i chos bstan pa yongs su shes par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-20: rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma'i sems can du gzugs dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376a-23: longs spyod kyis rgyags shing dregs te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-0: @376b gcig la gcig khyad du gsod pa de rnams gdul ba'i don du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-1: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kha dog dang gzugs mchog tu byon par mngon par sprul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-2: rgyal po'i pho brang der phyin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-3: de'i 'od shin tu yangs pas rgyal po'i gnas de dag thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-5: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i rin chen padmo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po'i lus las byung ba'i 'od dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-6: bud med rin po che'i 'od dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-7: rin po che'i shing gi 'od dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-8: nor bu rin po che chen po'i 'od dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-12: dzambu'i gling na 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-14: nyi ma shar te mun pa dang ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-17: rgyu skar gyi 'od kyang mi snang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-18: me dang nor bu'i 'od kyang mi snang ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-19: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i zil gyis non nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-20: dzambu'i gling de na 'od yod pa thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-22: dper na; dzambu chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram gyi drung du snag tsha'i gzugs bzhag na mdzes par mi rung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:376b-26: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mdun du sems can de dag gi gzugs kyi lus kyang mdzes par mi rung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-0: de nas de dag 'di snyam du @377a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-1: gyur te; de lta su zhig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-2: de ltar de'i drung du bdag cag gi lus sam /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-5: gzi brjid kyis kyang mdzes par mi rung /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-8: lhang nger mi rung ba de lta lha'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-11: de'i mtshan ma ni gzung bar mi nus so snyam mo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-13: rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i me tog sgron ma'i dbus 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin po chen padmo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po'i gzhal med khang gi steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen padmo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-18: khyod kyi khams 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub chos kun tu snang ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-19: rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-20: padmo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gzugs kyi lus dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377a-25: dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po skyes te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-0: de'i tshe sems 'di @377b snyam du bskyed do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-1: bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci bsags pa des /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-2: bdag kyang lus 'di 'dra ba thob par shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-7: ji ltar 'dis mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na sems can rnams la snang ba chen po bskyed de /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-8: sangs rgyas skye ba yongs su brjod pa de bzhin du /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-9: bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa bsal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-10: ye shes chen po'i snang ba bskyed par bya'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-11: gang dang gang du skyes pa thams cad du'ang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di dang mi 'bral bar shog cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-15: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen padmo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying po yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-16: rin po che bdun dang lhan cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-17: bud med kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang lhan cig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-20: ljongs kyi mi dang lhan cig tu rgyal bo'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-22: rgyal po'i gnas rin po che'i me tog sgron ma de nas 'phags te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-23: gyen du nam mkha' la dpag tshad gcig tsam du mngon par 'phags nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:377b-25: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pos rgyas par bkang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-0: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas blta ba la yongs su bskul @378a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-2: rin po che'i ri thams cad la gzugs brnyan mngon par bstan cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-3: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la mngon sum du gnas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-4: sangs rgyas blta ba de tshigs su bcad de glu'i dbyangs kyis bsngags pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-5: lus can thams cad skyabs mdzad pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-6: sangs rgyas 'jig rten byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-7: 'jig rten gtso bo de blta bar //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-8: kun kyang longs te 'dong bar gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-9: lus can kun la phan don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-10: chos rab ston pa gang mdzad pa'i //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni; ;bskal pa bye ba'i brgya lam na'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-12: 'jig rten phyin cir log gyur cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-13: mi shes sgrib pas bsgribs gyur te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-14: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-15: gzigs shing thugs rje che bskyed nas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-16: sdug bsngal thams cad gzhil don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-17: sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-18: bskal pa bye ba grangs med du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-19: byang chub spyod pa spyad pa mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-20: bskal pa mtha' yas mu med par //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-21: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog don du //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-22: zhabs dang phyag kyang yongs su btang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-23: spyan dang snyan dang dbu yang btang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-24: mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-25: thos pa don yod 'gyur ba yin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-27: 'byung ba bskal pa bye bar dkon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378a-28: de ni byang chub gdan la bzhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-0: gsung ba'i @378b dam pa bltar yang yod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-1: bdud rnams sde dang bcas btul te //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-2: byang chub mchog tu rnam sangs rgyas //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-4: sangs rgyas sku las mngon bkye zhing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-5: 'gro ba tshim par mdzad pa yi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-6: kha dog sna tshogs 'di la ltos //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-7: 'od zer sprin mang grangs med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-8: sangs rgyas sku las 'thon pa rnams //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-9: de ni sems can snang gyur na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-10: bde ba dpe med thob par 'gyur;/
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-11: brtson 'grus chen po rab rtsom ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-12: rang dang rang gi bsam pa yis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-13: mgon po de la mchod pa gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-14: tshur shog de yi gan du 'dong //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-15: de nas rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen padmo dpal gyi gtsug phud snying pos /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-16: tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bdag gi khams na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskul te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-17: mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su grub pa'i char pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-18: snying po byang chub kun nas snang ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor kun tu mngon par 'bebs shing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-19: rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-20: me tog thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin gyis nam mkha' bla nas khebs par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-21: na bza' sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog cing brgyan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:378b-22: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i dbyings brgyan par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-0: spos sna tshogs rgya mtshos dri zhim @379a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-1: par byas pa'i spos kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-2: rin po che thams cad kyi khri la rin po che'i gdan 'phel bar gting ba'i sprin gyi rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-3: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin mngon par bsgreng ba'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-5: gzhal med khang thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-6: me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-7: mchod pa'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal bo'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-10: bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379a-12: stan nor bu rin po che chen po phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i padmo'i snying po can la 'dug go /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-0: de nas 'khor @379b los bsgyur ba'i bu mo ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i padmo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-1: rang gi rgyan rnams lus las bkrol te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po la gtor to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-5: bcom ldan 'das de'i dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi bar snang la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-6: nor bu rin po che'i rgyan gyi gdugs chen po nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-7: klu'i dbang po'i lus kyis bzung ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-8: rgyan thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs shin tu legs par kun nas bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-9: rgyan gyi gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor bcus yongs su bskor ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-11: khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-12: rin po che thams cad kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-13: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing gi rgyan gyis kun nas khebs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-14: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po spos thams cad kyi rgya mtshos yongs su brgyan bar 'dug par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-15: de'i dbus na byang chub kyi shing chen po chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i rin po che thams cad kyi yal ga dang lhun du ldan pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-16: rgyan brjod na mtha' dang dbus med pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:379b-17: skad cig re re zhing rgyan sna tshogs yongs su ston pa yod par mthong bar gyur to //

K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384a-20: gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384a-21: kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384a-22: rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes kyi 'od kun tu 'phro ba padmo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-0: kho mo bu mo gzhon nur @384b gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi gsung rab la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku padmo la bzhugs pa bcos pa de ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-3: kho mo'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-4: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bskul ba de ni kho mos byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-5: kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal gyi yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po'i drung du phyin te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-9: kho mos bcom ldan 'das de'i drung nas chos thos par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-10: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa 'di thob bo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyang bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-12: yo byad dang mchod cing rim gror bya ba thams cad kyis kyang bkur stir byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos thos te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gdams ngag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-15: rjes su bstan pa la'ang zhugs par gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:384b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la kho mos rim gro cher byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-1: gro de'i rnam pas sems kyi skad cig gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i khams de ni 'das par gyur /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-5: bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor de ni mthar phyin par gyur nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-6: de'i rjes la 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-7: rin chen 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis klubs shing brgyan pa zhes bya /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-8: bskal pa ni 'od chen po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-9: de la sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung bar gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-10: de dag thams cad kyang kho mos bsnyen bkur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-11: bskal pa 'od chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bskal pa'i dang po la byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-13: kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mor gyur pas mchod pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-14: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mthu bo che'i dpal zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-15: de la kho mos 'khor lo bsgyur bar gyur pas mchod pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde sangs rgyas thams cad skye zhing 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-17: mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385a-18: de yang kho mos thos nas yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-0: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od 'phro ri'i dpal gyis @385b rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-1: de la kho mo tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pas mchod pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-3: dus gsum snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-4: mdo sde dzambu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-5: de yang kho mos thos nas yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i shugs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-7: de la kho mo lha'i rgyal por gyur bas mchod pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad shes pa'i bye brag ces bya ba mdo sde lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-9: de'ang kho mos thos nas yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa chos zab mo'i dpal rgya mtshos yang dag par 'byung ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-11: de la kho mo klu'i dbang po'i bu mor gyur pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-12: nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel ba shugs zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-15: mdo sde bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-16: de'ang kho mos thos nas yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:385b-17: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo'i spo'i 'od zer sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-0: de la kho mo rgya mtsho'i @386a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-2: rin po che'i padmo'i sprin gyi char gyis nye bar bsnyen te mchod pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa des kho mo la mdo sde chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul zhes bya ba mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-4: de'ang kho mos thos nas yongs su blangs so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-5: dran pas yang dag par bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-7: de la kho mo drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-8: drang srong stong phrag drug cus kun nas bskor bas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-9: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas nye bar bsnyen te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-10: spos kyi me tog ri bo tsam gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab nas mchod pa byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa kho mo la mdo sde chos gnas med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba mdo sde stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-12: de'ang kho mos thos nas yongs su bzung ngo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-13: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-14: kho mo yang mnyam pa nyid kyi don 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sa'i lha mo zhig tu gyur nas kho mo sa'i lha mo'i 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas pas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-15: rin po che'i shing thams cad kyi lhun las /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386a-16: rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-0: rin po che'i phreng @386b ba'i sprin gyi char yang rab tu phab nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir spyan sngar phyin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-3: kho mo la mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-4: mdo sde grangs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-5: de'ang kho mos thos nas bzung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-6: chud zos par ma byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyi tha mar /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' mdzod spus yongs su rgyas pa'i rtse mo dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-10: de'i tshe kho mo yang gar mkhan gyi bu mo bzhin mngon par mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-12: gar mkhan gyi tshogs kyis rol mo byas pa'i tshe /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-13: kho mos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las tshigs su bcad pa stong gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon par bstod de spyan sngar phyin to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa des mdzod spu nas 'od zer chos dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba bkye ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-16: kho mo'i lus thams cad kyang snang bar mdzad do; ;'od zer des kho mo la phog ma thag tu /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:386b-17: rnam par thar pa chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul yongs su 'khyil ba'i snying po zhes bya ba thob par gyur cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-1: pa de dag la sogs pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-2: bskal pa 'od chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis klubs shing brgyan par sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byas te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la kho mos mchod pa yang byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kho mo la chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang dran te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-5: chos kyi tshul de dag las yi ge 'ga'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-6: tshig 'ga' yang brjed par ma gyur to //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i drung du 'gro ba'i tshe yang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su brjod par bya bas sems can tshad med pa'i don byas so //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re la'ang kho mos chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi snying po /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-10: chos kyi dbyings shin tu yangs pa zhes bya ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i glog mngon par snang ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-11: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad la gnas par yang dag par gzhol ba thob par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-13: kho mo la ni da ltar yang sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su snang ste /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kho mos mthong bar gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i glog mngon par snang ba sngan chad ma thob pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-0: sngan chad ma @387b mthong ba dag kyang kho mo'i sems kyi rgyud la gnas par gyur te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-1: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa las g-yo ba med do //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i glog mngon par snang ba thob pa 'di ni mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-4: de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-5: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba zhes bya ba 'di brnan te bstan pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-6: rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i phyir /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-7: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-8: zab mo blta dka' khong du chud dka' ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-9: dus gsum dbyings kun tha dad tshul ldan la //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-11: kho mo'i tshig 'di nor bzang mnyan par gyis //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-12: sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod pas byang chub tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-13: kho mos thog ma ji ltar sems bskyed dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-14: ji ltar kho mos rnam thar 'di thob pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-15: de dag rnam par phye ba'i tshul 'di nyon //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-16: 'di nas sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-17: bskal pa gcig nas gcig brgyud pha rol tu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-18: 'jig rten khams yangs dri ma'i skyon med pa //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-19: rnam snang rgyal mtshan sgron ma'i dpal byung ste //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-20: bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:387b-21: de la sangs rgyas rigs ni rgyun ma chad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-1: rab rdul phran rab snyed kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-2: stobs bcu skyon med mang po byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-3: de la bde gshegs thog mar rin chen 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-4: kun tu 'phro dpal yon tan dpal rgyal byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-5: rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-6: yon tan sengge'i dbang po rgyal ba bzhi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-7: rgyal ba bzhi pa'i rgyal po skye bcil dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-8: grags pa'i ri bo yon tan ri rab dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-9: rgyal ba nyi ma zla zhal bcom ldan 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-10: bcu po 'di dag tshul 'di thog ma'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-11: rgyal ba nam mkha'i gzhi dang kun nas 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-12: phyogs su yongs byung dran pa rgya mtsho'i sgo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-13: rgyal ba mngon 'phags 'od mnga' ri rab dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-14: bde gshegs chos kyi 'od 'phro ri bo dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-15: thugs rje che mnga' dgu pa padmos 'phags //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-16: sangs rgyas bcu pa chos dbyings me tog ste;/
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-17: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su brjod pa las //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-18: tshul 'di bcu pa gnyis pa 'di yin no //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-19: 'od dpal rgyal po ye shes blo gros dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-20: sna tshogs don dbang dpal gyi blo gros lha; ;rgyal ba shugs kyi rgyal blo ye shes dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-21: snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-22: rgyal ba rnam par gnon pa'i lha stabs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-23: de bzhin chos dbyings padmo bcu pa ste; ;rgya chen yongs su bstan las tshul 'di ni //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-24: tshul 'dir bcu pa gsum pa bstan pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-25: rin chen 'od 'phro ri dpal bcom ldan 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388a-26: de yi 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-0: @388b chos kyi 'od dang padmo snying po dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-1: 'gro ba'i zla ba spyan tshul bde bar gshegs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-2: spos kyi 'od dang rin chen ri rab dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-3: rgyal ba dri za lus 'od rgyal po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-4: rin chen snying po rgyal dpal gzi brjid ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-5: rgyal ba bcu pa zhi ba'i gzugs rtsi stabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-6: de yi 'og ma rgyal ba rgya chen blo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-7: rin chen 'od dang nam mkha'i sprin gyi dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-8: rgyal ba dam pa'i mtshan gyi dpal gyur dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-9: brtul zhugs dkyil 'khor rang gi lus kyi 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-10: mthu chen brtul zhugs ri rab dpal mnga' dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-11: rgyal ba yon tan khor yug dpal gyi rgyal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-12: bcom ldan mi pham brtul zhugs rgyal mtshan dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-13: shing gi ri bo rgyal ba de dag bcu //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-14: rgyal ba s'a la'i rgyal po dpal gyi mchog /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-15: 'jig rten dbang po'i lus ni snang ba'i 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-16: mngon par 'phags 'od dpal gyi bcom ldan 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-17: rdo rje 'od dang sa yi gzi brjid dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-18: rgyal ba zab chos 'od kyi rgyal po dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-19: chos kyi rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi blo gros dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-20: ri rab rgyal mtshan dpal dang blo gros snang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-21: rgyal ba bcu pa rin chen rgyal po dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-22: tshangs pa'i 'od dang rgyal ba nam mkha'i dbyings //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-23: de bzhin chos kyi dbyings ni gzugs brnyan dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-24: snang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi bcom ldan 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-25: tha dad phyogs mkhyen ye shes blo gros dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:388b-26: nam mkha'i sgron ma mngon par dga' ba'i dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-2: bsod nams rab tu snang dpal zhi ba'i dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-3: bcu pa snying rje chen po sprin gyi dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-4: de bzhin nyi 'od stobs snang blo gros /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-6: rgyal ba 'gro ba thams cad mngon gzugs dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-7: de tshe rgyal ba mngon 'phags 'od mnga' 'byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-8: de yi 'og ma zhi ba'i sku yi 'od //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-9: chos 'phags bde gshegs de bzhin byung bar gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-10: de yi 'og ma rlung gi drag shul dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-11: dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan rin chen lus kyi dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-12: dus gsum snang ba'i 'od ni bcu pa'o //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-13: smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu snang dpal dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-14: gnyis pa dgongs pa rdo rje ri bo dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-15: rgyal ba gsum pa sengge ri rab dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-16: dran pa'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po chos dpal blo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-17: shes rab sgron ma 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-18: de yi 'og ma rgyal ba rgya chen blo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-19: rgyal ba chos dbyings tshul gyi ye shes stabs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-20: chos kyi rgya mtsho blo gros ye shes dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-21: chos 'dzin pa dang rin chen sbyin dpal dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-22: rgyal ba yon tan khor yug dpal gyi sprin //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-23: bzod pa'i sgron ma dpal dang gzi brjid ldan //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-24: shugs 'ong zhi gnas dbyangs kyi rgyal ba dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-25: zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan 'gro ba'i sgron ma dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-26: sangs rgyas smon lam chen po shugs kyi dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-27: bcom ldan gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan stobs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389a-28: rgyal ba ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-0: rgyal ba chos @389b dbang blo gros chags pa med //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-1: 'gro skad rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi blo gros dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-2: thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-3: dbang sgyur mchod sbyin grags pa'i mchod sdong blo //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-4: phyogs yul 'gro ba mngon sum bcom ldan 'das //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-5: sems can bsam par mnyam pa sku yi dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-6: gzhan yang sangs rgyas gnas dang bcas pa'i dpal //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-7: rgyal ba rang bzhin lus dpal bzang po dang //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-8: der ni rgyal ba de la sogs pa byung //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-9: de dag byung nas 'gro ba'i sgron ma mdzad //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-10: bskal pa ri rab shin tu phra rdul snyed //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-11: bdag gis rgyal ba rgya mtsho de dag mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-12: bskal pa sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed po //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-13: de dag tu ni rgyal ba gang byung ba //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-14: bde gshegs de dag thams cad bdag gis mchod //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-15: rnam par thar ba'i tshul ni 'di la zhugs //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-16: rnam par thar pa'i tshul 'di sgom byed cing //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-17: bskal pa mtha' yas bdag gis sngon spyad kyi //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-18: khyod kyis thos nas nan tan myur gyis shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-19: tshul 'di ring po mi thogs thob par 'gyur //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-21: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa 'di shes par zad na //
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:389b-22: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho la mos pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par gnas pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-0: bsam pa sna tshogs kyi lus dang @390a *//
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-2: dbang po rgya mtsho sna tshogs yongs su grub pa /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-4: smon lam sna tshogs shin tu rtogs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-5: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-8: snying po byang chub 'di nyid na /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-9: kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-10: padmo'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhig la 'dug cing /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-11: mtshan mo'i lha mo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba 'dug gi /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-13: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-14: ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-15: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-16: mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-17: mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-18: lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas /
K09acip-k_lha_sa-045-001:390a-20: mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung nas song ngo ////
